parts.name: Picture description
parts.title: For each question, you will see a picture and you will hear four short statements. The statements will be spoken just one time. They will not be printed in your test book so you must listen carefully to understand what the speaker says. When you hear the four statements, look at the picture and choose the statement that best describes what you see in the picture. Choose the best answer A, B, C or D

intro.title:
EXAMPLE:
Now listen to the four statements.
Statement (D) best describes what you see in the picture.
Therefore, you should choose answer (D).
intro.answers: ["A. He is on the phone","B. She is driving the car","C. She is typing on the computer","D. He is sitting next to her"]

questions.text_audio:
A. He's walking along the shore
B. He's swimming in the sea
C. He's holding a fishing pole
D. He's getting into a boat
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

A. Ông \u1ea5y \u0111ang \u0111i d\u1ecdc b\u1edd bi\u1ec3n<\/p>

B. Ông \u1ea5y \u0111ang b\u01a1i \u1edf bi\u1ec3n<\/p>

C. Ông \u1ea5y \u0111ang c\u1ea7m m\u1ed9t cái c\u1ea7n câu cá<\/p>

D. Ông \u1ea5y \u0111ang \u0111i lên thuy\u1ec1n<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.title: Select the answer
childrens.explains: {"vn":"C. He's holding a fishing pole. D\u1ecbch: C. \u00d4ng \u1ea5y \u0111ang c\u1ea7m m\u1ed9t c\u00e1i c\u1ea7n c\u00e2u c\u00e1."}

questions.text_audio:
A. A woman's standing on a busy street
B. A woman's wiping a car window with a cloth
C. A woman's carrying a jacket over her arm
D. A woman's parking a vehicle
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

A. M\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5 n\u1eef \u0111ang \u0111\u1ee9ng trên m\u1ed9t con ph\u1ed1 náo nhi\u1ec7t<\/p>

B. M\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5 n\u1eef \u0111ang lau c\u1eeda s\u1ed5 xe b\u1eb1ng m\u1ed9t cái kh\u0103n<\/p>

C. M\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5 n\u1eef \u0111ang mang áo khoác trên tay<\/p>

D. M\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5 n\u1eef \u0111ang \u0111\u1ed7 xe<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.title: Select the answer
childrens.explains: {"vn":"C. A woman's carrying a jacket over her arm. D\u1ecbch: M\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5 n\u1eef \u0111ang mang \u00e1o kho\u00e1c tr\u00ean tay."}

questions.text_audio:
A. A truck has stopped at a traffic light
B. A man is loading boxes onto a cart
C. A man is kneeling on the grass
D. Some boxes are stacked on the ground
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

A. M\u1ed9t chi\u1ebfc xe t\u1ea3i d\u1eebng l\u1ea1i \u1edf \u0111èn giao thông<\/p>

B. M\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111àn ông \u0111ang ch\u1ea5t thùng lên xe \u0111\u1ea9y<\/p>

C. M\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111àn ông \u0111ang qu\u1ef3 trên c\u1ecf<\/p>

D. M\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 chi\u1ebfc thùng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c x\u1ebfp ch\u1ed3ng lên nhau trên m\u1eb7t \u0111\u1ea5t<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.title: Select the answer
childrens.explains: {"vn":"B. A man is loading boxes onto a cart. D\u1ecbch: B. M\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111\u00e0n \u00f4ng \u0111ang ch\u1ea5t th\u00f9ng l\u00ean xe \u0111\u1ea9y."}

questions.text_audio:
A. One of the women is writing on a notepad
B. One of the women is looking at some files
C. The women are sitting at their desks
D. The women are facing each other
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

A. M\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5 n\u1eef \u0111ang vi\u1ebft vào m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed1n s\u1ed5 tay<\/p>

B. M\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5 n\u1eef \u0111ang xem m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 h\u1ed3 s\u01a1<\/p>

C. Nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5 n\u1eef \u0111ang ng\u1ed3i t\u1ea1i bàn mình<\/p>

D. Nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5 n\u1eef \u0111ang \u1edf \u0111\u1ed1i di\u1ec7n v\u1edbi nhau<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.title: Select the answer
childrens.explains: {"vn":"B. One of the women is looking at some files. D\u1ecbch: M\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5 n\u1eef \u0111ang xem m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 h\u1ed3 s\u01a1."}

questions.text_audio:
A. Cars are parked in a garage
B. Plants are arranged on tables
C. There are umbrellas blocking a road
D. There are chairs set up in front of a building
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

A. Xe h\u01a1i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ed7 trong nhà xe<\/p>

B. Cây c\u1ed1i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp trên bàn<\/p>

C. Có nh\u1eefng chi\u1ebfc ô \u0111ang ch\u1eb7n m\u1ed9t con \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng<\/p>

D. Có nh\u1eefng cái gh\u1ebf \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1eb7t tr\u01b0\u1edbc m\u1ed9t tòa nhà<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.title: Select the answer
childrens.explains: {"vn":"D. There are chairs set up in front of a building. D\u1ecbch: C\u00f3 nh\u1eefng chi\u1ebfc gh\u1ebf \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1eb7t tr\u01b0\u1edbc t\u00f2a nh\u00e0."}

questions.text_audio:
A. Some travelers are seated in a waiting area
B. Some workers are setting up partitions
C. One of the women is handing out tickets
D. One of the men is approaching a counter
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

A. M\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 hành khách ng\u1ed3i trong khu v\u1ef1c ch\u1edd \u0111\u1ee3i<\/p>

B. M\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 nhân viên \u0111ang l\u1eafp các vách ng\u0103n<\/p>

C. M\u1ed9t trong s\u1ed1 nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5 n\u1eef \u0111ang phát vé<\/p>

D. M\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111àn ông \u0111ang ti\u1ebfn t\u1edbi qu\u1ea7y<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.title: Select the answer
childrens.explains: {"vn":"A. Some travelers are seated in a waiting area. D\u1ecbch: A. M\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 du kh\u00e1ch \u0111ang ng\u1ed3i \u1edf khu v\u1ef1c ch\u1edd."}

parts.name: Question - response
parts.title: In this part of the test, you will hear a question or statement spoken in English, followed by three responses, also spoken in English. The question or statement and the responses will be spoken just one time. They will not be printed in your test book, so you must listen carefully. You are to choose the best response to each question or statement.

intro.title:
You will hear:
Why are you late?
intro.answers: ["A. I hope I won't be","B. My car broke down","C. He alway is"]
intro.explains: The best response is choice B. "My car broke down". Therefore, you should choose B.

questions.text_audio:
Where did you leave the account files?
A. In your mailbox
B. To South America
C. No, I live nearby
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

B\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ec3 t\u1eadp tin tài kho\u1ea3n \u1edf \u0111âu?<\/p>

A. Trong hòm th\u01b0<\/p>

B. \u0110\u1ebfn Nam M\u1ef9<\/p>

C. Không, tôi s\u1ed1ng g\u1ea7n \u0111ó<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"B\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ec3 t\u1eadp tin t\u00e0i kho\u1ea3n \u1edf \u0111\u00e2u? A. Trong h\u00f2m th\u01b0"}

questions.text_audio:
Who should I call about the broken window?
A. The maintenance department
B. Try not to leave it open
C. Around nine o'clock
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Tôi nên g\u1ecdi cho ai v\u1ec1 cái c\u1eeda s\u1ed5 b\u1ecb v\u1ee1?<\/p>

A. B\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn b\u1ea3o trì<\/p>

B. Hãy c\u1ed1 \u0111\u1eebng \u0111\u1ec3 cho nó m\u1edf<\/p>

C. Kho\u1ea3ng 9 gi\u1edd<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"T\u00f4i n\u00ean g\u1ecdi cho ai v\u1ec1 c\u00e1i c\u1eeda s\u1ed5 b\u1ecb v\u1ee1? A. B\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn b\u1ea3o tr\u00ec"}

questions.text_audio:
You ordered more parts for the motor, right?
A. I promoted him
B. Thanks, it's a new model
C. Yes, last week
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Anh \u0111ã \u0111\u1eb7t thêm b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn cho \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u01a1 mô tô, ph\u1ea3i không?<\/p>

A. Tôi th\u0103ng ch\u1ee9c cho anh ta<\/p>

B. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n, nó là m\u1eabu mã m\u1edbi<\/p>

C. Vâng, vào tu\u1ea7n tr\u01b0\u1edbc<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Anh \u0111\u00e3 \u0111\u1eb7t th\u00eam b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn cho \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u01a1 m\u00f4 t\u00f4, ph\u1ea3i kh\u00f4ng? C. V\u00e2ng, v\u00e0o tu\u1ea7n tr\u01b0\u1edbc."}

questions.text_audio:

{"vn":"

Khi nào thì \u0111\u1ebfn h\u1ea1n thu ti\u1ec1n thuê?<\/p>

B. Tôi có m\u1ed9t cái<\/p>

C. C\u0103n h\u1ed9 m\u1edbi<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Khi n\u00e0o th\u00ec \u0111\u1ebfn h\u1ea1n thu ti\u1ec1n thu\u00ea? A. Xin h\u00e3y g\u1eedi ti\u1ec1n v\u00e0o th\u1ee9 s\u00e1u."}

questions.text_audio:
Why don't we submit the supply request?

questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Sao chúng ta không trình lên \u0111\u01a1n xin cung \u1ee9ng?<\/p>

C. \u0110úng v\u1eady<\/p>"}

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Sao ch\u00fang ta kh\u00f4ng tr\u00ecnh l\u00ean \u0111\u01a1n xin cung \u1ee9ng?  A. \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c, t\u00f4i s\u1ebd in n\u00f3 ra"}

questions.text_audio:
Won't you be at the panel discussion tomorrow?
A. The presentation schedule
B. The brown panels look nice
C. No, I'm leaving the conference tonight
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Anh s\u1ebd tham d\u1ef1 h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o vào ngày mai ch\u1ee9?<\/p>

A. L\u1ecbch thuy\u1ebft trình<\/p>

B. B\u1ea3ng màu nâu trông r\u1ea5t \u0111\u1eb9p<\/p>

C. Không, tôi s\u1ebd r\u1eddi kh\u1ecfi h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb vào t\u1ed1i nay<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Anh s\u1ebd tham d\u1ef1 h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o v\u00e0o ng\u00e0y mai ch\u1ee9? C. Kh\u00f4ng, t\u00f4i s\u1ebd r\u1eddi kh\u1ecfi h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb v\u00e0o t\u1ed1i nay."}

questions.text_audio:

questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

A. Kho\u1ea3ng m\u1ed9t ti\u1ebfng<\/p>

B. Vào tu\u1ea7n tr\u01b0\u1edbc<\/p>

C. T\u1edbi l\u1edbp h\u1ecdc kinh doanh<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Susan y\u00eau c\u1ea7u n\u00e2ng c\u1ea5p m\u00e1y t\u00ednh h\u1ed3i n\u00e0o? B. V\u00e0o tu\u1ea7n tr\u01b0\u1edbc"}

questions.text_audio:
Do you work in marketing or public policy?

B. I don't like the new policies

{"vn":"

A. Nó \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1edf ra cho công chúng<\/p>

B. Tôi không thích nh\u1eefng chính sách m\u1edbi<\/p>

C. Th\u1ef1c ra là không ph\u1ea3i cái nào c\u1ea3<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"B\u1ea1n l\u00e0m vi\u1ec7c trong l\u0129nh v\u1ef1c ti\u1ebfp th\u1ecb hay ch\u00ednh s\u00e1ch c\u00f4ng? C. Th\u1ef1c ra l\u00e0 kh\u00f4ng c\u00e1i n\u00e0o c\u1ea3"}

questions.text_audio:
Are you available for an interview next Tuesday?
A. Yes, I'd be happy to come in
B. A bit earlier next time
C. Sure, let's go over the weekend
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Anh có s\u1eb5n sàng ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n vào th\u1ee9 ba t\u1edbi không?<\/p>

A. Vâng, tôi s\u1ebd r\u1ea5t vui khi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ebfn<\/p>

B. S\u1edbm h\u01a1n l\u1ea7n t\u1edbi m\u1ed9t chút<\/p>

C. Ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn r\u1ed3i, hãy \u0111i vào cu\u1ed1i tu\u1ea7n v\u1eady<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Anh c\u00f3 s\u1eb5n s\u00e0ng ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n v\u00e0o th\u1ee9 ba t\u1edbi kh\u00f4ng?  A. V\u00e2ng, t\u00f4i s\u1ebd r\u1ea5t vui khi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ebfn."}

questions.text_audio:
How did you make this soup?
A. Quite a long time
B. Here's a copy of the recipe
C. For Saturday night
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

B\u1ea1n \u0111\u00e3 l\u00e0m m\u00f3n s\u00fap n\u00e0y nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf n\u00e0o?<\/p>

A. C\u0169ng kh\u00e1 l\u00e2u r\u1ed3i<\/p>

B. \u0110\u00e2y l\u00e0 b\u1ea3n ch\u00e9p l\u1ea1i c\u00f4ng th\u1ee9c<\/p>

C. Cho t\u1ed1i th\u1ee9 b\u1ea3y<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"B\u1ea1n \u0111\u00e3 l\u00e0m m\u00f3n s\u00fap n\u00e0y nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf n\u00e0o? \u0110\u00e2y l\u00e0 b\u1ea3n ch\u00e9p l\u1ea1i c\u00f4ng th\u1ee9c."}

questions.text_audio:
Wasn't the office furniture shipped last month?
A. The delivery's been delayed
B. Ms. Martinez does
C. A more modern design
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Không ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u1ed3 n\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a v\u0103n phòng \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c chuy\u1ec3n t\u1edbi vào tháng tr\u01b0\u1edbc r\u1ed3i sao?<\/p>

A. Vi\u1ec7c giao hàng \u0111ã b\u1ecb hoãn l\u1ea1i<\/p>

B. Là cô Martinez làm<\/p>

C. M\u1ed9t thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i h\u01a1n<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Kh\u00f4ng ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u1ed3 n\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a v\u0103n ph\u00f2ng \u0111\u00e3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c chuy\u1ec3n t\u1edbi v\u00e0o th\u00e1ng tr\u01b0\u1edbc r\u1ed3i sao?  A. Vi\u1ec7c giao h\u00e0ng \u0111\u00e3 b\u1ecb ho\u00e3n l\u1ea1i."}

questions.text_audio:
Do you have some paper clips I can use?
A. The paper comes in several colors
B. I found it very useful
C. How many do you need?
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Anh có cái k\u1eb9p gi\u1ea5y nào không?<\/p>

A. T\u1edd gi\u1ea5y có nhi\u1ec1u màu<\/p>

B. Tôi th\u1ea5y nó r\u1ea5t h\u1eefu ích<\/p>

C. Anh c\u1ea7n bao nhiêu cái?<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Anh c\u00f3 c\u00e1i k\u1eb9p gi\u1ea5y n\u00e0o kh\u00f4ng? C. Anh c\u1ea7n bao nhi\u00eau c\u00e1i?"}

questions.text_audio:
How do I change my password?
A. I don't have any more
B. You'd better ask Ms. Wang
C. Yes, you can log in now
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Làm cách nào \u0111\u1ec3 tôi \u0111\u1ed5i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1eadt kh\u1ea9u?<\/p>

A. Tôi không còn nó n\u1eefa r\u1ed3i<\/p>

B. T\u1ed1t nh\u1ea5t là anh nên h\u1ecfi cô Wang<\/p>

C. \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c, gi\u1edd anh có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u0103ng nh\u1eadp r\u1ed3i<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"L\u00e0m c\u00e1ch n\u00e0o \u0111\u1ec3 t\u00f4i \u0111\u1ed5i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1eadt kh\u1ea9u? B. T\u1ed1t nh\u1ea5t l\u00e0 anh n\u00ean h\u1ecfi c\u00f4 Wang."}

questions.text_audio:

B. I usually pack light
C. No, they're all fully booked
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Anh không th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1eb7t chuy\u1ebfn bay s\u1edbm cho chúng ta ph\u1ea3i không?<\/p>

A. Nó là m\u1ed9t thành ph\u1ed1 tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi<\/p>

B. Tôi th\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111óng hành lý nh\u1eb9<\/p>

C. Không, t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 \u0111\u1ec1u \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1eb7t kín h\u1ebft r\u1ed3i<\/p>"}
questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

childrens.explains: {"vn":"Anh kh\u00f4ng th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1eb7t chuy\u1ebfn bay s\u1edbm cho ch\u00fang ta ph\u1ea3i kh\u00f4ng? C. Kh\u00f4ng, t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 \u0111\u1ec1u \u0111\u00e3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1eb7t k\u00edn h\u1ebft r\u1ed3i."}

questions.text_audio:
Why is the door locked?
A. I'm sure security can open it
B. Six o'clock every day
C. It's right around the corner
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

T\u1ea1i sao c\u1eeda l\u1ea1i b\u1ecb khóa?<\/p>

parts.name: Short conversations
parts.title: You will hear some conversations between two people. You will be asked to answer three questions about what the speakers say in each conversation. Select the best response to each question and mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet. The conversations will not be printed in your test book and will be spoken only one time.

questions.text_audio:
M-Cn: Hi, Ms. Larson. Thanks for agreeing to review the budget report that I prepared. I wanted to make sure that I did it correctly since it's my first time.

W-Am: Yes, Jason, It looked very good overall. The only thing I'll need you to do is to add more details to the expenditures list. We like to have every office supply itemized.

M-Cn: Oh, OK, sure. I'll work on getting those details this afternoon. It would be helpful to see how it was done in the past. Is there an example of a report that I can look at?

W-Am: You should talk to Emiko-she can give you a copy of last month's report.

Dịch: M-Cn: Chào Cô Larson. Cảm ơn vì đã đồng ý xem lại báo cáo ngân sách mà tôi đã chuẩn bị. Tôi muốn chắc chắn rằng mình đã làm đúng vì đây là lần đầu tôi làm.

W-Am: Được rồi, Jason, toàn bộ đều nhìn rất tốt. Điều duy nhất tôi cần anh làm là thêm chi tiết vào danh sách chi tiêu. Chúng tôi muốn mỗi thiết bị văn phòng được ghi thành từng khoản.

M-Cn: Ồ, được rồi. Chiều nay tôi sẽ cải thiện những chi tiết đó. Sẽ rất là hữu ích khi biết nó được thực hiện như thế nào trong quá khứ. Có ví dụ nào về báo cáo đó mà tôi có thể xem qua không?

W-Am: Anh nên nói chuyện với Emiko - cô ấy có thể cho anh một bản sao của báo cáo tháng trước.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn: Chào Cô Larson. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì \u0111ã \u0111\u1ed3ng ý xem l\u1ea1i báo cáo ngân sách mà tôi \u0111ã chu\u1ea9n b\u1ecb. Tôi mu\u1ed1n ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn r\u1eb1ng mình \u0111ã làm \u0111úng vì \u0111ây là l\u1ea7n \u0111\u1ea7u tôi làm.<\/p>

W-Am: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i, Jason, toàn b\u1ed9 \u0111\u1ec1u nhìn r\u1ea5t t\u1ed1t. \u0110i\u1ec1u duy nh\u1ea5t tôi c\u1ea7n anh làm là thêm chi ti\u1ebft vào danh sách chi tiêu. Chúng tôi mu\u1ed1n m\u1ed7i thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb v\u0103n phòng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ghi thành t\u1eebng kho\u1ea3n.<\/p>

M-Cn: \u1ed2, \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i. Chi\u1ec1u nay tôi s\u1ebd c\u1ea3i thi\u1ec7n nh\u1eefng chi ti\u1ebft \u0111ó. S\u1ebd r\u1ea5t là h\u1eefu ích khi bi\u1ebft nó \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf nào trong quá kh\u1ee9. Có ví d\u1ee5 nào v\u1ec1 báo cáo \u0111ó mà tôi có th\u1ec3 xem qua không?<\/p>

W-Am: Anh nên nói chuy\u1ec7n v\u1edbi Emiko - cô \u1ea5y có th\u1ec3 cho anh m\u1ed9t b\u1ea3n sao c\u1ee7a báo cáo tháng tr\u01b0\u1edbc.<\/p"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Au: Ms. Batra, how does the stage look to you? Is the piano in the right place?

W-Am: The stage arrangement is fine. But can we make sure that there'll be enough background lighting? I want all the members of my band to be visible.

M-Au: Of course. But I'd rather do it when the rest of your band is here so I can be sure the lighting is right.

W-Am: OK. I'm meeting them for lunch and then we're coming back here to rehearse together this afternoon. We'll see you then.

Dịch: M-Au: Cô Batra, sân khấu trông như thế nào? Đàn piano để đúng vị trí chưa?

W-Am: Việc sắp đặt sân khấu thì ổn rồi. Nhưng chúng ta có thể đảm bảo rằng sẽ có đủ ánh sáng cho phía sau không? Tôi muốn tất cả các thành viên trong ban nhạc của mình được hiện rõ.

M-Au: Tất nhiên. Nhưng tôi muốn làm điều đó khi ban nhạc của cô ở đây để chắc chắn rằng có đủ ánh sáng.

W-Am: Được. Tôi sẽ gặp họ ăn trưa và sau đó chúng tôi sẽ quay lại đây tập luyện vào chiều nay. Hẹn gặp lại.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au: Cô Batra, sân kh\u1ea5u trông nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf nào? \u0110àn piano \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111úng v\u1ecb trí ch\u01b0a?<\/p>

W-Am: Vi\u1ec7c s\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t sân kh\u1ea5u thì \u1ed5n r\u1ed3i. Nh\u01b0ng chúng ta có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o r\u1eb1ng s\u1ebd có \u0111\u1ee7 ánh sáng cho phía sau không? Tôi mu\u1ed1n t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các thành viên trong ban nh\u1ea1c c\u1ee7a mình \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c hi\u1ec7n rõ.<\/p>

M-Au: T\u1ea5t nhiên. Nh\u01b0ng tôi mu\u1ed1n làm \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó khi ban nh\u1ea1c c\u1ee7a cô \u1edf \u0111ây \u0111\u1ec3 ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn r\u1eb1ng có \u0111\u1ee7 ánh sáng.<\/p>

W-Am: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c. Tôi s\u1ebd g\u1eb7p h\u1ecd \u0103n tr\u01b0a và sau \u0111ó chúng tôi s\u1ebd quay l\u1ea1i \u0111ây t\u1eadp luy\u1ec7n vào chi\u1ec1u nay. H\u1eb9n g\u1eb7p l\u1ea1i.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Br: Hi, Bob, I received your e-mail about the software training at two P.M. this Friday. But I have to meet with the marketing director of J. Alderman and Sons at that time.

M-Au: Oh, I'm sorry; I completely forgot that you had a client meeting. How long do you think it'll take?

W-Br: Probably thirty to forty-five minutes. I have to review a contract with him. Is there any way that you could start the training later in the day?

M-Au: Unfortunately, the rest of the team isn't free after three P.M ., but if it's OK with you, I can just e-mail you the training documents to look over on your own. Contact me next week if you have any questions.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: Chào Bob, tôi nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c e-mail c\u1ee7a anh v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec7c \u0111ào t\u1ea1o ph\u1ea7n m\u1ec1m lúc 2 gi\u1edd chi\u1ec1u th\u1ee9 sáu này. Nh\u01b0ng tôi ph\u1ea3i g\u1eb7p giám \u0111\u1ed1c marketing c\u1ee7a J. Alderman and Sons vào th\u1eddi \u0111i\u1ec3m \u0111ó.<\/p>

M-Au: \u1ed2, xin l\u1ed7i; Tôi hoàn toàn quên m\u1ea5t là cô \u0111ã có m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c h\u1eb9n v\u1edbi khách hàng. Cô ngh\u0129 s\u1ebd m\u1ea5t bao lâu m\u1edbi k\u1ebft thúc?<\/p>

W-Br: Có l\u1ebd là t\u1eeb 30 \u0111\u1ebfn 45 phút. Tôi ph\u1ea3i xem l\u1ea1i h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng v\u1edbi ông ta. Có cách nào \u0111\u1ec3 b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u bu\u1ed5i hu\u1ea5n luy\u1ec7n tr\u1ec5 h\u01a1n vào ngày này không?<\/p>

M-Au: Th\u1eadt không may, nh\u1eefng thành viên còn l\u1ea1i trong t\u1ed5 không r\u1ea3nh sau 3 gi\u1edd chi\u1ec1u ., nh\u01b0ng n\u1ebfu cô ch\u1ecbu thì tôi có th\u1ec3 g\u1eedi mail tài li\u1ec7u hu\u1ea5n luy\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ec3 cô xem qua. N\u1ebfu cô còn câu h\u1ecfi nào n\u1eefa thì hãy liên l\u1ea1c v\u1edbi tôi vào tu\u1ea7n t\u1edbi.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Br: OK, Mr. Patel. Did the doctor want you to make another appointment?

M-Cn: Yes, but I'll have to check my work calendar.

W-Br: You can now make appointments on our Web site if you have an account. Just log on and view available times online.

M-Cn: Great. How do I sign up for an account?

W-Br: Colin handles all registrations. Colin, can you help Mr. Patel set up a patient account on our Web site?

M-Au: Certainly. If you have a smartphone, we can do it now. Or 431 can give you a handout with instructions to set up your account later.

M-Cn: I'll set it up later.

M-Au: OK. Here's the handout. Please call with any questions.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i, anh Patel. Bác s\u0129 có mu\u1ed1n anh thu x\u1ebfp m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c h\u1eb9n khác không?<\/p>

M-Cn: Có, nh\u01b0ng tôi ph\u1ea3i ki\u1ec3m tra l\u1ecbch làm vi\u1ec7c c\u1ee7a mình.<\/p>

W-Br: Bây gi\u1edd anh có th\u1ec3 thu x\u1ebfp cu\u1ed9c h\u1eb9n trên trang web c\u1ee7a chúng tôi n\u1ebfu anh có tài kho\u1ea3n. Ch\u1ec9 c\u1ea7n \u0111\u0103ng nh\u1eadp và xem th\u1eddi gian có s\u1eb5n tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn.<\/p>

M-Cn: Tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi. Làm cách nào \u0111\u1ec3 tôi \u0111\u0103ng ký tài kho\u1ea3n?<\/p>

W-Br: Colin x\u1eed lý t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 vi\u1ec7c \u0111\u0103ng ký. Colin, anh có th\u1ec3 giúp anh Patel t\u1ea1o tài kho\u1ea3n b\u1ec7nh nhân trên trang web c\u1ee7a mình không?<\/p>

M-Au: Ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn r\u1ed3i. N\u1ebfu anh có \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i thông minh thì chúng ta có th\u1ec3 làm ngay bây gi\u1edd. Ho\u1eb7c 431 có th\u1ec3 cung c\u1ea5p cho anh m\u1ed9t b\u1ea3n thông tin v\u1edbi h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn cách thi\u1ebft l\u1eadp tài kho\u1ea3n sau v\u1eady.<\/p>

M-Cn: Tôi s\u1ebd t\u1ea1o tài kho\u1ea3n sau.<\/p>

M-Au: Vâng. \u0110ây là b\u1ea3n thông tin. Hãy g\u1ecdi khi có b\u1ea5t c\u1ee9 câu h\u1ecfi nào.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Cn: Mina, I was thinking about our travel plans for the industry conference we're going to in Boston. It's only two weeks away.

W-Am: Well, the three of us are all taking the same flight, so maybe we could ride together from the office to the airport. But, we'll be gone for several days, so the cost of parking would really add up.

M-Cn: True. You know, I think it's twenty dollars to take a taxi.

W-Am: That's a possibility. Let's ask Martin what he thinks.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn: Mina, tôi \u0111ang suy ngh\u0129 v\u1ec1 k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch du l\u1ecbch c\u1ee7a chúng ta cho h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb công nghi\u1ec7p \u1edf Boston. Ch\u1ec9 còn 2 tu\u1ea7n n\u1eefa thôi.<\/p>

W-Am: \u1eea, c\u1ea3 ba chúng ta \u0111\u1ec1u chung m\u1ed9t chuy\u1ebfn bay, nên có l\u1ebd chúng ta có th\u1ec3 \u0111i xe cùng nhau t\u1eeb v\u0103n phòng \u0111\u1ebfn sân bay. Nh\u01b0ng chúng ta s\u1ebd \u0111i trong vài ngày, vì v\u1eady chi phí \u0111\u1ed7 xe s\u1ebd t\u0103ng lên.<\/p>

M-Cn: C\u0169ng \u0111úng. Cô bi\u1ebft không, tôi ngh\u0129 là ch\u1ec9 t\u1ed1n 20 \u0111ô la \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111i taxi \u0111\u1ea5y.<\/p>

W-Am: \u0110ó là m\u1ed9t kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng. Hãy h\u1ecfi Martin xem anh ta ngh\u0129 nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf nào.<\/p>"}

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

Mina, I was thinking about our travel plans for the industry conference we're going to in Boston. It's only two weeks away.<\/p>","en":"

Well, the three of us are all taking the same flight, so maybe we could ride together from the office to the airport. But, we'll be gone for several days, so the cost of parking would really add up.<\/p>","en":"

Well, the three of us are all taking the same flight, so maybe we could ride together from the office to the airport. But, we'll be gone for several days, so the cost of parking would really add up.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Why does the man say, "it's twenty dollars to take a taxi" ?
childrens.answers: ["To make a suggestion","To express surprise","To complain about a price","To correct a mistake"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

T\u1ea1i sao ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111àn ông nói \"Ch\u1ec9 t\u1ed1n 20 \u0111ô la \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111i xe taxi\" ?<\/p>

A. \u0110\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0a ra m\u1ed9t g\u1ee3i ý<\/p>

B. \u0110\u1ec3 th\u1ec3 hi\u1ec7n s\u1ef1 b\u1ea5t ng\u1edd<\/p>

C. \u0110\u1ec3 khi\u1ebfu n\u1ea1i v\u1ec1 m\u1ed9t cái giá<\/p>

D. \u0110\u1ec3 s\u1eeda sai<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Ta có thông tin t\u1eeb ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5 n\u1eef: \"Well, the three of us are all taking the same flight, so maybe we could ride together from the office to the airport. But, we'll be gone for several days, so the cost of parking would really add up.\" nên \u0111i\u1ec1u mà ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111àn ông nói sau \u0111ó là \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0a ra g\u1ee3i ý v\u1ec1 giá \u0111i taxi. Câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi \u0111úng là (A).<\/p>","en":"

Why does the man say, \"it's twenty dollars to take a taxi\" ?<\/p>

A. To make a suggestion<\/p>

B. To express surprise<\/p>

C. To complain about a price<\/p>

D. To correct a mistake<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation:<\/p>

We have the information from the woman: \"Well, the three of us are all taking the same flight, so maybe we could ride together from the office to the airport. But, we'll be gone for several days, so the cost of parking would really add up.\" so what the man says afterward is meant to suggest the taxi cost. The correct answer is (A).<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Br: Sam, Mr. Kim just called about his order. He wants us to double the number of uniforms we're making for his hotel staff.

M-Au: That's great news! Has the deadline changed also?

W-Br: Actually, he still wants the order to be finished by the first of May.

M-Au: Hmm... that's a problem. There's no way we can make so many uniforms that quickly.

W-Br: How about we hire some part-time tailors to help with this extra work?

M-Au: Good idea. Can you get a list of names for me?
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: Sam, ông Kim v\u1eeba g\u1ecdi h\u1ecfi v\u1ec1 \u0111\u01a1n \u0111\u1eb7t hàng c\u1ee7a mình. Ông ta mu\u1ed1n chúng ta t\u0103ng g\u1ea5p \u0111ôi s\u1ed1 \u0111\u1ed3ng ph\u1ee5c mà chúng ta \u0111ang làm cho nhân viên khách s\u1ea1n c\u1ee7a ông \u1ea5y.<\/p>

M-Au: \u0110ó là qu\u1ea3 là tin t\u1ed1t! Th\u1eddi h\u1ea1n có thay \u0111\u1ed5i không?<\/p>

W-Br: Th\u1ef1c ra thì ông ta v\u1eabn mu\u1ed1n \u0111\u01a1n hàng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c hoàn thành vào ngày 1 tháng 5.<\/p>

M-Au: \u1eeam... \u0111ó là v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1. Chúng ta không th\u1ec3 nào làm nhi\u1ec1u \u0111\u1ed3ng ph\u1ee5c nhanh nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c.<\/p>

W-Br: Sao chúng ta thuê m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 th\u1ee3 may bán th\u1eddi gian \u0111\u1ec3 giúp v\u1edbi vi\u1ec7c làm thêm?<\/p>

M-Au: Ý hay \u0111ó. Cô có th\u1ec3 l\u1eadp danh sách nh\u1eefng cái tên cho tôi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c không?<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Cn: Hello, Ma'am. Thanks for shopping at Fresh made Supermarket. Do you have one of our loyalty cards?

W-Am: Yes, but I forgot to bring it today.

M-Cn: Unfortunately, I can't look up your phone number because our computer system isn't working, so I can't give you a discount today.

W-Am: OK. I understand. Oh, and I took this bottle of soy sauce from the shelf, but I don't want to buy it now.

M-Cn: That's fine, I know where it belongs. Now, will you be paying with cash or credit?
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn: Chào bà. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì \u0111ã mua s\u1eafm \u1edf siêu th\u1ecb Fresh made. Bà có th\u1ebb khách hàng thân thi\u1ebft c\u1ee7a chúng tôi không?<\/p>

W-Am: Vâng, nh\u01b0ng tôi quên mang nó vào hôm nay r\u1ed3i.<\/p>

M-Cn: Th\u1eadt không may, tôi không th\u1ec3 tìm s\u1ed1 \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a bà vì h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng máy tính c\u1ee7a chúng tôi không ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng nên tôi không th\u1ec3 gi\u1ea3m giá cho bà hôm nay \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c.<\/p>

W-Am: À. tôi hi\u1ec3u. Ô, tôi \u0111ã l\u1ea5y chai n\u01b0\u1edbc t\u01b0\u01a1ng này t\u1eeb k\u1ec7, nh\u01b0ng tôi không mu\u1ed1n mua nó bây gi\u1edd.<\/p>

M-Cn: Không sao, tôi bi\u1ebft nó n\u1eb1m \u1edf ch\u1ed7 nào. Bây gi\u1edd, bà s\u1ebd tr\u1ea3 b\u1eb1ng ti\u1ec1n m\u1eb7t hay tín d\u1ee5ng?<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What does the man imply when he says, "I know where it belongs"?
childrens.answers: ["He can tell the woman where to find an item","He will return an item to the correct location","A supervisor is not available","An item has been put on the wrong shelf"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111àn ông ám ch\u1ec9 \u0111i\u1ec1u gì khi anh ta nói \"Tôi bi\u1ebft nó n\u1eb1m \u1edf ch\u1ed7 nào\"?<\/p>

A. Anh ta có th\u1ec3 nói cho ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5 n\u1eef bi\u1ebft v\u1ecb trí c\u1ee7a m\u1ed9t m\u1eb7t hàng<\/p>

B. Anh ta s\u1ebd tr\u1ea3 l\u1ea1i m\u1ed9t món \u0111\u1ed3 \u1edf \u0111úng v\u1ecb trí<\/p>

C. Ng\u01b0\u1eddi qu\u1ea3n lý không có m\u1eb7t<\/p>

D. M\u1ed9t m\u1eb7t hàng b\u1ecb \u0111\u1eb7t \u1edf nh\u1ea7m k\u1ec7<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5 n\u1eef \u0111\u1ec1 c\u1eadp thông tin: \"OK. I understand. Oh, and I took this bottle of soy sauce from the shelf, but I don't want to buy it now.\" và câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi c\u1ee7a ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111àn ông ng\u1ee5 ý là anh ta bi\u1ebft v\u1ecb trí chính xác c\u1ee7a chai n\u01b0\u1edbc t\u01b0\u01a1ng nên ta ch\u1ecdn (B).<\/p>","en":"

What does the man imply when he says, \"I know where it belongs\"?<\/p>

A. He can tell the woman where to find an item<\/p>

B. He will return an item to the correct location<\/p>

C. A supervisor is not available<\/p>

D. An item has been put on the wrong shelf<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

The woman mentions this information: \"OK. I understand. Oh, and I took this bottle of soy sauce from the shelf, but I don't want to buy it now.\" and the man response implies that he knows where is the correct location of the soy sauce bottle so we choose (B).<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Br: Hello, Mr. Tanaka. Welcome to Bike Solutions Consulting. When I heard that a representative from the Burrville City Council wanted to meet, I was very excited.

M-Cn: Well, we know your company helps cities set up their bike-share programs, and Burrville wants to set one up, too.

W-Br: That's great news! What are your goals for your program?

M-Cn: We want to encourage our residents to exercise as well as to reduce car traffic. But it's going to be a challenge convincing people to participate.

W-Br: We'll handle that. When cities partner with us, part of the service we provide is an advertising campaign. We'll produce television and radio commercials that will encourage community members to use the bikes.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: Xin chào, ông Tanaka. Chào m\u1eebng \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1edbi Phòng t\u01b0 v\u1ea5n Bike Solutions. Khi tôi nghe nói m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ea1i di\u1ec7n c\u1ee7a h\u1ed9i \u0111\u1ed3ng thành ph\u1ed1 Burrville mu\u1ed1n \u0111\u1ebfn g\u1eb7p, tôi \u0111ã r\u1ea5t hào h\u1ee9ng.<\/p>

M-Cn: Vâng, chúng tôi bi\u1ebft công ty c\u1ee7a cô giúp các thành ph\u1ed1 thi\u1ebft l\u1eadp ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình chia s\u1ebb xe \u0111\u1ea1p c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd, và Burrville c\u0169ng mu\u1ed1n thi\u1ebft l\u1eadp m\u1ed9t ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình n\u1eefa.<\/p>

W-Br: \u0110ó là tin tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi! M\u1ee5c tiêu trong ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình c\u1ee7a anh là gì?<\/p>

M-Cn: Chúng tôi mu\u1ed1n khuy\u1ebfn khích c\u01b0 dân c\u1ee7a chúng tôi t\u1eadp th\u1ec3 d\u1ee5c c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 gi\u1ea3m l\u01b0u l\u01b0\u1ee3ng xe ô tô. Nh\u01b0ng nó s\u1ebd là m\u1ed9t thách th\u1ee9c \u0111\u1ec3 thuy\u1ebft ph\u1ee5c m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi tham gia.<\/p>

W-Br: Chúng tôi s\u1ebd gi\u1ea3i quy\u1ebft \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó. Khi nh\u1eefng thành ph\u1ed1 h\u1ee3p tác v\u1edbi chúng tôi, m\u1ed9t ph\u1ea7n c\u1ee7a d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 mà chúng tôi cung c\u1ea5p là chi\u1ebfn d\u1ecbch qu\u1ea3ng cáo. Chúng tôi s\u1ebd s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t qu\u1ea3ng cáo truy\u1ec1n hình và qu\u1ea3ng cáo vô tuy\u1ebfn giúp khuy\u1ebfn khích các thành viên c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng xe \u0111\u1ea1p.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Am: Thanks for stopping by, Vincent and Sanjay. The board of directors decided to purchase new security cameras, so someone from Menovar Technologies is coming tomorrow to deliver and install them.

M-Cn: It'll be good to have the latest equipment.

W-Am I agree. So Vincent, I'll need some of your Maintenance Department staff to help with the installation.

M-Cn: No problem. I'll send two people over to assist.

W-Am: Thanks.

M-Au: Will there be a training session for my security personnel to use the new camera system?

W-Am: Yes, Sanjay-Menovar Technologies suggested next Monday for the training. Is that OK for your team?

M-Au: Sure. How about ten o'clock?

W-Am: I'll e-mail Menovar right away to see if that works for them.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: Vincent và Sanjay, c\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì \u0111ã ghé qua. H\u1ed9i \u0111\u1ed3ng qu\u1ea3n tr\u1ecb \u0111ã quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh mua máy quay an ninh m\u1edbi, vì v\u1eady m\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi nào \u0111ó t\u1eeb Menovar Technologies s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ebfn vào ngày mai \u0111\u1ec3 giao và cài \u0111\u1eb7t chúng.<\/p>

M-Cn: S\u1ebd th\u1eadt t\u1ed1t khi có thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb tân ti\u1ebfn nh\u1ea5t.<\/p>

W-Am: Tôi \u0111\u1ed3ng ý. V\u1eady Vincent, tôi c\u1ea7n vài nhân viên trong phòng b\u1ea3o trì c\u1ee7a anh giúp vi\u1ec7c l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t.<\/p>

M-Cn: Không thành v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1. Tôi s\u1ebd c\u1eed hai ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111\u1ebfn giúp.<\/p>

W-Am: C\u1ea3m \u01a1n.<\/p>

M-Au: S\u1ebd có m\u1ed9t bu\u1ed5i hu\u1ea5n luy\u1ec7n s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng máy quay m\u1edbi cho nhân viên b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7 c\u1ee7a tôi ch\u1ee9?<\/p>

W-Am: Có, Sanjay - Menovar Technologies \u0111ã \u0111\u1ec1 ngh\u1ecb hu\u1ea5n luy\u1ec7n vào th\u1ee9 hai. T\u1ed5 c\u1ee7a anh có \u1ed5n v\u1edbi \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó không?<\/p>

M-Au: Ch\u1eafc r\u1ed3i. Kho\u1ea3ng 10 gi\u1edd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c không?<\/p>

W-Am: Tôi s\u1ebd g\u1eedi mail cho Menovar ngay \u0111\u1ec3 xem li\u1ec7u h\u1ecd có \u0111\u1ed3ng ý không.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Br: Thank you for agreeing to meet me for this interview. The readers of Auto World Magazine are eager to hear about your company's plans for a new car manufacturing plant.

M-Au: Yes, we'll be opening a facility in Indonesia soon. We currently have two plants in this country, so we're looking forward to expanding our production capabilities overseas.

W-Br: I see. And when will the first cars be built in that factory?

M-Au: That's a good question. Right now we're planning on December.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: C\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì \u0111ã \u0111\u1ed3ng ý g\u1eb7p tôi cho cu\u1ed9c ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n này. \u0110\u1ed9c gi\u1ea3 c\u1ee7a t\u1ea1p chí Auto World \u0111ang háo h\u1ee9c mu\u1ed1n nghe v\u1ec1 công x\u01b0\u1edfng s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t xe h\u01a1i m\u1edbi c\u1ee7a công ty ông.<\/p>

M - au: Vâng, chúng tôi s\u1ebd s\u1edbm m\u1edf m\u1ed9t c\u01a1 s\u1edf t\u1ea1i Indonesia. Chúng tôi hi\u1ec7n \u0111ang có hai công x\u01b0\u1edfng \u1edf \u0111\u1ea5t n\u01b0\u1edbc này, vì v\u1eady chúng tôi \u0111ang mong \u0111\u1ee3i m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a chúng tôi \u1edf n\u01b0\u1edbc ngoài.<\/p>

W-Br: Tôi hi\u1ec3u r\u1ed3i. Và khi nào thì nh\u1eefng chi\u1ebfc xe \u0111\u1ea7u tiên s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c l\u1eafp ráp trong nhà máy \u0111ó?<\/p>

M-Au: \u0110ó là m\u1ed9t câu h\u1ecfi hay. Bây gi\u1edd chúng tôi \u0111ang lên k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch vào tháng 12.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Br: Hi Raymond. It's Marta Dunmore. I'm calling about the wood options we discussed for my new kitchen floor.

M-Cn: Great! What did you decide?

W-Br: Well, I thought about choosing the dark pine. But then I took the samples you gave me into the kitchen and looked at them carefully. I decided the pattern on the oak will look best.

M-Cn: Oak is a great choice. It's harder than pine, so it's a good value. And the light color of the ash and maple don't really match your kitchen.

W-Br: OK, great. When can you start the installation?

M-Cn: I'll have to check my calendar when I get back to the office. Can I give you a call later?
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: Chào Raymond. \u0110ây là Marta Dunmore. Tôi g\u1ecdi h\u1ecfi v\u1ec1 các l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn g\u1ed7 mà chúng ta \u0111ã bàn v\u1ec1 sàn nhà b\u1ebfp m\u1edbi c\u1ee7a tôi.<\/p>

M-Cn: T\u1ed1t! Cô \u0111ã có quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh gì ch\u01b0a?<\/p>

W-Br: À, tôi \u0111ã ngh\u0129 v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec7c ch\u1ecdn g\u1ed7 thông \u0111en. Nh\u01b0ng sau \u0111ó tôi \u0111ã l\u1ea5y nh\u1eefng m\u1eabu mã mà anh \u0111\u01b0a cho tôi vào trong b\u1ebfp và xem chúng m\u1ed9t cách c\u1ea9n th\u1eadn. Tôi quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh ki\u1ec3u m\u1eabu trên g\u1ed7 s\u1ed3i nhìn s\u1ebd \u0111\u1eb9p nh\u1ea5t.<\/p>

M-Cn: G\u1ed7 s\u1ed3i là m\u1ed9t l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi. Nó c\u1ee9ng h\u01a1n g\u1ed7 thông, nên nó có giá tr\u1ecb cao. Và màu sáng c\u1ee7a tro và lá phông không h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi b\u1ebfp c\u1ee7a cô l\u1eafm.<\/p>

W-Br: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c, t\u1ed1t l\u1eafm. Khi nào anh có th\u1ec3 b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u vi\u1ec7c l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t?<\/p>

M-Cn: Tôi s\u1ebd ph\u1ea3i ki\u1ec3m tra l\u1ecbch c\u1ee7a mình khi tôi quay l\u1ea1i v\u0103n phòng. Tôi có th\u1ec3 g\u1ecdi cho cô sau \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c không?<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Au: I think the restaurant's going to get some nice publicity by being in the community festival this weekend. It'll be a great way to get customers interested in our food.

W-Am: It's definitely good advertising. Aren't you working the first day of the festival?

M-Au: Yeah-but if the event gets rained out and is held at a later date, I won't be able to work it because I'll be on holiday. Luckily, the weather this weekend should be warm and sunny, so I plan to be at the festival's opening day. How about you?

W-Am: I'm not scheduled to work for the restaurant, but I'll be there helping a friend. She has a small jewelry shop and needs a hand with her booth.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au: Tôi ngh\u0129 nhà hàng s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c qu\u1ea3ng bá t\u1ed1t b\u1eb1ng cách tham gia l\u1ec5 h\u1ed9i c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng vào cu\u1ed1i tu\u1ea7n này. \u0110ó s\u1ebd là m\u1ed9t cách tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi \u0111\u1ec3 khách hàng quan tâm \u0111\u1ebfn món \u0103n c\u1ee7a chúng ta.<\/p>

W-Am: \u0110ó ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn là m\u1ed9t cách qu\u1ea3ng cáo t\u1ed1t. Anh không làm vi\u1ec7c vào ngày \u0111\u1ea7u tiên c\u1ee7a l\u1ec5 h\u1ed9i sao?<\/p>

M-Au: \u1eea - nh\u01b0ng n\u1ebfu t\u1ea1i s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n x\u1ea3y ra m\u01b0a và \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c vào ngày hôm sau, tôi s\u1ebd không th\u1ec3 làm vi\u1ec7c \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c vì tôi s\u1ebd \u0111i ngh\u1ec9 mát. May m\u1eafn thay, th\u1eddi ti\u1ebft cu\u1ed1i tu\u1ea7n này s\u1ebd \u1ea5m áp và \u0111\u1ea7y n\u1eafng, nên tôi \u0111\u1ecbnh \u0111\u1ebfn vào ngày khai m\u1ea1c c\u1ee7a l\u1ec5 h\u1ed9i. Còn cô thì sao?<\/p>

W-Am: Tôi không có l\u1ecbch làm vi\u1ec7c cho nhà hàng, nh\u01b0ng tôi s\u1ebd \u1edf \u0111ó \u0111\u1ec3 giúp m\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi b\u1ea1n. Cô \u1ea5y có m\u1ed9t c\u1eeda hàng trang s\u1ee9c nh\u1ecf và c\u1ea7n ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5 giúp qu\u1ea7y c\u1ee7a mình.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Look at the graphic. When will the man work at the festival?
childrens.answers: ["On November 5","On November 6","On November 12","On November 13"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Nhìn vào hình kia. Khi nào ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111àn ông làm vi\u1ec7c \u1edf l\u1ec5 h\u1ed9i?<\/p>

A. Vào Ngày 5 Tháng 11<\/p>

B. Vào Ngày 6 Tháng 11<\/p>

C. Vào Ngày 12 Tháng 11<\/p>

D. Vào Ngày 13 Tháng 11<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Ta có thông tin:<\/p>

\"It's definitely good advertising. Aren't you working the first day of the festival?<\/p>

Yeah-but if the event gets rained out and is held at a later date, I won't be able to work it because I'll be on holiday. Luckily, the weather this weekend should be warm and sunny, so I plan to be at the festival's opening day. How about you?\"<\/p>

Và d\u1ef1a vào hình, ta có ngày 5 và 6 tháng 11 và ngày m\u01b0a là ngày 12 và 13 tháng 11 nên ta s\u1ebd xem ngày 5 tháng 11 là ngày \u0111\u1ea7u tiên c\u1ee7a l\u1ec5 h\u1ed9i và c\u0169ng là ngày làm vi\u1ec7c c\u1ee7a ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111àn ông. (A) là câu \u0111úng.<\/p>","en":"

Look at the graphic. When will the man work at the festival?<\/p>

A. On November 5<\/p>

B. On November 6<\/p>

C. On November 12<\/p>

D. On November 13<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

We have the information:<\/p>

\"It's definitely good advertising. Aren't you working the first day of the festival?<\/p>

Yeah-but if the event gets rained out and is held at a later date, I won't be able to work it because I'll be on holiday. Luckily, the weather this weekend should be warm and sunny, so I plan to be at the festival's opening day. How about you?\"<\/p>

And based on the graphic, we see November 5 and 6 and the rain dates at November 12 and 13 so we will assume November 5 is the first day of the festival which will be the day the man work. (A) is correct.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Cn: Welcome to the Natural History Museum. Can I help you?

W-Br: Hi I'm trying to find the special Fossils exhibit I saw advertised on TV. Can you tell me how to get to it?

M-Cn: Sure. We're here in the Main Hall. That's the Bird Hall over there. The fossils are just in the next room, on the other side of Bird Hall. It's a large well-lit space that we often use for special exhibits. That's where you want to go.

W-Br: Thanks. Oh-and is my ticket good for special exhibits?

M-Cn: Yes. Everything is included with regular admission at our museum.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn: Chào m\u1eebng \u0111\u1ebfn B\u1ea3o tàng L\u1ecbch s\u1eed T\u1ef1 nhiên. Tôi có th\u1ec3 giúp gì cho cô?<\/p>

W-Br: Xin chào, tôi \u0111ang c\u1ed1 tìm tri\u1ec3n lãm hóa th\u1ea1ch \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t mà tôi th\u1ea5y qu\u1ea3ng cáo trên truy\u1ec1n hình. Anh có th\u1ec3 cho tôi bi\u1ebft cách tìm chúng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c không?<\/p>

M-Cn: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c thôi. Chúng ta \u0111ang \u1edf s\u1ea3nh chính. \u0110ó là s\u1ea3nh Chim chóc \u1edf \u0111\u1eb1ng kia. Hóa th\u1ea1ch là \u1edf phòng k\u1ebf bên, \u1edf phía bên kia c\u1ee7a s\u1ea3nh Chim chóc. \u0110ó là m\u1ed9t kho\u1ea3ng tr\u1ed1ng l\u1edbn sáng s\u1ee7a mà chúng tôi th\u01b0\u1eddng s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng cho nh\u1eefng v\u1eadt tr\u01b0ng bày \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t. \u0110ó là n\u01a1i mà cô mu\u1ed1n t\u1edbi.<\/p>

W-Br: C\u1ea3m \u01a1n. À - và vé c\u1ee7a tôi có phù h\u1ee3p cho tri\u1ec3n lãm \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t không?<\/p>

M-Cn: Vâng. M\u1ecdi th\u1ee9 \u0111\u1ec1u \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c tính cùng v\u1edbi phí th\u01b0\u1eddng t\u1ea1i b\u1ea3o tàng c\u1ee7a chúng tôi.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Why does the woman talk to the man?

childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

T\u1ea1i sao ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5 n\u1eef l\u1ea1i nói chuy\u1ec7n v\u1edbi ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111àn ông?<\/p>

A. \u0110\u1ec3 mua vé<\/p>

B. \u0110\u1ec3 \u0111\u0103ng ký tham quan<\/p>

Hi I'm trying to find the special Fossils exhibit I saw advertised on TV. Can you tell me how to get to it?<\/p>","en":"

childrens.title: Look at the graphic. Where does the man tell the woman to go?
childrens.answers: ["To the Mammal Hall","To the Bird Hall","To the Main Hall","To the Cafeteria"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Nhìn vào s\u01a1 \u0111\u1ed3 kia. Ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111àn ông b\u1ea3o ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ee5 n\u1eef \u0111i \u0111âu?<\/p>

A. \u0110\u1ebfn phòng \u0110\u1ed9ng v\u1eadt có vú<\/p>

B. \u0110\u1ebfn phòng Chim chóc<\/p>

C. \u0110\u1ebfn s\u1ea3nh chính<\/p>

D. \u0110\u1ebfn quán \u0103n<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

Sure. We're here in the Main Hall. That's the Bird Hall over there. The fossils are just in the next room, on the other side of Bird Hall. It's a large well-lit space that we often use for special exhibits. That's where you want to go.<\/p>","en":"

Look at the graphic. Where does the man tell the woman to go?<\/p>

A. To the Mammal Hall<\/p>

B. To the Bird Hall<\/p>

D. To the Cafeteria<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

Sure. We're here in the Main Hall. That's the Bird Hall over there. The fossils are just in the next room, on the other side of Bird Hall. It's a large well-lit space that we often use for special exhibits. That's where you want to go.<\/p>"}

parts.name: Short talks
parts.title: You will hear some talks given by a single speaker. You will be asked to answer three questions about what the speaker says in each talk. Select the best response to each question and mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet. The talks will not be printed in your test book and will be spoken only one time.

questions.text_audio: M-Cn: Attention, shoppers! Today is the first day of our spring sales event. This is being held on the first floor. AII art supplies are now on sale, starting from as little as one dollar. We've got great deals on brushes, canvases, paint, and more! Also, from now until August thirtieth, we're accepting submissions for our summer art contest! This is a wonderful opportunity for aspiring artists to get their work shown. Please visit the information desk for details. Thank you for shopping at Baxter's Art Supply Store.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"\u200b

M-Cn: Ng\u01b0\u1eddi mua hàng, xin chú ý! Hôm nay là ngày \u0111\u1ea7u tiên c\u1ee7a s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n bán hàng mùa xuân. Nó \u0111ang di\u1ec5n ra \u1edf t\u1ea7ng 1. T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các d\u1ee5ng c\u1ee5 h\u1ed9i h\u1ecda hi\u1ec7n \u0111ang \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c bán, b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u t\u1eeb m\u1ed9t \u0111ô la. Chúng tôi có nh\u1eefng cái giá t\u1ed1t cho c\u1ecd, s\u01a1n d\u1ea7u, s\u01a1n th\u01b0\u1eddng, và nhi\u1ec1u h\u01a1n n\u1eefa! Ngoài ra, t\u1eeb gi\u1edd \u0111\u1ebfn ngày 30 tháng 8, chúng tôi s\u1ebd ch\u1ea5p nh\u1eadn bài thi cho cu\u1ed9c thi ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt mùa hè! \u0110ây là m\u1ed9t c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi \u0111\u1ec3 các h\u1ecda s\u0129 có khát v\u1ecdng mu\u1ed1n tác ph\u1ea9m c\u1ee7a mình \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c tr\u01b0ng bày. Xin vui lòng \u0111\u1ebfn th\u0103m qu\u1ea7y h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn \u0111\u1ec3 bi\u1ebft thêm chi ti\u1ebft. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì \u0111ã mua s\u1eafm t\u1ea1i c\u1eeda hàng V\u1eadt d\u1ee5ng H\u1ed9i h\u1ecda Baxter.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: W-Am: Hi, Armand, this is Linda from the management office of Redfox Apartments. I received your message about your dishwasher not working properly, so I've called a repair person to come and fix it on Monday morning at eleven o'clock. Since you'll probably be at work at that time, could you please stop by the management office before then? You'll need to leave a letter giving permission for the repair person to enter in your absence.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: Chào Armand, \u0111ây là Linda t\u1eeb v\u0103n phòng qu\u1ea3n lý c\u1ee7a Chung c\u01b0 Redfox. Tôi nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c tin nh\u1eafn c\u1ee7a anh v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec7c máy r\u1eeda chén không ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng \u0111úng cách, nên tôi \u0111ã g\u1ecdi m\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi s\u1eeda ch\u1eefa \u0111\u1ebfn và s\u1eeda nó vào sáng th\u1ee9 hai lúc 11 gi\u1edd. Vì anh s\u1ebd làm vi\u1ec7c khi \u0111ó nên anh có th\u1ec3 ghé qua v\u0103n phòng qu\u1ea3n lý tr\u01b0\u1edbc lúc \u0111ó \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c không? Anh s\u1ebd c\u1ea7n ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u1ec3 l\u1ea1i m\u1ed9t lá th\u01b0 cho phép ng\u01b0\u1eddi s\u1eeda ch\u1eefa \u0111i vào trong lúc anh v\u1eafng m\u1eb7t.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: W-Br: This is Maria Santos, your technology reporter for RMT News, reporting live this week from the Global Technologies Trade Show. Throughout the week, I' ll be showing you some of the latest products on display here. Right now I have in my hand the newest mobile phone from Helios Wireless - the Helios Ten. What 's really unique about this phone is its revolutionary screen. Helios has developed a glare-proof material for the screen that's easy to read outdoors even on the sunnies during the days. I've tried it and it works! If you're coming to the trade show this week, be sure to check out this product at the Helios booth in aisle six.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: \u0110ây là Maria Santos, phóng viên công ngh\u1ec7 c\u1ee7a RMT News, t\u01b0\u1eddng thu\u1eadt tr\u1ef1c ti\u1ebfp tu\u1ea7n này t\u1eeb H\u1ed9i ch\u1ee3 Th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i Công ngh\u1ec7 Toàn c\u1ea7u. Trong su\u1ed1t tu\u1ea7n này, tôi s\u1ebd cho b\u1ea1n xem m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m m\u1edbi nh\u1ea5t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c tr\u01b0ng bày \u1edf \u0111ây. Ngay bây gi\u1edd tôi có trong tay chi\u1ebfc \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i di \u0111\u1ed9ng m\u1edbi nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a Helios Wireless - Helios Ten. \u0110i\u1ec1u th\u1ef1c s\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ed9c \u0111áo v\u1ec1 chi\u1ebfc \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i này là chi\u1ebfc màn hình \u0111\u1ea7y tính cách m\u1ea1ng c\u1ee7a nó. Helios \u0111ã phát tri\u1ec3n m\u1ed9t v\u1eadt li\u1ec7u có th\u1ec3 ch\u1ed1ng chói cho màn hình giúp d\u1ec5 \u0111\u1ecdc \u1edf ngoài tr\u1eddi và ngay c\u1ea3 khi tr\u1eddi n\u1eafng trong ngày. Tôi \u0111ã th\u1eed và th\u1ea5y nó r\u1ea5t hi\u1ec7u nghi\u1ec7m! N\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ebfn h\u1ed9i ch\u01a1 th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i trong tu\u1ea7n này, hãy nh\u1edb xem qua s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m này t\u1ea1i qu\u1ea7y c\u1ee7a Helios \u1edf dãy s\u1ed1 6.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: M-Au: Hi, everyone. Thanks for coming to this last-minute meeting. Remember the large order of glassware we shipped to the client in California? It's been a week. So, I called the shipping company this morning and apparently we put the wrong address on the labels. They've located the boxes and are reshipping them immediately to the correct address. But since we could have lost one of our biggest clients over this mistake, I want to make sure this never happens again. Masaki, I'd like you to go through our address list and double-check all of our clients' addresses.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au: Chào m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì \u0111ã \u0111\u1ebfn cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp vào phút chót này. Có nh\u1edb món hàng \u0111\u1ed3 th\u1ee7y tinh l\u1edbn chúng ta g\u1eedi \u0111\u1ebfn khách hàng \u1edf California không? \u0110ã m\u1ed9t tu\u1ea7n r\u1ed3i. Tôi \u0111ã g\u1ecdi cho công ty v\u1eadn t\u1ea3i sáng nay và có v\u1ebb nh\u01b0 chúng ta \u0111ã \u0111\u1eb7t nh\u1ea7m \u0111\u1ecba ch\u1ec9 trên nhãn hi\u1ec7u. H\u1ecd \u0111ã xác \u0111\u1ecbnh \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c v\u1ecb trí c\u1ee7a thùng hàng và \u0111ã chuy\u1ec3n ti\u1ebfp ngay l\u1eadp t\u1ee9c \u0111\u1ebfn \u0111úng \u0111\u1ecba ch\u1ec9. Nh\u01b0ng vì chúng ta \u0111ã có th\u1ec3 m\u1ea5t \u0111i m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng khách hàng l\u1edbn nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a mình, tôi mu\u1ed1n \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o \u0111i\u1ec1u này không bao gi\u1edd x\u1ea3y ra l\u1ea7n n\u1eefa. Masaki, tôi mu\u1ed1n anh xem qua danh sách \u0111\u1ecba ch\u1ec9 và ki\u1ec3m tra t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 \u0111\u1ecba ch\u1ec9 khách hàng c\u1ee7a chúng ta.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Why does the speaker say, "It's been a week"?
childrens.answers: ["To express concern about a delay","To praise a team's performance","To remind employees about a rule","To agree with a business strategy"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

T\u1ea1i sao ng\u01b0\u1eddi nói l\u1ea1i nói \"\u0110ã m\u1ed9t tu\u1ea7n r\u1ed3i\"?<\/p>

A. Bày t\u1ecf s\u1ef1 lo l\u1eafng v\u1ec1 m\u1ed9t s\u1ef1 ch\u1eadm tr\u1ec5<\/p>

B. Ca ng\u1ee3i thành tích c\u1ee7a t\u1ed5<\/p>

C. Nh\u1eafc nh\u1edf nhân viên v\u1ec1 m\u1ed9t quy t\u1eafc<\/p>

D. \u0110\u1ed3ng ý v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t chi\u1ebfn l\u01b0\u1ee3c kinh doanh<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Vì ki\u1ec7n hàng th\u1ee7y tin b\u1ecb g\u1eedi sai \u0111\u1ecba ch\u1ec9, vi\u1ec7c giao hàng t\u1edbi khách hàng \u0111úng c\u0169ng b\u1ecb trì hoãn trong m\u1ed9t tu\u1ea7n. Ng\u01b0\u1eddi nói mu\u1ed1n nh\u1ea5n m\u1ea1nh v\u1ec1 th\u1eddi gian nên (A) là câu \u0111úng.<\/p>","en":"

Why does the speaker say, \"It's been a week\"?<\/p>

A. To express concern about a delay<\/p>

B. To praise a team's performance<\/p>

C. To remind employees about a rule<\/p>

D. To agree with a business strategy<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

Because the order of glassware has been shipped to the wrong address, the shipping to the right customer has also been delayed for a week. The speaker wants to emphasize the amount of time so (A) is correct.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Am: Hi, it's Soon-Hee from Payroll. I'm looking over some paperwork for your new employee, um... a Mr. Kyle Ellis. He didn't fill out one of the tax forms he received at yesterday's new-hire orientation. I can't finish entering him
into our system until I have that information. It's important we take care of this today, so he can get paid on time. Can you send Mr. Ellis to my office as soon as possible? I realize this may interrupt his training. This form is only one page, though. Um... thanks.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: Xin chào, \u0111ây là Soon-Hee bên phòng Biên Ch\u1ebf. Tôi \u0111ang xem qua m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 gi\u1ea5y t\u1edd v\u1ec1 nhân viên m\u1edbi c\u1ee7a anh, à.. anh Kyle Ellis. Anh ta v\u1eabn ch\u01b0a \u0111i\u1ec1n vào m\u1ed9t m\u1eabu thu\u1ebf mà anh ta nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u1edf bu\u1ed5i \u0111\u1ecbnh h\u01b0\u1edbng nhân viên m\u1edbi ngày hôm qua. Tôi không th\u1ec3 nh\u1eadp hoàn t\u1ea5t d\u1eef li\u1ec7u c\u1ee7a anh \u1ea5y vào h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng cho t\u1edbi khi tôi có \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thông tin kia. Chúng ta nên gi\u1ea3i quy\u1ebft vi\u1ec7c này trong ngày hôm nay vì nó r\u1ea5t quan tr\u1ecdng \u0111\u1ec3 anh ta có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c tr\u1ea3 l\u01b0\u01a1ng \u0111úng h\u1ea1n. Anh có th\u1ec3 kêu anh Ellis \u0111\u1ebfn v\u0103n phòng tôi càng s\u1edbm càng t\u1ed1t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c không? Tôi bi\u1ebft làm v\u1eady s\u1ebd làm gián \u0111o\u1ea1n vi\u1ec7c hu\u1ea5n luy\u1ec7n c\u1ee7a anh \u1ea5y. M\u1eabu \u0111\u01a1n này ch\u1ec9 có m\u1ed9t trang thôi. \u1eeam, c\u1ea3m \u01a1n.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What does the speaker mean when she says, "This form is only one page, though"?
childrens.answers: ["A policy has been changed","A task should not take long","The wrong document was given out","Some instructions are unclear"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

What does the speaker mean when she says, \"This form is only one page, though\"?<\/p>

A. A policy has been changed<\/p>

B. A task should not take long<\/p>

C. The wrong document was given out<\/p>

D. Some instructions are unclear<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

We have the information: \"It's important we take care of this today, so he can get paid on time. Can you send Mr. Ellis to my office as soon as possible? I realize this may interrupt his training.\". This means she knows that the staff member is busy with training so she encourages him to finish this task first as it is not time-consuming. (B) is the correct answer.<\/p>","en":"

Ý c\u1ee7a ng\u01b0\u1eddi nói là nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf nào khi cô ta nói \"M\u1eabu \u0111\u01a1n này ch\u1ec9 có m\u1ed9t trang thôi\"?<\/p>

A. M\u1ed9t chính sách \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thay \u0111\u1ed5i<\/p>

B. M\u1ed9t công vi\u1ec7c s\u1ebd không m\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u th\u1eddi gian<\/p>

C. Phát sai tài li\u1ec7u<\/p>

D. M\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn ch\u01b0a rõ ràng<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Ta có thông tin: \"It's important we take care of this today, so he can get paid on time. Can you send Mr. Ellis to my office as soon as possible? I realize this may interrupt his training.\" t\u1ee9c là ng\u01b0\u1eddi nói bi\u1ebft nhân viên kia \u0111ang b\u1eadn vi\u1ec7c khác nên cô nói nh\u1eb1m khuy\u1ebfn khích anh ta hoàn thành vi\u1ec7c này tr\u01b0\u1edbc do không m\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u th\u1eddi gian. (B) là câu \u0111úng.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Cn: During this special tour of Longmark Batteries' manufacturing plant, I'll show you exactly how our scientists and engineers develop our Longmark Batteries, as well as how our production team manufactures the final products.
Longmark has become one of the leading companies in the energy industry, and we strive to create innovative and cutting-edge products. At the end of the tour, you'll have the opportunity to hear from Laura Shen, one of our leading scientists here at Longmark. Dr. Shen will discuss some of our newest research and products. Please note that photography is not allowed during the tour as it is distracting to our workers. Now, follow me!
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn: Trong chuy\u1ebfn tham quan \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t này c\u1ee7a nhà máy s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t Pin Longmark, tôi s\u1ebd cho b\u1ea1n th\u1ea5y chính xác cách mà các nhà khoa h\u1ecdc và k\u1ef9 s\u01b0 c\u1ee7a chúng tôi phát tri\u1ec3n pin Longmark, c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 cách nhóm s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t ch\u1ebf t\u1ea1o ra s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m cu\u1ed1i cùng. Longmark \u0111ã tr\u1edf thành m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng công ty hàng \u0111\u1ea7u trong ngành n\u0103ng l\u01b0\u1ee3ng, và chúng tôi c\u1ed1 g\u1eafng t\u1ea1o ra các s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m cách tân và tiên ti\u1ebfn. Vào cu\u1ed1i bu\u1ed5i tham quan, các b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd có c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i nghe t\u1eeb Laura Shen, m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng nhà khoa h\u1ecdc hàng \u0111\u1ea7u t\u1ea1i Longmark. Ti\u1ebfn s\u0129 Shen s\u1ebd th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn v\u1ec1 m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 nghiên c\u1ee9u và các s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m m\u1edbi nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. Xin l\u01b0u ý r\u1eb1ng không \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c phép ch\u1ee5p \u1ea3nh trong lúc tham quan vì nó s\u1ebd làm cho nhân viên c\u1ee7a chúng tôi b\u1ecb sao nhãng. Bây gi\u1edd thì hãy \u0111i theo tôi!<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: M-Au: Hello, everyone. Thanks again for attending this screening of my film documentary, Cultural Cuisines. I apologize again for starting a little late - the projector wasn't working properly. Before I show the film, I'd like to tell you a bit about it. A few years ago I traveled to Bolivia and fell in love with its food and its food culture. In the movie, a group of people from a small Bolivian village show you how problems can be resolved while everyone's enjoying a delicious meal. At two hours long, it is a long film... but I'll be answering questions when it's over.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au: Xin chào m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n m\u1ed9t l\u1ea7n n\u1eefa vì \u0111ã d\u1ef1 bu\u1ed5i công chi\u1ebfu phim tài li\u1ec7u c\u1ee7a tôi, V\u0103n hóa \u1ea8m th\u1ef1c. Tôi xin l\u1ed7i m\u1ed9t l\u1ea7n n\u1eefa vì m\u1edf màn tr\u1ec5 m\u1ed9t chút - do máy chi\u1ebfu b\u1ecb tr\u1ee5c tr\u1eb7c. Tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi tôi chi\u1ebfu b\u1ed9 phim, tôi mu\u1ed1n nói m\u1ed9t chút v\u1ec1 nó. Vài n\u0103m tr\u01b0\u1edbc tôi \u0111ã du l\u1ecbch \u0111\u1ebfn Bolivia và yêu món \u0103n cùng v\u0103n hóa \u1ea9m th\u1ef1c c\u1ee7a qu\u1ed1c gia \u1ea5y. Trong b\u1ed9 phim, m\u1ed9t nhóm ng\u01b0\u1eddi t\u1eeb m\u1ed9t ngôi làng nh\u1ecf \u1edf Bolivia s\u1ebd cho b\u1ea1n xem nh\u1eefng v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c gi\u1ea3i quy\u1ebft trong lúc m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111ang th\u01b0\u1edfng th\u1ee9c m\u1ed9t b\u1eefa \u0103n ngon. V\u1edbi th\u1eddi gian hai ti\u1ebfng, nó là m\u1ed9t b\u1ed9 phim dài... nh\u01b0ng tôi s\u1ebd tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi các câu h\u1ecfi m\u1ed9t khi nó k\u1ebft thúc.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: W-Br: Good morning, team. Congratulations on creating such a successful marketing campaign for our Heritage Mill cookies. We've already seen a dramatic increase in this product's sales since the launch of the television commercial, so I'd like you to expand this marketing campaign to our other products as well. According to a recent survey, our customers really liked the images of the families eating together that they saw in our commercials. So let's keep this concept in mind as we think of ideas for our other products. We'll discuss those ideas at our meeting next week.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: Chào bu\u1ed5i sáng c\u1ea3 \u0111\u1ed9i. Chúc m\u1eebng vì \u0111ã t\u1ea1o ra m\u1ed9t chi\u1ebfn d\u1ecbch ti\u1ebfp th\u1ecb thành công nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf cho bánh quy Heritage Mill c\u1ee7a chúng ta. Chúng ta \u0111ã th\u1ea5y m\u1ed9t s\u1ef1 gia t\u0103ng \u0111áng k\u1ec3 c\u1ee7a s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m này k\u1ec3 t\u1eeb khi ra m\u1eaft qu\u1ea3ng cáo truy\u1ec1n hình, nên tôi mu\u1ed1n các b\u1ea1n m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng chi\u1ebfn d\u1ecbch ti\u1ebfp th\u1ecb này sang các s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m khác. Theo m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c kh\u1ea3o sát g\u1ea7n \u0111ây, khách hàng c\u1ee7a chúng ta th\u1ef1c s\u1ef1 thích hình \u1ea3nh c\u1ee7a nh\u1eefng gia \u0111ình \u0111ang \u0103n cùng nhau mà h\u1ecd th\u1ea5y trong qu\u1ea3ng cáo c\u1ee7a chúng ta. V\u1eady hãy c\u1ee9 gi\u1eef ý t\u01b0\u1edfng này trong \u0111\u1ea7u khi chúng ta suy ngh\u0129 v\u1ec1 nh\u1eefng ý t\u01b0\u1edfng cho các s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m khác. Chúng ta s\u1ebd th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn nh\u1eefng ý t\u01b0\u1edfng \u0111ó t\u1ea1i bu\u1ed5i h\u1ecdp vào tu\u1ea7n t\u1edbi.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: M-Au: Attention all passengers on Flight WA15. Due to inclement weather, this flight has been canceled. We're very sorry for the inconvenience. In order to assist you in making alternative travel arrangements, we'll be calling passengers up to the counter according to your boarding zone numbers. Please take out your boarding passes and look at the zone number you have been assigned. Approach the counter only when we call the group with your zone number. In just a few moments, we will begin unloading your luggage. Please listen for a separate announcement about where to retrieve your bags. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au: T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các hành khách trên chuy\u1ebfn bay WA15 chú ý. Do th\u1eddi ti\u1ebft kh\u1eafc nghi\u1ec7t, chuy\u1ebfn bay này \u0111ã b\u1ecb h\u1ee7y. Chúng tôi r\u1ea5t xin l\u1ed7i vì s\u1ef1 b\u1ea5t ti\u1ec7n này. \u0110\u1ec3 h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3 các b\u1ea1n th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp chuy\u1ebfn bay thay th\u1ebf, chúng tôi s\u1ebd g\u1ecdi hành khách \u0111\u1ebfn qu\u1ea7y d\u1ef1a theo mã s\u1ed1 vùng lên tàu c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n. Vui lòng l\u1ea5y ra th\u1ebb lên máy bay và xem mã s\u1ed1 khu v\u1ef1c mà b\u1ea1n \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c x\u1ebfp. Ch\u1ec9 l\u1ea1i qu\u1ea7y khi chúng tôi g\u1ecdi nhóm có mã s\u1ed1 khu v\u1ef1c c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n. Ch\u1ec9 vài phút thôi, chúng tôi s\u1ebd b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u d\u1ee1 hành lý c\u1ee7a các b\u1ea1n. Xin hãy nghe m\u1ed9t thông báo riêng v\u1ec1 n\u01a1i l\u1ea5y hành lý c\u1ee7a các b\u1ea1n. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì s\u1ef1 kiên nh\u1eabn và s\u1ef1 h\u1ee3p tác c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: W-Br: Last week I went to the yearly retreat for Kierson Bookstore managers. The good news coming out of that meeting concerns money. Each store in the chain will have an increased budget next year to spend on expanding one of the sections in their store. After I returned, I took an informal survey about what kind of books customers would like us to carry more of. As you can see from the chart, it's clear which one they like the best. And the art section will need to be reduced, unfortunately. That inventory has become too expensive to stock.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: Vào tu\u1ea7n tr\u01b0\u1edbc tôi có \u0111\u1ebfn bu\u1ed5i h\u1ecdp m\u1eb7t hàng n\u0103m dành cho các nhà qu\u1ea3n lý c\u1ee7a c\u1eeda hàng sách Kierson. Nh\u1eefng tin t\u1ed1t \u0111\u1ebfn t\u1eeb cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp \u0111ó liên quan \u0111\u1ebfn ti\u1ec1n b\u1ea1c. M\u1ed7i c\u1eeda hàng trong chu\u1ed7i s\u1ebd có s\u1ef1 gia t\u0103ng ngân sách vào n\u0103m t\u1edbi \u0111\u1ec3 m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng m\u1ed9t khu v\u1ef1c trong c\u1eeda hàng c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd. Sau khi tr\u1edf v\u1ec1, tôi \u0111ã làm m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c kh\u1ea3o sát không chính th\u1ee9c v\u1ec1 lo\u1ea1i sách mà khách hàng mu\u1ed1n chúng tôi nh\u1eadp v\u1ec1 nhi\u1ec1u h\u01a1n. Nh\u01b0 b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 th\u1ea5y t\u1eeb bi\u1ec3u \u0111\u1ed3, có th\u1ec3 th\u1ea5y rõ ràng là h\u1ecd thích lo\u1ea1i nào nh\u1ea5t. Và th\u1eadt không may, khu h\u1ed9i h\u1ecda s\u1ebd ph\u1ea3i b\u1ecb c\u1eaft gi\u1ea3m. M\u1eb7t hàng \u1edf khu \u0111ó \u0111ã tr\u1edf nên quá \u0111\u1eaft \u0111\u1ecf \u0111\u1ec3 có th\u1ec3 nh\u1eadp v\u1ec1.<\/p>"}

Nhìn vào bi\u1ec3u \u0111\u1ed3 kia. Khu nào c\u1ee7a c\u1eeda hàng s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng?<\/p>

Ta có thông tin: \"After I returned, I took an informal survey about what kind of books customers would like us to carry more of. As you can see from the chart, it's clear which one they like the best.\" và khi ta nhìn vào bi\u1ec3u \u0111\u1ed3 thì ta th\u1ea5y c\u1ed9t S\u1edf thích là c\u1ed9t cao nh\u1ea5t nên ta ch\u1ecdn (B).<\/p>","en":"
