As you can see from the chart, it's clear which one they like the best.\" and when we look at the graphic, we can see that the Hobbies column is the highest one so we choose (B).<\/p>"}

parts.name: Incomplete sentences
parts.title: A word or pharse is missing in each of the sentences below. Four answer choices are given below each sentence. Select the best answer to complete the sentence. Then mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet.

intro.title:
Example:
The mother held her newborn ____

childrens.title: Ms. Carpenter will be attending the conference with ____ marketing team
childrens.answers: ["she","her","hers","herself"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ms. Carpenter will be attending the conference with her marketing team<\/p>###

Cô Carpenter s\u1ebd tham d\u1ef1 h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb v\u1edbi \u0111\u1ed9i ti\u1ebfp th\u1ecb c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y<\/p>

A. cô \u1ea5y - \u0111\u1ea1i t\u1eeb nhân x\u01b0ng (She + V + O...)<\/p>

B. c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y - tính t\u1eeb s\u1edf h\u1eefu (Her + danh t\u1eeb)<\/p>

C. cái c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y - \u0111\u1ea1i t\u1eeb nhân x\u01b0ng ch\u1ec9 s\u1edf h\u1eefu (Hers + to be + adj..., S + V + hers, S + V + O +...+ gi\u1edbi t\u1eeb + hers)<\/p>

D. chính cô \u1ea5y - \u0111\u1ea1i t\u1eeb ph\u1ea3n thân (S + V + herself..., S + V + gi\u1edbi t\u1eeb + herself)<\/p>###

* Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

\u0110áp án (B) her \"c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y\" là tính t\u1eeb s\u1edf h\u1eefu và \u0111\u1ee9ng tr\u01b0\u1edbc c\u1ee5m danh t\u1eeb marketing team \u0111\u1ec3 b\u1ed5 ngh\u0129a cho nó.<\/p>","en":"

Ms. Carpenter will be attending the conference with her marketing team<\/p>

A. she - personal pronoun (She + V + O...)<\/p>

B. her - possessive adjective (Her + noun)<\/p>

C. hers - possessive pronoun (Hers + to be + adj..., S + V + hers, S + V + O + ... + prep + hers)<\/p>

D. herself - reflexive pronoun (S + V + herself..., S + V + prep + herself)<\/p>###

* Explanation:<\/p>

Answer (B) her is a possessive adjective and stands before the noun phrase marketing team to complement it.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: ____ the last ten years, Bay City's population has grown by about 27 percent
childrens.answers: ["As","Against","During","Below"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

During the last ten years, Bay City's population has grown by about 27 percent<\/p>###

Trong su\u1ed1t 10 n\u0103m qua, dân s\u1ed1 Thành ph\u1ed1 V\u1ecbnh \u0111ã t\u0103ng lên kho\u1ea3ng 27%<\/p>

A. Khi, nh\u01b0 - có th\u1ec3 là danh t\u1eeb, phó t\u1eeb và liên t\u1eeb tùy vào ng\u1eef c\u1ea3nh<\/p>

B. Ch\u1ed1ng l\u1ea1i - gi\u1edbi t\u1eeb <\/p>

C. Trong su\u1ed1t, trong th\u1eddi gian - gi\u1edbi t\u1eeb (During + danh t\u1eeb\/c\u1ee5m danh t\u1eeb)<\/p>

D. D\u01b0\u1edbi - gi\u1edbi t\u1eeb<\/p>###

* Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

\u0110áp án (C) During \"trong su\u1ed1t\" là gi\u1edbi t\u1eeb có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c dùng khi m\u1ed9t \u0111i\u1ec1u gì \u0111ó \u0111ã x\u1ea3y ra ngay trong kho\u1ea3ng th\u1eddi gian mà s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n chính \u0111ang di\u1ec5n ra. Ngh\u0129a là trong su\u1ed1t 10 n\u0103m qua t\u1ea1i m\u1ed9t th\u1eddi \u0111i\u1ec3m thì dân s\u1ed1 c\u1ee7a thành ph\u1ed1 \u0111ã t\u0103ng lên.<\/p>","en":"

During the last ten years, Bay City's population has grown by about 27 percent<\/p>

A. As - can be a noun, adverb and conjunction depending on the context<\/p>

B. Against- preposition<\/p>

C. During - preposition (During + noun\/noun phrases)<\/p>

D. Below - preposition<\/p>###

* Explanation:<\/p>

Answer (C) During is a preposition that can be used when something has happened during a time period that the main event is taking place. That means during the past 10 years at a time, the population of the city has increased.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Please congratulate Alan Schmit, ____ of the Leadership Award in Nursing at Knoll Hospital
childrens.answers: ["won","wins","winning","winner"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Please congratulate Alan Schmit, winner of the Leadership Award in Nursing at Knoll Hospital<\/p>###

Xin chúc m\u1eebng Alan Schmit, ng\u01b0\u1eddi chi\u1ebfn th\u1eafng Gi\u1ea3i th\u01b0\u1edfng Lãnh \u0111\u1ea1o trong ngành \u0110i\u1ec1u d\u01b0\u1ee1ng t\u1ea1i B\u1ec7nh vi\u1ec7n Knoll<\/p>

A. \u0111ã chi\u1ebfn th\u1eafng - \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb thì quá kh\u1ee9 \u0111\u01a1n<\/p>

B. chi\u1ebfn th\u1eafng - \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb thì hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i \u0111\u01a1n, \u1edf s\u1ed1 ít<\/p>

C. chi\u1ebfn th\u1eafng - tính t\u1eeb<\/p>

D. ng\u01b0\u1eddi chi\u1ebfn th\u1eafng - danh t\u1eeb<\/p>###

* Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Tr\u01b0\u1edbc kho\u1ea3ng tr\u1ed1ng là m\u1ed9t danh t\u1eeb riêng \"Alan Schmit\" và ta th\u01b0\u1eddng thêm m\u1ed9t danh t\u1eeb hay c\u1ee5m danh t\u1eeb phía sau \u0111\u1ec3 b\u1ed5 ngh\u0129a cho nó, nên ta ch\u1ecdn \u0111áp án (D) winner \"ng\u01b0\u1eddi chi\u1ebfn th\u1eafng\".<\/p>","en":"

Please congratulate Alan Schmit, winner of the Leadership Award in Nursing at Knoll Hospital<\/p>

A. won - single past tense verb<\/p>

B. wins - present simple tense verb, in singular form<\/p>

C. winning - adjective<\/p>

D. winner - noun<\/p>###

* Explanation:<\/p>

Before the blank space is a proper noun \"Alan Schmit\" and we often add a noun or noun phrase to complement it so we choose answer (D) winner.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Ireland's largest software producer will ____ be opening a large facility in Cork
childrens.answers: ["soon","such","ever","like"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ireland's largest software producer will soon be opening a large facility in Cork<\/p>###

Nhà s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t ph\u1ea7n m\u1ec1m l\u1edbn nh\u1ea5t Ireland s\u1ebd s\u1edbm m\u1edf m\u1ed9t c\u01a1 s\u1edf l\u1edbn \u1edf Cork<\/p>

A. s\u1edbm - phó t\u1eeb<\/p>

B. nh\u01b0 - tính t\u1eeb (such+danh t\u1eeb)<\/p>

C. bao gi\u1edd - phó t\u1eeb<\/p>

D. nh\u01b0 là - gi\u1edbi t\u1eeb, dùng \u0111\u1ec3 li\u1ec7t kê<\/p>###

* Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Ta ch\u1ecdn \u0111áp án (A) soon \"s\u1edbm\" vì nó phù h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi ngh\u0129a c\u1ee7a câu nh\u1ea5t.<\/p>","en":"

Ireland's largest software producer will soon be opening a large facility in Cork<\/p>

A. soon - adverb<\/p>

B. such - adjectives (such + noun)<\/p>

C. ever - adverb<\/p>

D. like - preposition, used for listing<\/p>###

* Explanation:<\/p>

We choose answer (A) soon because it fits with the meaning of the whole sentence the most.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Ashburn Bank's online service has been in high demand ____
childrens.answers: ["lateness","later","lately","latest"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ashburn Bank's online service has been in high demand lately<\/p>###

D\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn c\u1ee7a Ngân hàng Ashburn g\u1ea7n \u0111ây \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c yêu c\u1ea7u cao<\/p>

A. s\u1ef1 ch\u1eadm tr\u1ec5 - danh t\u1eeb<\/p>

B. sau \u0111ó - phó t\u1eeb so sánh h\u01a1n<\/p>

C. g\u1ea7n \u0111ây - phó t\u1eeb<\/p>

D. g\u1ea7n \u0111ây nh\u1ea5t - phó t\u1eeb so sánh nh\u1ea5t<\/p>###

* Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

\u0110ây là câu b\u1ecb \u0111\u1ed9ng theo thì hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i hoàn thành và th\u01b0\u1eddng có phó t\u1eeb \u0111i kèm. Câu miêu t\u1ea3 m\u1ed9t s\u1ef1 vi\u1ec7c di\u1ec5n ra trong quá kh\u1ee9 v\u1edbi k\u1ebft qu\u1ea3 \u1edf hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i nên ta ch\u1ecdn phó t\u1eeb lately \"g\u1ea7n \u0111ây\" là \u0111áp án (C).<\/p>","en":"

Ashburn Bank's online service has been in high demand lately<\/p>

A. lateness - noun<\/p>

B. later - comparative adverb<\/p>

C. lately - adverb<\/p>

D. latest - superlative adverb<\/p>###

* Explanation:<\/p>

This is a passive sentence in the present perfect form and is usually accompanied by an adverb. The sentence describes a thing that happened in the past with its results in the present, so we choose the adverb lately which is answer (C).<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The ____ of videos to electronic press releases can help companies showcase their products
childrens.answers: ["content","addition","pictures","promotion"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The addition of videos to electronic press releases can help companies showcase their products<\/p>###

Vi\u1ec7c b\u1ed5 sung video vào thông cáo báo chí \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed có th\u1ec3 giúp các công ty gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd<\/p>

A. n\u1ed9i dung - danh t\u1eeb<\/p>

B. vi\u1ec7c b\u1ed5 sung, thêm vào - danh t\u1eeb<\/p>

C. nh\u1eefng b\u1ee9c tranh - danh t\u1eeb s\u1ed1 nhi\u1ec1u<\/p>

D. qu\u1ea3ng cáo - danh t\u1eeb<\/p>###

* Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Câu có gi\u1edbi t\u1eeb to sau kho\u1ea3ng tr\u1ed1ng. Ta có c\u1ea5u trúc addition to \"thêm vào m\u1ed9t cái gì \u0111ó\" và xét v\u1ec1 m\u1eb7t ý ngh\u0129a thì ta ch\u1ecdn \u0111áp án (B) addition \"vi\u1ec7c b\u1ed5 sung\" là \u0111úng nh\u1ea5t.<\/p>","en":"

The addition of videos to electronic press releases can help companies showcase their products<\/p>

A. content - noun<\/p>

B. addition - noun<\/p>

C. pictures - plural noun<\/p>

D. promotion - noun<\/p>###

* Explanation:<\/p>

The sentence has preposition to after the blank space. We have the structure addition to \"to add something\" and in terms of meaning, we choose the answer (B) addition as it is the most correct.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Ms. Hyun is reviewing the training manual to see if updates ____
childrens.answers: ["have need","needing","are needed","to be needed"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ms. Hyun is reviewing the training manual to see if updates are needed<\/p>###

Cô Hyun \u0111ang xem l\u1ea1i s\u1ed5 tay hu\u1ea5n luy\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ec3 xem có c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft ph\u1ea3i c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt hay không<\/p>

A. có nhu c\u1ea7u - c\u1ea5u trúc câu ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ed9ng (have need + O)<\/p>

B. nhu c\u1ea7u - \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb thì hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i ti\u1ebfp di\u1ec5n<\/p>

C. là c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft - \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb b\u1ecb \u0111\u1ed9ng <\/p>

D. c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft - \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb <\/p>###

* Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Sau if là ta \u0111ã có m\u1ed9t m\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1 m\u1edbi nên b\u1eaft bu\u1ed9c ph\u1ea3i có m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb. T\u1eeb need là m\u1ed9t ngo\u1ea1i \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb và n\u1ebfu sau nó không có tân ng\u1eef thì câu ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c vi\u1ebft d\u01b0\u1edbi d\u1ea1ng b\u1ecb \u0111\u1ed9ng. \u0110áp án (C) are needed \"là c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft\" là chính xác nh\u1ea5t.<\/p>","en":"

Ms. Hyun is reviewing the training manual to see if updates are needed<\/p>

A. have need - active sentence structure (have need + O)<\/p>

B. needing - present continuous tense verb<\/p>

C. are needed - passive verb<\/p>

D. to be needed - verb<\/p>###

* Explanation:<\/p>

After if is a clause so a verb is required. The word need is a transitive verb and if it doesn't have an object behind, the sentence must be written in a passive form. The answer (C) are needed is the most accurate.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: When leaving the auditorium, please exit ____ the doors on the lower level
childrens.answers: ["except","inside","without","through"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

When leaving the auditorium, please exit through the doors on the lower level<\/p>###

Khi r\u1eddi khán phòng, vui lòng \u0111i b\u0103ng qua c\u1eeda \u1edf t\u1ea7ng d\u01b0\u1edbi<\/p>

A. ngo\u1ea1i tr\u1eeb - gi\u1edbi t\u1eeb (except + (for) + c\u1ee5m danh t\u1eeb)<\/p>

B. bên trong - gi\u1edbi t\u1eeb <\/p>

C. không có - gi\u1edbi t\u1eeb<\/p>

D. qua, b\u0103ng qua - gi\u1edbi t\u1eeb<\/p>###

* Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Ta ch\u1ecdn \u0111áp án (D) through \"b\u0103ng qua\" do phù h\u1ee3p v\u1ec1 m\u1eb7t ý ngh\u0129a nh\u1ea5t.<\/p>","en":"

When leaving the auditorium, please exit through the doors on the lower level<\/p>

A. except - preposition (except + (for) + noun phrase)<\/p>

B. inside - preposition<\/p>

C. without - preposition<\/p>

D. through - preposition<\/p>###

* Explanation:<\/p>

We choose the answer (D) through as it is the most suitable in terms of meaning.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The judges for this year's screenplay competition include ____ from Hanovi Studios
childrens.answers: ["represents","representatives","represented","represent"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The judges for this year's screenplay competition include representatives from Hanovi Studios<\/p>###

Ban giám kh\u1ea3o cu\u1ed9c thi vi\u1ebft k\u1ecbch b\u1ea3n n\u0103m nay bao g\u1ed3m nh\u1eefng \u0111\u1ea1i di\u1ec7n t\u1eeb Hanovi Studios<\/p>

A. \u0111\u1ea1i di\u1ec7n - \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb s\u1ed1 ít<\/p>

B. nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111\u1ea1i di\u1ec7n, \u0111\u1ea1i di\u1ec7n - danh t\u1eeb s\u1ed1 nhi\u1ec1u<\/p>

C. \u0111ã \u0111\u1ea1i di\u1ec7n - \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb thì quá kh\u1ee9 \u0111\u01a1n<\/p>

D. \u0111\u1ea1i di\u1ec7n - \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb nguyên m\u1eabu<\/p>###

* Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Include là m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb nên ph\u1ea3i có danh t\u1eeb \u0111\u1ee9ng sau. Ta ch\u1ecdn \u0111áp án (B) representatives \"nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111\u1ea1i di\u1ec7n, \u0111\u1ea1i di\u1ec7n\".<\/p>","en":"

The judges for this year's screenplay competition include representatives from Hanovi Studios<\/p>

A. represent - singular verb<\/p>

B. representatives - plural noun<\/p>

C. represented - past tense verb<\/p>

D. representation - infinitive verb<\/p>###

* Explanation:<\/p>

Include is a verb, so it must be followed by a noun. We choose the answer (B) representatives.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: I have attached my resume detailing my ____ experience in the hotel industry
childrens.answers: ["extensive","punctual","prospective","accepted"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

I have attached my resume detailing my extensive experience in the hotel industry<\/p>###

Tôi \u0111ã \u0111ính kèm s\u01a1 y\u1ebfu lý l\u1ecbch c\u1ee7a mình nêu chi ti\u1ebft kinh nghi\u1ec7m dày d\u1eb7n c\u1ee7a mình trong ngành khách s\u1ea1n<\/p>

A. dày d\u1eb7n, sâu r\u1ed9ng - tính t\u1eeb<\/p>

B. \u0111úng gi\u1edd - tính t\u1eeb<\/p>

C. có tri\u1ec3n v\u1ecdng - tính t\u1eeb<\/p>

D. \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ea5p nh\u1eadn - tính t\u1eeb<\/p>###

* Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Tr\u01b0\u1edbc danh t\u1eeb experience ph\u1ea3i là m\u1ed9t tính t\u1eeb và d\u1ef1a vào ngh\u0129a thì \u0111áp án (A) extensive \"dày d\u1eb7n, sâu r\u1ed9ng\" là \u0111úng nh\u1ea5t<\/p>","en":"

I have attached my resume detailing my extensive experience in the hotel industry<\/p>

A. extensive - adjective<\/p>

B. punctual - adjective<\/p>

C. prospective - adjective<\/p>

D. accepted - adjective<\/p>###

* Explanation:<\/p>

Standing before the noun experience must be an adjective and based on the meaning, answer (A) extensive is the most correct.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Remember to check the spelling of Mr. Kamashi 's name when ____ the document
childrens.answers: ["revising","revises","revised","revise"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Remember to check the spelling of Mr. Kamashi 's name when revising the document<\/p>###

Nh\u1edb ki\u1ec3m tra chính t\u1ea3 tên ông Kamashi khi ch\u1ec9nh s\u1eeda tài li\u1ec7u<\/p>

A. s\u1eeda \u0111\u1ed5i - \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ed9ng <\/p>

B. \u0111i\u1ec1u ch\u1ec9nh - \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb s\u1ed1 ít<\/p>

C. \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eeda l\u1ea1i - \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb b\u1ecb \u0111\u1ed9ng<\/p>

D. xem l\u1ea1i - \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb nguyên m\u1eabu<\/p>###

* Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Sau liên t\u1eeb when là m\u1ed9t m\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1 nh\u01b0ng câu không có ch\u1ee7 t\u1eeb nên ta s\u1ebd vi\u1ebft theo d\u1ea1ng rút g\u1ecdn b\u1eb1ng cách thêm -ing ho\u1eb7c -ed vào \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb. Sau \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ed9ng ph\u1ea3i có tân ng\u1eef nên ta ch\u1ecdn \u0111áp án (A) revising \"s\u1eeda \u0111\u1ed5i\" do có tân ng\u1eef the document.<\/p>","en":"

Remember to check the spelling of Mr. Kamashi 's name when revising the document<\/p>

A. revising- active verb<\/p>

B. revises - singular verb<\/p>

C. revised - passive verb<\/p>

D. revise - infinitive verb<\/p>###

* Explanation:<\/p>

After the conjunction when is a clause but the sentence has no subject so we will write in shorten form by adding -ing or -ed to the verb. After the active verb, there must be an object, so we choose the answer (A) revising due to the object the document behind it.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Residents visited City Hall to ask ____ developers will preserve the historic properties
childrens.answers: ["although","since","whether","both"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Residents visited City Hall to ask whether developers will preserve the historic properties<\/p>###

Ng\u01b0\u1eddi dân \u0111ã \u0111\u1ebfn th\u0103m Tòa th\u1ecb chính \u0111\u1ec3 h\u1ecfi li\u1ec7u r\u1eb1ng các nhà phát tri\u1ec3n s\u1ebd b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7 nh\u1eefng tài s\u1ea3n l\u1ecbch s\u1eed hay không.<\/p>

A. m\u1eb7c dù - liên t\u1eeb (although + m\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1)<\/p>

B. b\u1edfi vì - liên t\u1eeb (since + m\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1)<\/p>

C. li\u1ec7u r\u1eb1ng - liên t\u1eeb (whether + m\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1\/to verb)<\/p>

D. c\u1ea3 hai - liên t\u1eeb (both + (of) + t\u1eeb h\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ecbnh + danh t\u1eeb s\u1ed1 nhi\u1ec1u)<\/p>###

* Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Ta ch\u1ecdn \u0111áp án (C) whether \"li\u1ec7u r\u1eb1ng\" vì \u0111úng v\u1ec1 ngh\u0129a nh\u1ea5t và liên t\u1eeb whether hay \u0111\u1ee9ng sau \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb và \u0111\u1ee9ng tr\u01b0\u1edbc m\u1ed9t m\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1 hay c\u1ea5u trúc to verb.<\/p>","en":"

Residents visited City Hall to ask whether developers will preserve the historic properties<\/p>

A. although - conjunction (although + clause)<\/p>

B. since - conjunction (since + clause)<\/p>

C. whether - conjunction (whether + clause \/ to verb)<\/p>

D. both - conjunction (both + (of) + determiner + plural noun)<\/p>###

* Explanation:<\/p>

We choose the answer (C) whether which is the most correct in terms of meaning and the conjunction whether often stands behind a verb or before a clause and to verb structure.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The Ford Group's proposed advertising campaign is by far the most ____ we have seen so far
childrens.answers: ["innovate","innovative","innovations","innovatively"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The Ford Group's proposed advertising campaign is by far the most innovative we have seen so far<\/p>###

Chi\u1ebfn d\u1ecbch qu\u1ea3ng cáo \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ec1 xu\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a T\u1eadp \u0111oàn Ford là chi\u1ebfn d\u1ecbch sáng t\u1ea1o nh\u1ea5t mà chúng tôi t\u1eebng th\u1ea5y cho \u0111\u1ebfn nay<\/p>

A. \u0111\u1ed5i m\u1edbi - \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb nguyên m\u1eabu<\/p>

B. sáng t\u1ea1o - tính t\u1eeb<\/p>

C. nh\u1eefng s\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ed5i m\u1edbi - danh t\u1eeb s\u1ed1 nhi\u1ec1u<\/p>

D. m\u1ed9t cách sáng t\u1ea1o - phó t\u1eeb<\/p>###

* Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Sau \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb to be là tính t\u1eeb và c\u1ea5u trúc so sánh nh\u1ea5t the most là tính t\u1eeb ho\u1eb7c phó t\u1eeb nên ta ch\u1ecdn \u0111áp án (B) innovative \"sáng t\u1ea1o\".<\/p>","en":"

The Ford Group's proposed advertising campaign is by far the most innovative we have seen so far<\/p>

A. innovate - infinitive verb<\/p>

B. innovative - adjective<\/p>

C. innovations - plural noun<\/p>

D. innovatively - adverb<\/p>###

* Explanation:<\/p>

After the verb to be is an adjective and superlative structure the most is either adjective or adverb, so we choose answer (B) innovative.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Solei Landscaping announced that the design for the Cherry Hill building complex is ____ complete
childrens.answers: ["almost","nearby","anytime","yet"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Solei Landscaping announced that the design for the Cherry Hill building complex is almost complete<\/p>###

Solei Landscaping thông báo r\u1eb1ng thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf cho t\u1ed5 h\u1ee3p tòa nhà Cherry Hill g\u1ea7n nh\u01b0 \u0111ã hoàn thành<\/p>

A. g\u1ea7n nh\u01b0 - phó t\u1eeb<\/p>

B. g\u1ea7n \u0111ó - phó t\u1eeb hay tính t\u1eeb<\/p>

C. b\u1ea5t c\u1ee9 khi nào - phó t\u1eeb<\/p>

D. ch\u01b0a - phó t\u1eeb<\/p>###

* Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

\u0110áp án B) và (C) thì không \u0111úng v\u1ec1 ý ngh\u0129a. \u0110áp án (D) ch\u1ec9 có th\u1ec3 s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng khi \u1edf \u0111ây là câu ph\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ecbnh nên ta ch\u1ecdn \u0111áp án (A) almost \"g\u1ea7n nh\u01b0\".<\/p>","en":"

Solei Landscaping announced that the design for the Cherry Hill building complex is almost complete<\/p>

A. almost - adverb<\/p>

B. nearby - adverb or adjective<\/p>

C. anytime - adverb<\/p>

D. yet - adverb<\/p>###

* Explanation:<\/p>

Answers (B) and (C) are not correct in terms of meaning. The answer (D) can only be used when the sentence is negative, so we choose the answer (A) almost.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Daniel Nishida, the chief supply officer, asked that ____ be given full responsibility for approving all invoices
childrens.answers: ["he","him","his","himself"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Daniel Nishida, the chief supply officer, asked that he be given full responsibility for approving all invoices<\/p>###

Daniel Nishida, giám \u0111\u1ed1c cung \u1ee9ng, yêu c\u1ea7u anh ta \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c giao toàn b\u1ed9 trách nhi\u1ec7m phê duy\u1ec7t t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các hóa \u0111\u01a1n<\/p>

A. anh \u1ea5y - \u0111\u1ea1i t\u1eeb nhân x\u01b0ng \u1edf v\u1ecb trí ch\u1ee7 ng\u1eef<\/p>

B. anh ta - \u0111\u1ea1i t\u1eeb nhân x\u01b0ng \u1edf v\u1ecb trí tân ng\u1eef<\/p>

C. c\u1ee7a anh \u1ea5y - tính t\u1eeb s\u1edf h\u1eefu (His + noun)<\/p>

D. b\u1ea3n thân anh \u1ea5y - \u0111\u1ea1i t\u1eeb ph\u1ea3n thân (S + V + himself..., S + V + prep + himself)<\/p>###

* Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Ta có c\u1ea5u trúc ask + that + S + (should) + \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb nguyên m\u1eabu nên ch\u1ec9 có \u0111áp án (A) là \u0111úng nh\u1ea5t v\u1ec1 ng\u1eef pháp.<\/p>","en":"

Daniel Nishida, the chief supply officer, asked that he be given full responsibility for approving all invoices<\/p>

A. he - personal pronoun as a subject<\/p>

B. him - personal pronoun as an object<\/p>

C. his - possessive adjective (His + noun)<\/p>

D. himself - reflexive pronoun (S + V + himself ..., S + V + prep + himself)<\/p>###

* Explanation:<\/p>

We have the structure ask + that + S + (should) + infinitive verb and only the answer (A) is the most grammatically correct.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: In preparation for Mr. Kumar's retirement at the end of March, the Carolex Corporation will need to ____ a new facilities director
childrens.answers: ["resume","compete","recruit","conduct"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

In preparation for Mr. Kumar's retirement at the end of March, the Carolex Corporation will need to recruit a new facilities director<\/p>###

\u0110\u1ec3 chu\u1ea9n b\u1ecb cho vi\u1ec7c ngh\u1ec9 h\u01b0u c\u1ee7a ông Kumar vào cu\u1ed1i tháng 3, Carolex Corporation s\u1ebd c\u1ea7n tuy\u1ec3n m\u1ed9t giám \u0111\u1ed1c c\u01a1 s\u1edf m\u1edbi<\/p>

A. làm m\u1edbi l\u1ea1i - \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb<\/p>

B. hoàn thành - \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb<\/p>

C. tuy\u1ec3n d\u1ee5ng - \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb<\/p>

D. ti\u1ebfn hành - \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb<\/p>###

* Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Ta ch\u1ecdn \u0111áp án (C) recruit \"tuy\u1ec3n d\u1ee5ng\" vì \u0111úng v\u1ec1 m\u1eb7t ý ngh\u0129a nh\u1ea5t.<\/p>","en":"

In preparation for Mr. Kumar's retirement at the end of March, the Carolex Corporation will need to recruit a new facilities director<\/p>

A. resume - verb<\/p>

B. complete - verb<\/p>

C. recruit - verb<\/p>

D. conduct - verb<\/p>###

* Explanation:<\/p>

We choose the answer (C) recruit because it is most correct in terms of meaning.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The team's contributions to the Ripton Group's marketing plan were very ____ acknowledged
childrens.answers: ["favor","favorably","favorable","favored"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The team's contributions to the Ripton Group's marketing plan were very favorably acknowledged<\/p>###

Nh\u1eefng \u0111óng góp c\u1ee7a nhóm vào k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch ti\u1ebfp th\u1ecb c\u1ee7a T\u1eadp \u0111oàn Ripton \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ghi nh\u1eadn m\u1ed9t cách r\u1ea5t \u01b0u ái<\/p>

A. \u01b0u ái - \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb<\/p>

B. m\u1ed9t cách thu\u1eadn l\u1ee3i - phó t\u1eeb<\/p>

C. thu\u1eadn l\u1ee3i - tính t\u1eeb<\/p>

D. \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u01b0u ái - tính t\u1eeb<\/p>###

* Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Ta có very là phó t\u1eeb ch\u1ec9 c\u1ea5p \u0111\u1ed9 dùng \u0111\u1ec3 b\u1ed5 ngh\u0129a cho tính t\u1eeb ho\u1eb7c phó t\u1eeb khác và t\u1eeb acknowledged sau kho\u1ea3ng tr\u1ed1ng là \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb nên ta ch\u1ecdn \u0111áp án (B) favorably \"m\u1ed9t cách thu\u1eadn l\u1ee3i\".<\/p>","en":"

The team's contributions to the Ripton Group's marketing plan were very favorably acknowledged<\/p>

A. favor - verb<\/p>

B. favorably - adverb<\/p>

C. favorable - adjective<\/p>

D. favored - adjective<\/p>###

* Explanation:<\/p>

We have very which is an adverb of degree use to complement adjective or other adverb and the adjective acknowledged after the blank space is a verb so we choose the answer (B) favorably.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: ____ receiving the engineering award, Ms. Kwon made a point of thanking longtime mentors
childrens.answers: ["Onto","Unlike","About","Upon"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Upon receiving the engineering award, Ms. Kwon made a point of thanking longtime mentors<\/p>###

Khi nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c gi\u1ea3i th\u01b0\u1edfng k\u1ef9 s\u01b0, cô Kwon \u0111ã g\u1eedi l\u1eddi c\u1ea3m \u01a1n \u0111\u1ebfn nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi c\u1ed1 v\u1ea5n lâu n\u0103m<\/p>

A. Lên trên - gi\u1edbi t\u1eeb<\/p>

B. Không gi\u1ed1ng - gi\u1edbi t\u1eeb (Unlike + c\u1ee5m danh t\u1eeb)<\/p>

C. V\u1ec1 - gi\u1edbi t\u1eeb<\/p>

D. Khi - gi\u1edbi t\u1eeb<\/p>###

* Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Ta ch\u1ecdn \u0111áp án (D) Upon \"Khi\" do \u0111úng v\u1ec1 ý ngh\u0129a nh\u1ea5t.<\/p>","en":"

Upon receiving the engineering award, Ms. Kwon made a point of thanking longtime mentors<\/p>

A. Onto - preposition<\/p>

B. Unlike - preposition (Unlike + noun phrase)<\/p>

C. About - preposition<\/p>

D. Upon - preposition<\/p>###

* Explanation:<\/p>

We choose the answer (D) Upon as it is the most correct in terms of meaning<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Please read the list of ____ qualifications to ensure that you have the necessary education and experience for the position
childrens.answers: ["slight","equal","obliged","essential"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Please read the list of essential qualifications to ensure that you have the necessary education and experience for the position<\/p>###

Vui lòng \u0111\u1ecdc danh sách nh\u1eefng ch\u1ee9ng ch\u1ec9 c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o r\u1eb1ng b\u1ea1n có trình \u0111\u1ed9 h\u1ecdc v\u1ea5n và kinh nghi\u1ec7m c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft cho v\u1ecb trí.<\/p>

A. nh\u1eb9 - tính t\u1eeb<\/p>

B. \u0111\u1ed3ng \u0111\u1ec1u - tính t\u1eeb<\/p>

C. bi\u1ebft \u01a1n - tính t\u1eeb (to be + obliged)<\/p>

D. c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft - tính t\u1eeb<\/p>###

* Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Ta ch\u1ecdn \u0111áp án (D) essential \"c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft\" vì nó có ngh\u0129a \u0111úng nh\u1ea5t<\/p>","en":"

Please read the list of essential qualifications to ensure that you have the necessary education and experience for the position<\/p>

A. slight - adjective<\/p>

B. equal - adjective<\/p>

C. obliged - adjective (to be + obliged)<\/p>

D. essential - adjective<\/p>###

* Explanation:<\/p>

We choose the answer (D) essential because it matches with the meaning of the sentence.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Choosing the best software tool to eliminate computer viruses is rarely simple, ____ it is important to seek expert advice
childrens.answers: ["why","then","nor","so"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Choosing the best software tool to eliminate computer viruses is rarely simple, so it is important to seek expert advice<\/p>###

Vi\u1ec7c l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn công c\u1ee5 ph\u1ea7n m\u1ec1m t\u1ed1t nh\u1ea5t \u0111\u1ec3 lo\u1ea1i b\u1ecf vi rút máy tính hi\u1ebfm khi \u0111\u01a1n gi\u1ea3n, vì v\u1eady \u0111i\u1ec1u quan tr\u1ecdng là ph\u1ea3i tìm ki\u1ebfm l\u1eddi khuyên t\u1eeb chuyên gia<\/p>

A. t\u1ea1i sao - liên t\u1eeb<\/p>

B. sau \u0111ó - phó t\u1eeb<\/p>

C. không - liên t\u1eeb<\/p>

D. vì v\u1eady - liên t\u1eeb<\/p>###

* Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Sau kho\u1ea3ng tr\u1ed1ng là m\u1ed9t m\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1 nên ta thêm liên t\u1eeb vào phía tr\u01b0\u1edbc và \u0111áp án (D) so \"vì v\u1eady\" là \u0111úng nh\u1ea5t v\u1ec1 m\u1eb7t ý ngh\u0129a.<\/p>","en":"

Choosing the best software tool to eliminate computer viruses is rarely simple, so it is important to seek expert advice<\/p>

A. why - conjunction<\/p>

B. then - adverb<\/p>

C. nor - conjunction<\/p>

D. so - conjunction<\/p>###

* Explanation:<\/p>

After the blank space is a clause so we add conjunction in front of it and the answer (D) so is the most correct in terms of meaning.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Ms. Delgado would like to meet with all loan officers ____ reviewing any more loan applications
childrens.answers: ["now that","as though","before","often"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ms. Delgado would like to meet with all loan officers before reviewing any more loan applications<\/p>###

Bà Delgado mu\u1ed1n g\u1eb7p t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các nhân viên cho vay tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi xem xét b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 \u0111\u01a1n xin vay n\u1ee3 nào.<\/p>

A. b\u1edfi vì - liên t\u1eeb (now that=because + clause)<\/p>

B. c\u1ee9 nh\u01b0 th\u1ec3 là - c\u1ee5m t\u1eeb (S + Vs\/es + as though + S +Vs\/es)<\/p>

C. tr\u01b0\u1edbc - liên t\u1eeb (before + V-ing)<\/p>

D. th\u01b0\u1eddng xuyên - phó t\u1eeb<\/p>###

* Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Ta ch\u1ecdn \u0111áp án (C) before \"tr\u01b0\u1edbc\" vì sau before có \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb thêm -ing là t\u1eeb reviewing.<\/p>","en":"

Ms. Delgado would like to meet with all loan officers before reviewing any more loan applications<\/p>

A. now that - conjunction (now that = because + clause)<\/p>

B. as though - phrase (S + Vs\/es + as though + S + Vs\/es)<\/p>

C. before - conjunction (before + V-ing)<\/p>

D. often - adverb<\/p>###

* Explanation:<\/p>

We choose the answer (C) before because after before there is verb with -ing which is the word reviewing.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Cedar Branch Hill has a ____ as a business-friendly environment that provides efficient licensing and other legal processes
childrens.answers: ["prediction","courtesy","reputation","statement"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Cedar Branch Hill has a reputation as a business-friendly environment that provides efficient licensing and other legal processes<\/p>###

Cedar Branch Hill có danh ti\u1ebfng nh\u01b0 là m\u1ed9t môi tr\u01b0\u1eddng thân thi\u1ec7n v\u1edbi doanh nghi\u1ec7p cung c\u1ea5p các quy trình c\u1ea5p phép hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3 và các quy trình pháp lý khác.<\/p>

A. s\u1ef1 d\u1ef1 \u0111oán - danh t\u1eeb<\/p>

B. s\u1ef1 l\u1ecbch s\u1ef1 - danh t\u1eeb<\/p>

C. danh ti\u1ebfng - danh t\u1eeb<\/p>

D. l\u1eddi tuyên b\u1ed1 - danh t\u1eeb<\/p>###

* Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Ta ch\u1ecdn \u0111áp án (C) reputation \"danh t\u1eeb\" vì nó \u0111úng ngh\u0129a nh\u1ea5t<\/p>","en":"

Cedar Branch Hill has a reputation as a business-friendly environment that provides efficient licensing and other legal processes<\/p>

A. prediction - noun<\/p>

B. courtesy - noun<\/p>

C. reputation - noun<\/p>

D. statement - noun<\/p>###

* Explanation:<\/p>

We choose the answer (C) reputation because it is the most correct in terms of meaning<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The actors held an additional rehearsal ____ perfect their performance in the final scene
childrens.answers: ["considerably","in order to","nevertheless","as a result of"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The actors held an additional rehearsal in order to perfect their performance in the final scene<\/p>###

Các di\u1ec5n viên \u0111ã t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c thêm m\u1ed9t bu\u1ed5i di\u1ec5n t\u1eadp \u0111\u1ec3 hoàn thi\u1ec7n màn trình di\u1ec5n c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd trong phân c\u1ea3nh cu\u1ed1i cùng<\/p>

A. m\u1ed9t cách \u0111áng k\u1ec3 - phó t\u1eeb<\/p>

B. \u0111\u1ec3 - c\u1ee5m t\u1eeb (in order to + \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb nguyên m\u1eabu)<\/p>

C. tuy nhiên - phó t\u1eeb<\/p>

D. nh\u01b0 k\u1ebft qu\u1ea3 c\u1ee7a - c\u1ee5m t\u1eeb có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c dùng nh\u01b0 gi\u1edbi t\u1eeb (as a result of + danh t\u1eeb\/\u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb thêm -ing)<\/p>###

* Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Ta ch\u1ecdn \u0111áp án (B) in order to \"\u0111\u1ec3\" vì ta có c\u1ea5u trúc in order to + \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb nguyên m\u1eabu và sau kho\u1ea3ng tr\u1ed1ng có \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb perfect.<\/p>","en":"

The actors held an additional rehearsal in order to perfect their performance in the final scene<\/p>

A. considerably - adverb<\/p>

B. in order to - phrase (in order to + infinitive verb)<\/p>

C. nevertheless - adverb<\/p>

D. as a result of - phrase can be used as a preposition (as a result of + N\/V-ing)<\/p>###

* Explanation:<\/p>

We choose the answer (B) in order to because we have the structure in order to + infinitive verb and after the blank space is the verb perfect.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: RZT Technology will double the size of its Toronto laboratory to ____ the organization's rapid growth
childrens.answers: ["assign","investigate","experience","accommodate"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

RZT Technology will double the size of its Toronto laboratory to accommodate the organization's rapid growth<\/p>###

RZT Technology s\u1ebd t\u0103ng g\u1ea5p \u0111ôi quy mô c\u1ee7a phòng thí nghi\u1ec7m Toronto \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111áp \u1ee9ng s\u1ef1 phát tri\u1ec3n nhanh chóng c\u1ee7a t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c.<\/p>

A. phân công - \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb<\/p>

B. \u0111i\u1ec1u tra - \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb<\/p>

C. tr\u1ea3i nghi\u1ec7m - \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb<\/p>

D. \u0111áp \u1ee9ng - \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb<\/p>###

* Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Ta ch\u1ecdn \u0111áp án (D) accommodate \"\u0111áp \u1ee9ng\" vì nó phù h\u1ee3p v\u1ec1 ngh\u0129a nh\u1ea5t.<\/p>","en":"

RZT Technology will double the size of its Toronto laboratory to meet the organization's rapid growth<\/p>

A. assign - verb<\/p>

B. investigate - verb<\/p>

C. experience - verb<\/p>

D. accommodate - verb<\/p>###

* Explanation:<\/p>

We choose the answer (D) accommodate because it fits the most with the meaning of the sentence.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Even though Smithton Electronics' second quarter was not ____ , the company plans to invest large sums on research
childrens.answers: ["profitable","profiting","profitability","profitably"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Even though Smithton Electronics' second quarter was not profitable , the company plans to invest large sums on research<\/p>###

M\u1eb7c dù quý hai c\u1ee7a Smithton Electronics không có l\u1ee3i nhu\u1eadn, công ty có k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0 m\u1ed9t kho\u1ea3n ti\u1ec1n l\u1edbn vào nghiên c\u1ee9u<\/p>

A. có l\u1ee3i nhu\u1eadn - tính t\u1eeb<\/p>

B. \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c l\u1ee3i nhu\u1eadn - tính t\u1eeb (profiting + from)<\/p>

C. kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng sinh l\u1ee3i - danh t\u1eeb<\/p>

D. m\u1ed9t cách có l\u1ee3i nhu\u1eadn - phó t\u1eeb<\/p>###

* Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Ta ch\u1ecdn \u0111áp án (A) profitable \"có l\u1ee3i nhu\u1eadn\" vì sau \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb to be, \u1edf \u0111ây là was not, là m\u1ed9t tính t\u1eeb b\u1ed5 ngh\u0129a cho ch\u1ee7 ng\u1eef.<\/p>","en":"

Even though Smithton Electronics' second quarter was not profitable, the company plans to invest large sums on research<\/p>

A. profitable - adjective<\/p>

B. profiting - adjective (profiting + from)<\/p>

C. profitability - noun<\/p>

D. profitably - adverb<\/p>###

* Explanation:<\/p>

We choose the answer (A) profitable because after the verb to be, which is was not, is an adjective that complement the subject.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The Williamsport Hotel is an ideal venue for the conference because of its ____ to the airport
childrens.answers: ["achievement","proximity","competence","exception"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The Williamsport Hotel is an ideal venue for the conference because of its proximity to the airport<\/p>###

Khách s\u1ea1n Williamsport là m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m lý t\u01b0\u1edfng cho h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb vì nó g\u1ea7n sân bay<\/p>

A. thành t\u1ef1u - danh t\u1eeb<\/p>

B. g\u1ea7n - danh t\u1eeb<\/p>

C. kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng - danh t\u1eeb<\/p>

D. s\u1ef1 ngo\u1ea1i l\u1ee3i - danh t\u1eeb<\/p>###

* Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Ta ch\u1ecdn \u0111áp án (B) proximity \"g\u1ea7n\" vì nó h\u1ee3p ngh\u0129a câu nh\u1ea5t.<\/p>","en":"

The Williamsport Hotel is an ideal venue for the conference because of its proximity to the airport<\/p>

A. achievement - noun<\/p>

B. proximity - noun<\/p>

C. competence - noun<\/p>

D. exception - noun<\/p>###

* Explanation:<\/p>

We choose the answer (B) proximity because it suits the meaning of the sentence the most.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The second training session is for employees ____ responsibilities include processing payroll forms
childrens.answers: ["whose","which","what","who"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The second training session is for employees whose responsibilities include processing payroll forms<\/p>###

Bu\u1ed5i hu\u1ea5n luy\u1ec7n th\u1ee9 hai là dành cho nh\u1eefng nhân viên có trách nhi\u1ec7m trong vi\u1ec7c x\u1eed lý các bi\u1ec3u m\u1eabu l\u01b0\u01a1ng<\/p>

A. c\u1ee7a ai - \u0111\u1ea1i t\u1eeb quan h\u1ec7 ch\u1ec9 s\u1edf h\u1eefu (danh t\u1eeb ch\u1ec9 ng\u01b0\u1eddi + whose + danh t\u1eeb...)<\/p>

B. cái nào - \u0111\u1ea1i t\u1eeb quan h\u1ec7 ch\u1ec9 v\u1eadt (danh t\u1eeb ch\u1ec9 v\u1eadt + which + V + O....)<\/p>

C. cái gì - \u0111\u1ea1i t\u1eeb nghi v\u1ea5n (what + V\/clause)<\/p>

D. ai - \u0111\u1ea1i t\u1eeb quan h\u1ec7 ch\u1ec9 ng\u01b0\u1eddi (danh t\u1eeb ch\u1ec9 ng\u01b0\u1eddi + who + V + O)<\/p>###

* Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Ta ch\u1ecdn \u0111áp án (A) whose \"c\u1ee7a ai\" vì tr\u01b0\u1edbc nó là danh t\u1eeb ch\u1ec9 ng\u01b0\u1eddi employees và sau nó là danh t\u1eeb responsibilities.<\/p>","en":"

The second training session is for employees whose responsibilities include processing payroll forms<\/p>

A. whose - possessive relative pronoun (noun indicating people + whose + noun...)<\/p>

B. which - relative pronoun indicating object (noun indicating object + which + V + O....)<\/p>

C. what - interrogative pronoun (what + V \/ clause)<\/p>

D. who - relative pronoun indicating people (noun indicating people + who + V + O)<\/p>###

* Explanation:<\/p>

We choose the answer (A) whose because before it is the noun employees indicating people and after it is the noun responsibilities<\/p"}

childrens.title: ____ poorly the high-speed printer may be functioning, it is still making copies that are adequate for our purposes
childrens.answers: ["Rather","Seldom","However","Thoroughly"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

However poorly the high-speed printer may be functioning, it is still making copies that are adequate for our purposes<\/p>###

M\u1eb7c dù máy in t\u1ed1c \u0111\u1ed9 cao có th\u1ec3 ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng kém, nó v\u1eabn t\u1ea1o ra các b\u1ea3n sao phù h\u1ee3p cho m\u1ee5c \u0111ích c\u1ee7a chúng tôi.<\/p>

A. Khá - phó t\u1eeb ch\u1ec9 c\u1ea5p \u0111\u1ed9<\/p>

B. Hi\u1ebfm khi - phó t\u1eeb<\/p>

C. M\u1eb7c dù - phó t\u1eeb (However + tính t\u1eeb + S + to be, However + phó t\u1eeb + S + V)<\/p>

D. M\u1ed9t cách toàn di\u1ec7n - phó t\u1eeb<\/p>###

* Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Ta ch\u1ecdn \u0111áp án (C) However \"M\u1eb7c dù\" vì nó có c\u1ea5u trúc However + phó t\u1eeb + S + V và trong câu ta có poorly là phó t\u1eeb, the high-speed printer là ch\u1ee7 t\u1eeb và may be functioning là \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb.<\/p>","en":"

However poorly the high-speed printer may be functioning, it is still making copies that are adequate for our purposes<\/p>

A. Rather - adverb of degree<\/p>

B. Seldom - adverb<\/p>

C. However - adverb (However + adjective + S + to be, However + adverb + S + V)<\/p>

D. Thoroughly - adverb<\/p>###

* Explanation:<\/p>

We choose the answer (C) However because it has the structure However + adverb + S + V and in the sentence we have poorly as adverb, the high-speed printer is the subject and may be functioning as the verb.<\/p>"}

A. gi\u1ea3m - tính t\u1eeb<\/p>

B. ti\u1ebft l\u1ed9 - \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb<\/p>

C. tham v\u1ea5n - \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb<\/p>

Ta ch\u1ecdn \u0111áp án (B) unveiled \"ti\u1ebft l\u1ed9\" vì nó h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi ngh\u0129a câu nh\u1ea5t.<\/p>","en":"

The long-awaited Weka 2XG digital camera will finally be unveiled at a product exhibition on August 16<\/p>

A. reduced - adjective<\/p>

B. unveiled - verb<\/p>

C. consulted - verb<\/p>

D. to resolve - adjective<\/p>###

* Explanation:<\/p>

We choose the answer (B) unveiled because it matches the meaning of the sentence the most.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Northeast Community Finance ____ an online system in order to shorten service lines at branch locations
childrens.answers: ["has implemented","to be implementing","to have been implementing","is implemented"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Northeast Community Finance has implemented an online system in order to shorten service lines at branch locations<\/p>###

C\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng Tài chính \u0110ông B\u1eafc \u0111ã tri\u1ec3n khai m\u1ed9t h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn nh\u1eb1m rút ng\u1eafn \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng dây d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 t\u1ea1i các \u0111i\u1ec3m chi nhánh<\/p>

A. \u0111ã tri\u1ec3n khai - \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb d\u1ea1ng ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ed9ng<\/p>

B. \u0111ang th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n - \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb<\/p>

C. \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n - \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb<\/p>

D. \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u1ef1c thi - \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb d\u1ea1ng b\u1ecb \u0111\u1ed9ng<\/p>###

* Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Câu ch\u01b0a có \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb mà tr\u01b0\u1edbc kho\u1ea3ng tr\u1ed1ng có ch\u1ee7 t\u1eeb là Northeast Community Finance và sau nó là tân ng\u1eef an online system nên ta c\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb d\u1ea1ng ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ed9ng nên mình ch\u1ecdn \u0111áp án (A) has implemented \"\u0111ã tri\u1ec3n khai\".<\/p>","en":"

Northeast Community Finance has implemented an online system in order to shorten service lines at branch locations<\/p>

A. has implemented - active verb<\/p>

B. to be implementing - verb<\/p>

C. to have been implementing - verb<\/p>

D. is implemented - passive verb<\/p>###

* Explanation:<\/p>

The sentence does not have a verb but before the blank space is the subject Northeast Community Finance and after it is the object an online system so we need an active verb and so we choose the answer (A) has implemented.<\/p>"}

parts.name: Text completion
parts.title: Read the texts that follow. A word or pharse is missing in some of the sentences. Four answer choices are given below each of the sentences. Select the best answer to complete the text. Then mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet.

questions.text_read:
Garden Shade Tree Landscaping

Garden Shade creates tree landscapes and hedges to suit every garden, no matter the size. Our designs have __(1)__ small urban gardens as well as large-scale projects commissioned by architects and property developers. __(2)__ . However, no single nursery can offer trees of all species and sizes. That is why Garden Shade has developed close relationships with many specialist growers __(3)__ to provide us with the trees we need. Such resources give us the variety necessary to complete any __(4)__ . In other words, whatever your landscape design dream, we can make it happen.
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Công ty Phong c\u1ea3nh cây c\u1ed1i Garden Shade
Garden Shade t\u1ea1o ra nh\u1eefng hàng rào và phong c\u1ea3nh cây c\u1ed1i phù h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi m\u1ed7i khu v\u01b0\u1eddn b\u1ea5t k\u1ec3 kích th\u01b0\u1edbc. Thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf c\u1ee7a chúng tôi \u0111ã _(1)_ nh\u1eefng khu v\u01b0\u1eddn \u0111ô th\u1ecb nh\u1ecf c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 nh\u1eefng d\u1ef1 án quy mô l\u1edbn \u1ee7y quy\u1ec1n b\u1edfi nh\u1eefng ki\u1ebfn trúc s\u01b0 và nhà phát tri\u1ec3n b\u1ea5t \u0111\u1ed9ng s\u1ea3n._(2)_. Tuy nhiên, không ph\u1ea3i ch\u1ec9 duy nh\u1ea5t m\u1ed9t v\u01b0\u1eddn \u01b0\u01a1m là có th\u1ec3 cung c\u1ea5p cây c\u1ea3nh \u0111\u1ee7 gi\u1ed1ng lo\u1ea1i và kích c\u1ee1. \u0110ó là vì sao Garden Shade \u0111ã phát tri\u1ec3n m\u1ed1i quan h\u1ec7 thân thi\u1ebft v\u1edbi nhi\u1ec1u chuyên gia tr\u1ed3ng tr\u1ecdt _(3)_ nh\u1eb1m cung c\u1ea5p nh\u1eefng lo\u1ea1i cây mà chúng tôi c\u1ea7n. V\u1edbi ngu\u1ed3n l\u1ef1c nh\u01b0 v\u1eady \u0111ã cho chúng tôi s\u1ef1 \u0111a d\u1ea1ng c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft \u0111\u1ec3 hoàn thành b\u1ea5t c\u1ee9 _(4)_. Nói m\u1ed9t cách khác, dù thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf phong c\u1ea3nh trong m\u01a1 c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n là gì \u0111i n\u1eefa thì chúng tôi có th\u1ec3 bi\u1ebfn nó thành hi\u1ec7n th\u1ef1c.<\/p>"}

childrens.answers: ["transformed","related","collected","planted"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

__(1)__<\/p>

A. bi\u1ebfn \u0111\u1ed5i (\u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb)<\/p>

B. có liên quan (tính t\u1eeb) (relate + to + cái gì \u0111ó\/ai \u0111ó)<\/p>

C. thu th\u1eadp (\u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb)<\/p>

D. tr\u1ed3ng (\u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Chúng ta có ch\u1ee7 ng\u1eef Our designs và tân ng\u1eef small urban gardens nên bây gi\u1edd chúng ta c\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb. Câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi (B) related \"có liên quan t\u1edbi\" là không phù h\u1ee3p vì nó là tính t\u1eeb. Nh\u1eefng câu còn l\u1ea1i là \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb và d\u1ef1a trên ý ngh\u0129a c\u1ee7a toàn b\u1ed9 câu, chúng ta ch\u1ecdn câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi (A) transformed \"bi\u1ebfn \u0111\u1ed5i\" vì nó chính xác nh\u1ea5t.<\/p>","en":"

__(1)__<\/p>

A. transformed (v)<\/p>

B. related (adj) (relate + to + sth\/so)<\/p>

C. collected (v)<\/p>

D. planted (v)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

We have the subject Our designs and the object small urban gardens so we now need a verb. The answer (B) related is disqualified as it is an adjective. The rest is a verb and based on the meaning of the whole sentence, we choose answer (A) transformed as the most correct.<\/p>"}

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

D\u1ef1a trên thông tin: \"However, no single nursery can offer trees of all species and sizes\", ta ch\u1ecdn \u0111áp án (B) For most projects, we use trees from our own nurseries \"\u0110\u1ed1i v\u1edbi h\u1ea7u h\u1ebft các d\u1ef1 án, chúng tôi dùng cây t\u1eeb v\u01b0\u1eddn \u01b0\u01a1m c\u1ee7a riêng mình\", ta ch\u1ecdn câu (B).<\/p>","en":"

questions.text_read:
To: Staff
From: Amy Henwith
Date: 15 January
Subject: Exciting news

Dear Staff,

Thanks for a great year! In case you haven't heard, Henwith Home Supply will be __(1)__ our second store this spring. This additional retail site will be located in the shopping center at the corner of Aberton Parkway and Sutton Avenue in Derbyshire.

We will be accepting applications for cashiers and sales positions __(2)__ 1 April. The personnel director will review applicants' qualifications from 2 April to 6 April, and __(3)__ is scheduled to begin one week later. __(4)__ .

Best,

Amy Henwith, CEO
Henwith Home Supply
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

\u0110\u1ebfn: Nhân viên<\/p>

T\u1eeb: Amy Henwith<\/p>

Ngày: 15 tháng 1<\/p>

Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Tin vui<\/p>

Nhân viên thân m\u1ebfn,<\/p>

C\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì m\u1ed9t n\u0103m tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi! N\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n ch\u01b0a bi\u1ebft gì thì c\u1eeda hàng V\u1eadt d\u1ee5ng Nhà \u1edf Henwith s\u1ebd _(1)_ c\u1eeda hàng th\u1ee9 hai c\u1ee7a ta vào mùa xuân này. V\u1ecb trí bán l\u1ebb \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thêm vào này s\u1ebd n\u1eb1m \u1edf trung tâm mua s\u1eafm t\u1ea1i góc ph\u1ed1 \u1edf \u0110\u1ea1i l\u1ed9 Aberton và \u0110\u1ea1i l\u1ed9 Sutton \u1edf Derbyshire.<\/p>

Chúng ta s\u1ebd ch\u1ea5p nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01a1n \u1ee9ng tuy\u1ec3n cho v\u1ecb trí thu ngân và bán hàng _(2)_ 1 tháng 4. Giám \u0111\u1ed1c nhân s\u1ef1 s\u1ebd duy\u1ec7t qua ch\u1ee9ng ch\u1ec9 c\u1ee7a \u1ee9ng viên t\u1eeb ngày 2 tháng 4 \u0111\u1ebfn ngày 6 tháng 4, và _(3)_ \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c d\u1ef1 tính b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u m\u1ed9t tu\u1ea7n sau._(4)_.<\/p>

M\u1ecdi \u0111i\u1ec1u t\u1ed1t \u0111\u1eb9p,<\/p>

Amy Henwith, T\u1ed5ng Giám \u0111\u1ed1c \u0110i\u1ec1u hành<\/p>

C\u1eeda hàng V\u1eadt d\u1ee5ng Nhà \u1edf Henwith<\/p>"}

D. hu\u1ea5n luy\u1ec7n (\u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb)<\/p>###

Chúng ta c\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t ch\u1ee7 ng\u1eef \u1edf \u0111ây. (C) và (D) b\u1ecb lo\u1ea1i vì c\u1ea3 hai là \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb và chúng ta \u0111ã có is scheduled là \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb. Còn l\u1ea1i (A) và (B) và c\u0103n c\u1ee9 trên \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb c\u1ee7a m\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1 là \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb b\u1ecb \u0111\u1ed9ng, câu (B) là câu \u0111úng.<\/p>","en":"

__(3)__<\/p>

A. trainer (n)<\/p>

B. training (n)<\/p>

C. train (v)<\/p>

D. trained (v)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

We need a subject here. (C) and (D) are disqualified since both are verb and we already have is scheduled as verb. That leaves (A) and (B) and base on the verb of the clause which is a passive verb, answer (B) is the correct one.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read:
Amon Donates to Music School in Grenel City

A spokesperson for Brenda Amon __(1)__ that the pianist made a sizeable donation toward the expansion of the Grenel City Conservatory of Music. "Without her generous support," said Marc Diaz, director of facility planning, "we would have been limited in our renovation plans going
forward."

__(2)__ . Now, a new wing will be constructed on the south end of the __(3)__ conservatory. Once completed, the building will boast a 700-seat auditorium, state-of-the-art recording studios, and new faculty and administrative offices. Additionally, private practice rooms will be located __(4)__ the current student lounge.
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Cô Amon t\u1eb7ng Tr\u01b0\u1eddng Thanh Nh\u1ea1c cho Thành ph\u1ed1 Grenel<\/p>

Ng\u01b0\u1eddi phát ngôn c\u1ee7a Brenda Amon _(1)_ r\u1eb1ng ngh\u1ec7 s\u0129 d\u01b0\u01a1ng c\u1ea7m \u0111ã quyên t\u1eb7ng m\u1ed9t kho\u1ea3n l\u1edbn cho s\u1ef1 phát tri\u1ec3n c\u1ee7a Nh\u1ea1c Vi\u1ec7n Thành ph\u1ed1 Grenel. \"N\u1ebfu không có s\u1ef1 \u1ee7ng h\u1ed9 hào phóng c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y thì chúng tôi s\u1ebd không th\u1ec3 ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch tu s\u1eeda \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c.\"<\/p>

_(2)_. Bây gi\u1edd, m\u1ed9t cánh m\u1edbi s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c xây d\u1ef1ng \u1edf h\u01b0\u1edbng nam cu\u1ed1i h\u1ecdc vi\u1ec7n _(3)_. M\u1ed9t khi \u0111ã hoàn thành, tòa nhà s\u1ebd có m\u1ed9t h\u1ed9i tr\u01b0\u1eddng 700 ch\u1ed7 ng\u1ed3i, phòng thu âm hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i cùng v\u0103n phòng khoa và phòng hành chính. Thêm vào \u0111ó, phòng luy\u1ec7n t\u1eadp cá nhân s\u1ebd n\u1eb1m _(4)_ phòng ch\u1edd h\u1ecdc viên hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i.<\/p>"}

Ch\u1ec9 có (C) có \u0111\u1ee7 \u0111i\u1ec1u ki\u1ec7n b\u1edfi vì câu này \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c vi\u1ebft \u1edf thì hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i hoàn thành vì Brenda Amon \u0111ã làm vi\u1ec7c quyên góp trong quá kh\u1ee9 và tin t\u1ee9c này ch\u1ec9 m\u1edbi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c xác nh\u1eadn \u1edf hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i.<\/p>","en":"

childrens.answers: ["adjacent to","even though","instead of","as well as"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

__(4)__<\/p>

A. li\u1ec1n k\u1ec1 v\u1edbi (gi\u1edbi t\u1eeb) (adjacent to = next to + aji \u0111ó\/cái gì \u0111ó)<\/p>

B. m\u1eb7c dù (t\u1eeb n\u1ed1i) (even though + S + V...)<\/p>

C. thay vì (gi\u1edbi t\u1eeb) (instead of + N\/V-ing)<\/p>

D. c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 (liên t\u1eeb) (S + V + as well as + V-ing; S + V + as well as + O; S + \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb nguyên m\u1eabu +...+ as well as + \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb nguyên m\u1eabu)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Chúng ta có \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb located và nó th\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111i kèm v\u1edbi gi\u1edbi t\u1eeb to nên câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi \u0111úng là (A) adjacent to \"li\u1ec1n k\u1ec1 v\u1edbi\".<\/p>","en":"

__(4)__<\/p>

A. adjacent to (prep) (adjacent to = next to + so\/sth)<\/p>

B. even though (linking words) (even though + S + V...)<\/p>

C. instead of (prep) (instead of + N\/V-ing)<\/p>

D. as well as (conj) (S + V + as well as + V-ing; S + V + as well as + O; S + infinitive verb +...+ as well as + infinitive verb)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

We have the verb located and it usually goes with a preposition to so the correct answer is (A) adjacent to.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read:
Date: 11 January
To: Mitchell Parker <[email protected]>
From: Inez Lofaro <[email protected]>
Subject: Product recall

Dear Mr. Parker,

Thank you for your recent __(1)__ of the Daqtex Mini-V camera. We are contacting everyone who has recently bought this product to inform them that certain models are being recalled for repair. In these models, the electronic chip that enables the digital conversion of light is faulty. __(2)__ . Please __(3)__ whether your camera has this problem by checking the serial number on the bottom of the camera. If it ends with the letters TVX, a repair will be required. Daqtex will pay all shipping costs for sending your Mini-V back to us. In addition, we will repair __(4)__ free of charge.

Thank you,

Inez Lofaro, Customer Service Manager
Daqtex Industries
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Ngày: 11 tháng 1<\/p>

\u0110\u1ebfn: Mitchell Parker <[email \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7]><\/p>

T\u1eeb: Inez Lofaro <[email \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7]><\/p>

Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Thu h\u1ed3i s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m<\/p>

Th\u01b0a Ông Parker,<\/p>

C\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì ông _(1)_ máy \u1ea3nh Daqtex Mini-V g\u1ea7n \u0111ây. Chúng tôi \u0111ang liên l\u1ea1c v\u1edbi nh\u1eefng ai \u0111ã mua s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m này g\u1ea7n \u0111ó \u0111\u1ec3 thông báo r\u1eb1ng m\u1ed9t vài m\u1eabu mã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c yêu c\u1ea7u thu h\u1ed3i l\u1ea1i \u0111\u1ec3 s\u1eeda ch\u1eefa. Trong nh\u1eefng m\u1eabu mã \u0111ó, con chíp \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed cho phép chuy\u1ec3n \u0111\u1ed5i ánh sáng k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt s\u1ed1 còn m\u1eafc khuy\u1ebft \u0111i\u1ec3m._(2)_. Xin _(3)_ r\u1eb1ng li\u1ec7u máy \u1ea3nh c\u1ee7a ông có g\u1eb7p v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 này không b\u1eb1ng cách ki\u1ec3m tra chu\u1ed7i s\u1ed1 n\u1eb1m d\u01b0\u1edbi cùng c\u1ee7a máy \u1ea3nh. Daqtex s\u1ebd tr\u1ea3 t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 chi phí v\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n khi ông g\u1eedi Mini-V c\u1ee7a ông v\u1ec1 cho chúng tôi. Thêm vào \u0111ó, chúng tôi s\u1ebd s\u1eeda _(4)_ mi\u1ec5n phí.<\/p>

C\u1ea3m \u01a1n,<\/p>

Inez Lofaro, Giám \u0110\u1ed1c Ch\u0103m sóc Khác hàng<\/p>

Daqtex Industries<\/p>"}

{"vn":"

__(2)__<\/p>

A. Chúng tôi hy v\u1ecdng là b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd t\u1eadn h\u01b0\u1edfng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m này trong nhi\u1ec1u n\u0103m t\u1edbi<\/p>

B. Nó \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nói \u0111\u1ebfn trong ph\u1ea7n kh\u1eafc ph\u1ee5c s\u1ef1 c\u1ed1 c\u1ee7a h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn<\/p>

C. Khuy\u1ebft \u0111i\u1ec3m này cu\u1ed1i cùng s\u1ebd làm \u1ea3nh h\u01b0\u1edfng \u0111\u1ebfn \u0111\u1ed9 rõ ràng c\u1ee7a hình \u1ea3nh<\/p>

D. Tính n\u0103ng \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t này không có s\u1eb5n trong m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 m\u1eabu mã c\u0169<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Chúng ta ch\u1ecdn (C) d\u1ef1a trên thông tin: \"We are contacting everyone who has recently bought this product to inform them that certain models are being recalled for repair. In these models, the electronic chip that enables the digital conversion of light is faulty.\"<\/p>","en":"

__(2)__<\/p>

A. We hope you will enjoy the product for many years to come<\/p>

B. It is covered in the troubleshooting section of the manual<\/p>

C. This defect will eventually interfere with the clarity of your images<\/p>

D. This special feature is unavailable on some older models<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

We choose (C) based on the information: \"We are contacting everyone who has recently bought this product to inform them that certain models are being recalled for repair. In these models, the electronic chip that enables the digital conversion of light is faulty.\"<\/p>"}

childrens.answers: ["verification","verified","verify","verifies"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

__(3)__<\/p>

A. s\u1ef1 xác minh (danh t\u1eeb)<\/p>

B. \u0111ã xác nh\u1eadn (\u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb b\u1ecb \u0111\u1ed9ng)<\/p>

C. xác nh\u1eadn (\u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ed9ng s\u1ed1 nhi\u1ec1u)<\/p>

D. xác minh (\u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ed9ng s\u1ed1 ít)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Chúng ta có c\u1ea3m thán t\u1eeb Please và sau ch\u1ed7 tr\u1ed1ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c tách ra b\u1edfi liên t\u1eeb whether là m\u1ed9t m\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1 nên ta c\u1ea7n \u0111i\u1ec1n m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ed9ng vào nên ta ch\u1ecdn (C) vì nó là chính xác nh\u1ea5t v\u1ec1 m\u1eb7t ng\u1eef pháp.<\/p>","en":"

__(3)__<\/p>

A. verification (n)<\/p>

B. verified (passive verb)<\/p>

C. verify (plural active verb)<\/p>

D. verifies (singular active verb)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

We have the exclamation Please and after the blank space separated by the conjunction whether is a clause so we need to fill the blank with an active verb and so we choose (C) since it is the most correct in terms of grammar.<\/p>"}

childrens.answers: ["mine","it","theirs","these"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

__(4)__<\/p>

A. c\u1ee7a tôi (\u0111\u1ea1i t\u1eeb s\u1edf h\u1eefu)<\/p>

B. nó (\u0111\u1ea1i t\u1eeb nhân x\u01b0ng)<\/p>

C. c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd (\u0111\u1ea1i t\u1eeb s\u1edf h\u1eefu)<\/p>

D. \u0111ây (\u0111\u1ea1i t\u1eeb ch\u1ec9 \u0111\u1ecbnh)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Vì chúng ta có ch\u1ee7 ng\u1eef We, \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb will repair nên ta c\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t tân ng\u1eef. D\u1ef1a trên thông tin: \"Daqtex will pay all shipping costs for sending your Mini-V back to us.\", chúng ta ch\u1ecdn (B) là \u0111\u1ea1i t\u1eeb nhân x\u01b0ng \u1edf v\u1ecb trí tân ng\u1eef thay th\u1ebf cho c\u1ee5m t\u1eeb your Mini-V.<\/p>","en":"

__(4)__<\/p>

A. mine (possessive pronoun)<\/p>

B. it (personal pronoun)<\/p>

C. theirs (possessive pronoun)<\/p>

D. these (demonstrative pronoun)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

Because we have the subject We, the verb will repair so we will need an object. Based on the information: \"Daqtex will pay all shipping costs for sending your Mini-V back to us.\", we choose (B) as it is a personal pronoun in the position of the object replacing the phrase your Mini-V.<\/p>"}

parts.name: Reading comprehension
parts.title: In this part you will read a selection of texts, such as magezine and newspaper articles, letters, and advertisements. Each text is followed by several questions. Select the best answer for each question and mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet.

Are you someone who enjoys trying new things and does not feel uncomfortable in new environment? Then why not get paid for it? CULTURE magazine is looking for individuals to go to ne

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Daniel Mather (9:38 sáng) Chào Sue, cô có làm vi\u1ec7c \u1edf nhà hôm nay không?
Susan Maldini (9:39 sáng) Không, nh\u01b0ng tôi \u0111ang \u1edf m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp ngoài v\u0103n phòng. Có chuy\u1ec7n gì v\u1eady?
Daniel Mather (9:41 sáng) Ng\u01b0\u1eddi qu\u1ea3n lý \u0111ã yêu c\u1ea7u tôi làm b\u1ea3n sao c\u1ee9ng c\u1ee7a m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng cho h\u1ed3 s\u01a1 c\u1ee7a chúng ta. Tôi quên m\u1ea5t th\u1ebb in \u1edf nhà r\u1ed3i. Tôi m\u01b0\u1ee3n c\u1ee7a cô \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c không?
Susan Maldini (9:42 sáng) \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c thôi. Nó n\u1eb1m trong giá \u0111\u1ee1 danh thi\u1ebfp trên bàn làm vi\u1ec7c c\u1ee7a tôi.
Daniel Mather (9:55 sáng) \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i, \u0111ã xong. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n! Tôi \u0111ã \u0111\u1eb7t nó trên bàn c\u1ee7a cô.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What task was Mr. Mather given?

What task was Mr. Mather given?<\/p>

B. To repair the photocopier<\/p>

D. To make copies of some documents<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

Daniel Mather (9:41 A.M.) The manager asked me to make hard copies of some contract agreements for our records.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: At 9:42A.M., what does Ms. Maldini most likely mean when she writes "Sure thing"?
childrens.answers: ["She can lend Mr. Mather her card","She will return to the office","She will contact the manager","She can copy the agreements"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Lúc 9 gi\u1edd 42 sáng, ý c\u1ee7a cô Maldini là sao khi cô \u1ea5y nh\u1eafn \"\u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c thôi\"?<\/p>

A. Cô \u1ea5y có th\u1ec3 cho anh Mather m\u01b0\u1ee3n th\u1ebb<\/p>

B. Cô \u1ea5y s\u1ebd tr\u1edf l\u1ea1i v\u0103n phòng<\/p>

C. Cô \u1ea5y s\u1ebd liên l\u1ea1c v\u1edbi giám \u0111\u1ed1c<\/p>

D. Cô \u1ea5y có th\u1ec3 sao chép các th\u1ecfa thu\u1eadn<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Ta có thông tin:<\/p>

Daniel Mather (9:41 A.M.) The manager asked me to make hard copies of some contract agreements for our records. I forgot my printer card at home. Could I borrow yours?<\/p>

Susan Maldini (9:42 A.M.) Sure thing. It's in the business card holder on my desk.<\/p>

Daniel nói anh \u1ea5y có th\u1ec3 m\u01b0\u1ee3n th\u1ebb in c\u1ee7a cô \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c không và Susan tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi \"\u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c thôi\" \u0111\u1ec3 th\u1ec3 hi\u1ec7n s\u1ef1 ch\u1ea5p thu\u1eadn c\u1ee7a mình. Nên (A) là câu \u0111úng.<\/p>","en":"

At 9:42 A.M., what does Ms. Maldini most likely mean when she writes \"Sure thing\"?<\/p>

A. She can lend Mr. Mather her card<\/p>

B. She will return to the office<\/p>

C. She will contact the manager<\/p>

D. She can copy the agreements<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

We have the information:<\/p>

Daniel Mather (9:41 A.M.) The manager asked me to make hard copies of some contract agreements for our records. I forgot my printer card at home. Could I borrow yours?<\/p>

Susan Maldini (9:42 A.M.) Sure thing. It's in the business card holder on my desk.<\/p>

Daniel asks if he can borrow her printer card and Susan says \"Sure thing\" to express her acceptance. So (A) is correct.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

TH\u01af BÁO<\/p>

\u0110\u1ebfn: Nhân viên Phòng thí nghi\u1ec7m Westhauser
T\u1eeb: Qu\u1ea3n lý khu v\u1ef1c
Ngày: Ngày 22 tháng 3
V\u1ec1: \u0110\u1ed3 u\u1ed1ng gi\u1edd gi\u1ea3o lao<\/p>

B\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u k\u1ec3 t\u1eeb bây gi\u1edd ngay l\u1eadp t\u1ee9c, các nhân viên s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c yêu c\u1ea7u \u0111óng góp vào chi phí cho các lo\u1ea1i \u0111\u1ed3 u\u1ed1ng nóng có s\u1eb5n trong c\u0103n b\u1ebfp mini c\u1ee7a chúng ta. \u0110\u1ed1i v\u1edbi m\u1ed7i c\u1ed1c cà phê ho\u1eb7c trà b\u1ea1n rót cho mình, chúng tôi yêu c\u1ea7u b\u1ea1n b\u1ecf ra 50 xu. Xin l\u01b0u ý r\u1eb1ng s\u1ed1 ti\u1ec1n này v\u1eabn còn ít h\u01a1n nh\u1eefng gì b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd tr\u1ea3 t\u1ea1i quán cà phê c\u1ea1nh tòa nhà c\u1ee7a chúng ta.
M\u1ed7i l\u1ea7n b\u1ea1n chu\u1ea9n b\u1ecb \u0111\u1ed3 u\u1ed1ng, ch\u1ec9 c\u1ea7n \u0111\u1eb7t ti\u1ec1n c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n vào cái ca \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111ánh d\u1ea5u trên qu\u1ea7y k\u1ebf b\u1ed3n r\u1eeda chén. C\u0169ng gi\u1ed1ng nh\u01b0 lúc tr\u01b0\u1edbc, \u0111a d\u1ea1ng nh\u1eefng lô cà phê và trà ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng cao s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c cung c\u1ea5p và s\u1eb5n có \u0111\u1ec3 dùng, và các s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m này s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c cung c\u1ea5p thêm vào h\u1eb1ng tháng. Chúng tôi c\u1ea3m kích v\u1edbi s\u1ef1 thông c\u1ea3m c\u1ee7a các b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ec3 m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi có th\u1ec3 ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c th\u01b0\u1edfng th\u1ee9c \u0111\u1ed3 u\u1ed1ng nóng \u1edf n\u01a1i thu\u1eadn ti\u1ec7n trong su\u1ed1t ngày làm vi\u1ec7c.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is the purpose of the memo?

{"vn":"

childrens.title: What are staff members asked to do?
childrens.answers: ["Bring their own beverages to work","Leave payments in a container","Submit requests for supplies","Keep the kitchenette tidy"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Các nhân viên \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c yêu c\u1ea7u làm gì?<\/p>

A. T\u1ef1 mang \u0111\u1ed3 u\u1ed1ng \u0111\u1ebfn ch\u1ed7 làm<\/p>

B. \u0110\u1ec3 l\u1ea1i ti\u1ec1n vào trong m\u1ed9t cái lon<\/p>

For each cup of coffee or tea, you pour for yourself, we are requesting that you leave fifty cents.<\/p>

Each time you prepare a beverage, just place your payment in the marked can on the counter next to the sink.<\/p>","en":"

A. Bring their own beverages to work<\/p>

C. Submit requests for supplies<\/p>

D. Keep the kitchenette tidy<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

For each cup of coffee or tea, you pour for yourself, we are requesting that you leave fifty cents.<\/p>

Each time you prepare a beverage, just place your payment in the marked can on the counter next to the sink.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Khách Tham Quan B\u1ea3o Tàng Ngh\u1ec7 Thu\u1eadt Hi\u1ec7n \u0110\u1ea1i Milwaukee Xin Chú Ý
Phòng Meacham t\u1ea1m th\u1eddi \u0111óng c\u1eeda \u0111\u1ec3 chúng tôi chu\u1ea9n b\u1ecb m\u1ed9t kho\u1ea3ng không gian cho Bu\u1ed5i tr\u01b0ng bày H\u1ecda s\u0129 Hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i, và nó s\u1ebd kéo dài t\u1eeb ngày 1 tháng 4 \u0111\u1ebfn ngày 30 tháng 6.
Chúng tôi khuy\u1ebfn khích các b\u1ea1n tr\u1edf l\u1ea1i \u0111ây \u0111\u1ec3 tr\u1ea3i nghi\u1ec7m tri\u1ec3n lãm \u0111ang r\u1ea5t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c mong ch\u1edd này v\u1edbi s\u1ef1 xu\u1ea5t hi\u1ec7n c\u1ee7a nh\u1eefng b\u1ee9c tranh, công trình \u0111iêu kh\u1eafc và các công trình \u0111a ph\u01b0\u01a1ng ti\u1ec7n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1ea1o ra b\u1edfi nh\u1eefng h\u1ecda s\u0129 qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf nh\u01b0 Sally Acosta, Frank Kember, Kimberly Hong và Matilda Breeland. \u0110áng chú ý là b\u1ed9 s\u01b0u t\u1eadp \u0111iêu kh\u1eafc c\u1ee7a h\u1ecda s\u0129 m\u1edbi n\u1ed5i Theodore Carmody \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1ec7nh danh là \"Tác ph\u1ea9m \u0111\u1ea7u tay thú v\u1ecb nh\u1ea5t trong th\u1eadp k\u1ef7\" b\u1edfi Ethan Lerner, nhà phê bình n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng và \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c kính tr\u1ecdng nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a Niên s\u1eed H\u1ed9i H\u1ecda Ireland. Thông tin chi ti\u1ebft v\u1ec1 tri\u1ec3n lãm và nh\u1eefng h\u1ecda s\u0129 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u có th\u1ec3 tìm th\u1ea5y t\u1ea1i trang web www.milwaukeemodernart.org. Ho\u1eb7c t\u1ea3i \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng b\u1ea3o tàng c\u1ee7a chúng tôi \u0111\u1ec3 b\u1eaft k\u1ecbp v\u1edbi t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n s\u1eafp t\u1edbi.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is indicated about the museum?
childrens.answers: ["It is promoting an upcoming exhibit on its Web site","It is known for its sculpture exhibits","It will be closed for renovations in April","Its upcoming exhibit is free for museum members"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

\u0110i\u1ec1u gì \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ng\u1ee5 ý v\u1ec1 b\u1ea3o tàng?<\/p>

A. Nó \u0111ang qu\u1ea3ng bá m\u1ed9t tri\u1ec3n lãm s\u1eafp t\u1edbi trên trang web c\u1ee7a nó<\/p>

B. Nó \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c bi\u1ebft \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1edbi nh\u1eefng v\u1eadt tr\u01b0ng bày \u0111iêu kh\u1eafc<\/p>

childrens.title: Who is Ms. Breeland?
childrens.answers: ["A journalist","An artist","A museum curator","An art critic"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Cô Breeland là ai?<\/p>

A. M\u1ed9t nhà báo<\/p>

B. M\u1ed9t h\u1ecda s\u0129<\/p>

We encourage you to return to experience this much-anticipated exhibit that will feature paintings, sculpture, and multimedia works by acclaimed international artists such as Sally Acosta, Frank Kember, Kimberly Hong, and Matilda Breeland.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Thay \u0111\u1ed5i Tr\u1eadt t\u1ef1 Công vi\u1ec7c
T\u1ed5ng Th\u1ea7u Xây D\u1ef1ng: Howard Kleiber, Công ty Xây D\u1ef1ng Mercrest
S\u1ed1 106 \u0110\u01b0\u1eddng Pickens, Columbus, OH 43211
Ch\u1ee7 Tài S\u1ea3n: Oscar Copeland, s\u1ed1 866 \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng Andell, Columbus, Oh 43215
Ngày B\u1eaft \u0110\u1ea7u D\u1ef1 Án: Ngày 10 tháng 7
Ngày K\u1ebft Thúc D\u1ef1 Án: Ngày 15 Tháng 7
Nhà th\u1ea7u \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n các thay \u0111\u1ed5i sau \u0111ây \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi các tài li\u1ec7u h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng:
Mô t\u1ea3 công vi\u1ec7c b\u1ed5 sung\/xoá b\u1ecf: Ngoài t\u1ee7 b\u1ebfp ra, khách hàng bây gi\u1edd s\u1ebd cung c\u1ea5p các gian b\u1ebfp và vòi n\u01b0\u1edbc. Do \u0111ó, t\u1ed5ng chi phí d\u1ef1 án s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111i\u1ec1u ch\u1ec9nh ch\u1ec9 bao g\u1ed3m chi phí l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t.
Giá H\u1ee3p \u0110\u1ed3ng Ban \u0110\u1ea7u: $3,496
Giá Net gi\u1ea3m t\u1eeb h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng tr\u01b0\u1edbc: -$2,412
T\u1ed5ng chi phí d\u1ef1 án v\u1edbi các thay \u0111\u1ed5i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c phê duy\u1ec7t: $1,084
Ti\u1ebfn \u0111\u1ed9 thanh toán \u0111ã s\u1eeda \u0111\u1ed5i: 15% t\u1ed5ng chi phí d\u1ef1 án ($162) ph\u1ea3i tr\u1ea3 tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o cho nhà th\u1ea7u, $222 có th\u1eddi h\u1ea1n vào ngày b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u d\u1ef1 án, và ph\u1ea7n còn l\u1ea1i ($700) có th\u1eddi h\u1ea1n khi d\u1ef1 án hoàn thành.
\u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c công nh\u1eadn b\u1edfi:
Nhà Th\u1ea7u: Howard Kleiber
Ch\u1ee7 S\u1edf H\u1eefu: Oscar Copeland<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Why has the price of a project been adjusted?
childrens.answers: ["The client is providing all the materials","The client wants to match a competitor's price","The contractor installed countertops incorrectly","The contractor overestimated the cost of labor"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

T\u1ea1i sao giá c\u1ee7a m\u1ed9t d\u1ef1 án \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111i\u1ec1u ch\u1ec9nh?<\/p>

A. Khách hàng cung c\u1ea5p t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 v\u1eadt li\u1ec7u<\/p>

B. Khách hàng mu\u1ed1n kh\u1edbp v\u1edbi giá c\u1ee7a \u0111\u1ed1i th\u1ee7 c\u1ea1nh tranh<\/p>

C. Nhà th\u1ea7u \u0111ã cài \u0111\u1eb7t sai qu\u1ea7y trong b\u1ebfp<\/p>

D. Nhà th\u1ea7u \u0111ánh giá quá cao chi phí lao \u0111\u1ed9ng<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

Description of Work Added\/Deleted: Client will now be supplying the countertops and faucet in addition to the kitchen cabinets. Therefore, the total project cost will be adjusted to only include the cost of installation.<\/p>","en":"

Why has the price of a project been adjusted?<\/p>

A. The client is providing all the materials<\/p>

B. The client wants to match a competitor's price<\/p>

C. The contractor installed countertops incorrectly<\/p>

D. The contractor overestimated the cost of labor<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

Description of Work Added\/Deleted: Client will now be supplying the countertops and faucet in addition to the kitchen cabinets. Therefore, the total project cost will be adjusted to only include the cost of installation.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

\u0110\u1ebfn: Dahlia Pawar <dpawar@bronsonco.ca>
T\u1eeb: Anna Bondell <abondell@noaaa.com>
Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Thông tin
Ngày: 25 tháng 8
Th\u01b0a Cô Pawar:
C\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì \u0111ã ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c làm h\u1ed9i viên c\u1ee7a Hi\u1ec7p h\u1ed9i Ki\u1ebfn trúc s\u01b0 B\u1eafc M\u1ef9. Tôi vi\u1ebft th\u01b0 này \u0111\u1ec3 nh\u1eafc cô r\u1eb1ng vi\u1ec7c \u0111\u0103ng ký tr\u01b0\u1edbc cho h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb hàng n\u0103m h\u1ebft h\u1ea1n vào ngày 15 tháng 9. —[1]—. H\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb n\u0103m nay s\u1ebd có h\u01a1n 100 phiên, m\u1ed9t phòng tri\u1ec3n lãm, và các h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t. —[2]—.
\u0110\u0103ng ký tr\u01b0\u1edbc s\u1ebd giúp cô ti\u1ebft ki\u1ec7m 30 \u0111ô la l\u1ec7 phí \u0111\u0103ng ký th\u01b0\u1eddng. —[3]—. \u0110\u1ed3ng th\u1eddi, cô s\u1ebd có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u0103ng ký tr\u01b0\u1edbc theo nhóm tham quan thành ph\u1ed1 và cho b\u1eefa ti\u1ec7c VIP v\u1ed1n luôn kín ch\u1ed7 m\u1ed9t cách nhanh chóng. Truy c\u1eadp trang web c\u1ee7a chúng tôi \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u0103ng ký tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn. —[4]---.N\u1ebfu cô mu\u1ed1n \u0111\u0103ng ký b\u1eb1ng \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i, hãy liên h\u1ec7 v\u1edbi chúng tôi t\u1ea1i s\u1ed1 1-249-555-0177. Vui lòng nh\u1edb mã s\u1ed1 h\u1ed9i viên c\u1ee7a mình.
R\u1ea5t mong \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c g\u1eb7p cô \u1edf thành ph\u1ed1 Mexico!
Chân thành,
Anna Bondell
\u0110i\u1ec1u Ph\u1ed1i H\u1ed9i Viên<\/p>"}
