childrens.title: What is NOT a benefit of conference preregistration?
childrens.answers: ["A tour of Mexico City","A hotel room upgrade","Admission to a dinner","Reduced registration fees"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

D\u01b0\u1edbi \u0111ây câu nào không ph\u1ea3i là quy\u1ec1n l\u1ee3i khi \u0111\u0103ng ký h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1edbc?<\/p>

A. M\u1ed9t tour du l\u1ecbch thành ph\u1ed1 Mexico<\/p>

B. Nâng c\u1ea5p phòng khách s\u1ea1n<\/p>

C. Vào c\u1eeda m\u1ed9t b\u1eefa \u0103n t\u1ed1i<\/p>

D. Gi\u1ea3m l\u1ec7 phí \u0111\u0103ng ký<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Chúng ta có thông tin:<\/p>

Preregistration will save you $30 off the regular registration fee.<\/p>

At the same time, you'll be able to sign up in advance for a group tour of the city and for the VIP Banquet, which always fills up quickly.<\/p>

Quy\u1ec1n l\u1ee3i duy nh\u1ea5t không có \u1edf \u0111ây là nâng c\u1ea5p phòng khách s\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ec3 ta ch\u1ecdn (B).<\/p>","en":"

What is NOT a benefit of conference preregistration?<\/p>

A. A tour of Mexico City<\/p>

B. A hotel room upgrade<\/p>

C. Admission to a dinner<\/p>

D. Reduced registration fees<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

We have the information:<\/p>

Preregistration will save you $30 off the regular registration fee.<\/p>

At the same time, you'll be able to sign up in advance for a group tour of the city and for the VIP Banquet, which always fills up quickly.<\/p>

The only benefit missing is a hotel room upgrade so we choose (B).<\/p>"}

childrens.title: In which of the positions marked [1], [2], [3], and [4] does the following sentence best belong? "You will also find the complete conference program there."
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Trong nh\u1eefng v\u1ecb trí \u0111ánh d\u1ea5u [1], [2], [3], và [4] thì câu \"B\u1ea1n c\u0169ng s\u1ebd tìm th\u1ea5y ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb hoàn ch\u1ec9nh t\u1ea1i \u0111ây\" thu\u1ed9c v\u1ec1 ch\u1ed7 nào?<\/p>

A. [1]<\/p>

B. [2]<\/p>

C. [3]<\/p>

D. [4]<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Câu có nh\u1eafc \u0111\u1ebfn there \"t\u1ea1i \u0111ây\" là ch\u1ec9 m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m. Ta không th\u1ea5y có nh\u1eafc \u0111\u1ebfn n\u01a1i ch\u1ed1n tr\u01b0\u1edbc ho\u1eb7c sau v\u1ecb trí [1], [2] và [3]. Tr\u01b0\u1edbc [4] ta có thông tin: \"Visit our Web site to register online.\" nên ta ch\u1ecdn (D).<\/p>","en":"

In which of the positions marked [1], [2], [3], and [4] does the following sentence best belong?\"You will also find the complete conference program there.\"<\/p>

A. [1]<\/p>

B. [2]<\/p>

C. [3]<\/p>

D. [4]<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

The sentence mentions \"there\" which means a location. We see no mention of places before or after [1], [2] and [3]. Before [4] we have the information: \"Visit our Web site to register online.\" so we choose (D).<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Kurt Webber (4:30 chi\u1ec1u) Jake và tôi \u0111\u1ecbnh \u0111i \u0103n sau khi gi\u1edd làm vi\u1ec7c kho\u1ea3ng 5:30. Có ai mu\u1ed1n tham gia không?
Davi Avril (4:31 chi\u1ec1u). Tôi v\u1eabn còn vài vi\u1ec7c ph\u1ea3i làm trong báo cáo gi\u1eefa n\u0103m. Anh \u0111\u1ecbnh \u0111i \u0111âu?
Kurt Webber (4:32 chi\u1ec1u) Chúng tôi \u0111\u1ecbnh \u0111\u1ebfn m\u1ed9t nhà hàng Mexico m\u1edbi t\u1ea1i \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng Slate. Nó g\u1ecdi là Ocho Coronas.
Tim Foxx (4:33 chi\u1ec1u) M\u1ea5y anh không g\u1eb7p may r\u1ed3i. N\u01a1i \u0111ó \u0111ã \u0111óng c\u1eeda vào vài ngày tr\u01b0\u1edbc.
Kurt Webber (4:34 chi\u1ec1u) T\u1ec7 th\u1eadt \u0111\u1ea5y. Tôi \u0111ã nghe \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nh\u1eefng \u0111i\u1ec1u tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi v\u1ec1 nó.
Tim Foxx (4:36 chi\u1ec1u) V\u1eady quán Lotus Tacos \u1edf góc ph\u1ed1 thì nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf nào? H\u1ecd luôn có th\u1ef1c \u0111\u01a1n \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t vào th\u1ee9 sáu.
Kurt Webber (4:37 chi\u1ec1u) Nghe tuy\u1ec7t \u0111\u1ea5y. Anh có mu\u1ed1n \u0111\u1ebfn Lotus Tacos không, Jake?
Davi Avril (4:38 chi\u1ec1u) \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c, nh\u01b0ng tôi s\u1ebd không th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ebfn \u0111ó cho \u0111\u1ebfn kho\u1ea3ng 6 gi\u1edd.
Jake Rivas (4:39 chi\u1ec1u) Nghe hay \u0111\u1ea5y. Và Davi à, tôi v\u1eeba g\u1eedi cho anh d\u1eef li\u1ec7u c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt cho báo cáo r\u1ed3i \u0111\u1ea5y.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What are the writers discussing?
childrens.answers: ["Where to hold a company banquet","What restaurant serves the best food","What is on the menu at Ocho Coronas","Where to go for dinner"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi vi\u1ebft \u0111ang th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn v\u1ec1 \u0111i\u1ec1u gì?<\/p>

A. N\u01a1i t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c \u0111\u1ea1i ti\u1ec7c công ty<\/p>

B. Nhà hàng nào ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 th\u1ee9c \u0103n ngon nh\u1ea5t<\/p>

C. Có gì trên th\u1ef1c \u0111\u01a1n \u1edf Ocho Coronas<\/p>

D. Nên \u0111i \u0103n t\u1ed1i \u1edf \u0111âu<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

Kurt Webber (4:30 P.M.) Jake and I are grabbing a bite to eat after work, around 5:30. Anyone care to join us?<\/p>

Davi Avril (4:31 P.M.) Maybe. I still have some work to do on the midyear report. Where are you planning to go?<\/p>","en":"

What are the writers discussing?<\/p>

A. Where to hold a company banquet<\/p>

B. What restaurant serves the best food<\/p>

C. What is on the menu at Ocho Coronas<\/p>

D. Where to go for dinner<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

Kurt Webber (4:30 P.M.) Jake and I are grabbing a bite to eat after work, around 5:30. Anyone care to join us?<\/p>

Davi Avril (4:31 P.M.) Maybe. I still have some work to do on the midyear report. Where are you planning to go?<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What information does Mr. Foxx provide about Ocho Coronas?
childrens.answers: ["People have recommended it to him","It usually opens early on Fridays","The food there is not very authentic","It is no longer in business"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Anh Foxx cung c\u1ea5p thông tin gì v\u1ec1 Ocho Coronas?<\/p>

A. Ng\u01b0\u1eddi ta \u0111ã gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u nó cho anh ta<\/p>

B. N\u01a1i \u0111ó th\u01b0\u1eddng m\u1edf c\u1eeda s\u1edbm vào th\u1ee9 sáu<\/p>

C. Th\u1ee9c \u0103n \u1edf \u0111ó không \u0111áng tin l\u1eafm<\/p>

D. Nó không còn kinh doanh n\u1eefa<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

Kurt Webber (4:32 P.M.) We're thinking of trying the new Mexican place on Slate Road. It's called Ocho Coronas.<\/p>

Tim Foxx (4:33 P.M.) You're out of luck. That place closed a few days ago.<\/p>","en":"

What information does Mr. Foxx provide about Ocho Coronas?<\/p>

A. People have recommended it to him<\/p>

B. It usually opens early on Fridays<\/p>

C. The food there is not very authentic<\/p>

D. It is no longer in business<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

Kurt Webber (4:32 P.M.) We're thinking of trying the new Mexican place on Slate Road. It's called Ocho Coronas.<\/p>

Tim Foxx (4:33 P.M.) You're out of luck. That place closed a few days ago.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: At 4:34P.M., why most likely does Mr. Webber write, "That's too bad"?
childrens.answers: ["He wanted to try a new restaurant","Mr. Foxx cannot complete a project","Slate Road is too far away","He has a scheduling conflict"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Vào lúc 4:34 chi\u1ec1u, t\u1ea1i sao anh Webber l\u1ea1i vi\u1ebft, \"T\u1ec7 th\u1eadt \u0111\u1ea5y\"?<\/p>

A. Anh ta mu\u1ed1n \u0103n th\u1eed nhà hàng m\u1edbi<\/p>

B. Anh Foxx không th\u1ec3 hoàn thành d\u1ef1 án<\/p>

C. \u0110\u01b0\u1eddng Slate quá xa<\/p>

D. Anh ta có s\u1ef1 va ch\u1ea1m v\u1ec1 l\u1ecbch trình<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Anh Webber vi\u1ebft: \"T\u1ec7 th\u1eadt \u0111\u1ea5y\" \u0111\u1ec3 bày t\u1ecf s\u1ef1 th\u1ea5t v\u1ecdng c\u1ee7a mình \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi vi\u1ec7c \u0111óng c\u1eeda c\u1ee7a Ocho Coronas.<\/p>","en":"

At 4:34 P.M., why most likely does Mr. Webber write, \"That's too bad\"?<\/p>

A. He wanted to try a new restaurant<\/p>

B. Mr. Foxx cannot complete a project<\/p>

C. Slate Road is too far away<\/p>

D. He has a scheduling conflict<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

Mr. Webber writes: \"That's too bad\" to express his disappointment over Ocho Coronas's closing down.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What does Mr. Avril decide to do?
childrens.answers: ["Research nearby restaurants","Work extra hours tomorrow","Join his coworkers for a meal","Have food delivered to the office"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Anh Avril quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh làm gì?<\/p>

A. Tìm hi\u1ec3u v\u1ec1 nhà hàng g\u1ea7n \u0111ó<\/p>

B. Làm thêm gi\u1edd vào ngày mai<\/p>

D. G\u1ecdi giao th\u1ee9c \u0103n \u0111\u1ebfn v\u0103n phòng<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

Tim Foxx (4:36 P.M.) How about Lotus Tacos around the corner? They always have a special menu on Fridays.<\/p>

Kurt Webber (4:37 P.M.) That would be great. Do you want to go to Lotus Tacos, Jake?<\/p>

Davi Avril (4:38 P.M.) OK, but I won't be able to get there till about six.<\/p>","en":"

What does Mr. Avril decide to do?<\/p>

A. Research nearby restaurants<\/p>

B. Work extra hours tomorrow<\/p>

C. Join his coworkers for a meal<\/p>

D. Have food delivered to the office<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

Tim Foxx (4:36 P.M.) How about Lotus Tacos around the corner? They always have a special menu on Fridays.<\/p>

Kurt Webber (4:37 P.M.) That would be great. Do you want to go to Lotus Tacos, Jake?<\/p>

Davi Avril (4:38 P.M.) OK, but I won't be able to get there till about six.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

T\u1ea1p Chí Ti\u1ebfng Nói \u0110a Qu\u1ed1c Gia<\/p>

PO Box 17999<\/p>

Greenlane<\/p>

Auckland 1546<\/p>

Tuata Wehi<\/p>

S\u1ed1 16 Ph\u1ed1 Page<\/p>

Wellington 6023<\/p>

Th\u01b0a Ông Wehi,<\/p>

Vào ngày 25 tháng 3, gói \u0111\u0103ng ký dùng th\u1eed 3 tháng t\u1ea1p chí Ti\u1ebfng Nói \u0110a Qu\u1ed1c Gia c\u1ee7a ông s\u1ebd h\u1ebft h\u1ea1n. \u0110\u1ec3 ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nh\u1eadn ngu\u1ed3n tin quan tr\u1ecdng này, vui lòng \u0111i\u1ec1n vào th\u1ebb gia h\u1ea1n tr\u1ea3 theo b\u01b0u phí bao g\u1ed3m lá th\u01b0 này và g\u1eedi kèm chúng tr\u01b0\u1edbc cu\u1ed1i tháng này. Ông có th\u1ec3 ch\u1ecdn \u0111\u0103ng ký gói t\u1eeb ba tháng, sáu tháng, m\u1ed9t n\u0103m ho\u1eb7c hai n\u0103m. Xin l\u01b0u ý r\u1eb1ng \u0111\u1ec1 ngh\u1ecb hai n\u0103m c\u1ee7a chúng tôi là ti\u1ebft ki\u1ec7m nh\u1ea5t hi\u1ec7n nay. Ngoài ra, l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn 1 và 2 n\u0103m c\u0169ng bao g\u1ed3m phiên b\u1ea3n \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t \"Ng\u01b0\u1eddi N\u1ed5i B\u1eadt c\u1ee7a N\u0103m\".
C\u1ea3m \u01a1n m\u1ed9t l\u1ea7n n\u1eefa vì \u0111ã ch\u1ecdn t\u1ea1p Ti\u1ebfng Nói \u0110a Qu\u1ed1c Gia. Chúng tôi s\u1ebd liên t\u1ee5c c\u1ed1 g\u1eafng cung c\u1ea5p nh\u1eefng bài t\u01b0\u1eddng thu\u1eadt t\u1ed1t nh\u1ea5t v\u1ec1 các v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 toàn c\u1ea7u t\u1eeb quan \u0111i\u1ec3m c\u1ee7a New Zealand. \u0110\u1ec3 g\u1eedi ph\u1ea3n h\u1ed3i c\u1ee7a mình, vui lòng truy c\u1eadp trang www.mvmagazine. co.nz và \u0111i\u1ec1n vào bi\u1ec3u m\u1eabu nh\u1eadn xét tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn c\u1ee7a chúng tôi.<\/p>

Chân thành<\/p>

Estelle Pearson, Ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0110\u1ea1i Di\u1ec7n Ch\u0103m Sóc Khách Hàng<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Why was the letter sent to Mr. Wehi?
childrens.answers: ["To report a late payment","To offer him a refund","To promote a new service","To remind him to resubscribe"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

T\u1ea1i sao lá th\u01b0 l\u1ea1i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c g\u1eedi \u0111\u1ebfn anh Wehi?<\/p>

A. \u0110\u1ec3 báo v\u1ec1 m\u1ed9t kho\u1ea3n thanh toán tr\u1ec5 h\u1ea1n<\/p>

B. \u0110\u1ec1 ngh\u1ecb hoàn ti\u1ec1n<\/p>

C. Qu\u1ea3ng cáo m\u1ed9t d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 m\u1edbi<\/p>

D. \u0110\u1ec3 nh\u1eafc nh\u1edf anh ta \u0111\u0103ng ký nh\u1eadn báo l\u1ea1i<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

On 25 March, your three-month trial subscription to Multinational Voice Magazine will expire. To continue to receive this vital news resource, please fill out the postage-paid renewal card included with this letter and mail it in before the end of this month.<\/p>","en":"

Why was the letter sent to Mr. Wehi?<\/p>

A. To report a late payment<\/p>

B. To offer him a refund<\/p>

C. To promote a new service<\/p>

D. To remind him to resubscribe<\/p>###

C\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì câu h\u1ecfi c\u1ee7a anh. Có m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 chi\u1ebfc vali trong kho c\u1ee7a chúng tôi kh\u1edbp v\u1edbi mô t\u1ea3 mà anh cung c\u1ea5p, nh\u01b0ng chúng tôi không tìm th\u1ea5y cái có g\u1eafn th\u1ebb tên xác \u0111\u1ecbnh anh là ch\u1ee7 s\u1edf h\u1eefu. Anh s\u1ebd c\u1ea7n ph\u1ea3i ghé qua và tìm ch\u1ed7 vali c\u1ee7a mình \u1edf s\u1ed1 620 Ph\u1ed1 Baker. Xin l\u01b0u ý r\u1eb1ng anh s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c yêu c\u1ea7u cho bi\u1ebft th\u1eddi gian xe buýt c\u1ee7a anh r\u1eddi sân bay ho\u1eb7c t\u1ed1t h\u01a1n h\u1ebft là trình vé n\u1ebfu anh v\u1eabn còn có nó.
Chúng tôi m\u1edf c\u1eeda t\u1eeb 6 gi\u1edd sáng \u0111\u1ebfn 10 gi\u1edd t\u1ed1i m\u1ed7i ngày. Xin \u0111\u1eebng trì hoãn. Do s\u1ed1 l\u01b0\u1ee3ng l\u1edbn các món \u0111\u1ed3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c tìm th\u1ea5y b\u1edfi tài x\u1ebf c\u1ee7a chúng tôi, chúng tôi không có l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn nào khác ngoài vi\u1ec7c gi\u1edbi h\u1ea1n th\u1eddi gian l\u01b0u tr\u1eef ch\u1ec9 trong 7 ngày và ph\u1ea3i x\u1eed lý nh\u1eefng món \u0111\u1ed3 sau \u0111ó.
Trân tr\u1ecdng,
Gina Steiner
Xe buýt Sân bay Morgan<\/p>"}

questions.text_read:
Spectacular Bridge Created with Super Cranes

By Marcia Brunon
March 14

Five years ago, the town of Stonewell, situated at the foot of the Marshall Mountains, decided to finance the building of a bridge across the Stonewell River. It was planned as a much-needed northern route for the town. - [1] - . The efficiency of the project was directly attributable to two RWC451 cranes, manufactured by Ronsonworks, a company based in England.

The two identical tower cranes were owned by the construction firm Redding Builders. One crane was assembled at the south bank of the river, while the other one was placed on a concrete pylon in the center of the Stonewell River. - [2] - . The assembly of the second crane was particularly challenging, as it required the use of another crane on a floating barge.

"Any large project is going to require unforeseen adjustments that may disrupt an official construction schedule," said Roger Lee, chief engineer of Redding Builders. - [3] - . In this case, the metal anchors that connected the bridge to the pylons were determined to be too small. The new anchors weighed 22 tons, which is within the safe lifting capacity of an RWC451 crane. - [4] - . Engineers reinforced the existing cranes for extra security, and the cranes performed well.

Today, this postcard-worthy bridge is the pride of Stonewell, featuring viewing platforms for pedestrians, hikers, and visitors at the base of each pier overlooking the mountainous valley. Construction materials and colors harmonize beautifully with the local environment. All design elements, including the piers, viewing platforms, and railings, complement the natural landscape, making the bridge a hit with everyone from hikers to the truck drivers who now include it in their regular route.
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Cây C\u1ea7u \u0110\u1eb9p M\u1eaft \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c T\u1ea1o Ra B\u1edfi Siêu C\u1ea7n C\u1ea9u<\/p>

B\u1edfi Marcia Brunon
Ngày 14 tháng 3<\/p>

N\u0103m n\u0103m tr\u01b0\u1edbc, th\u1ecb tr\u1ea5n Stonewell, n\u1eb1m \u1edf chân dãy núi Marshall, quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh tài tr\u1ee3 vi\u1ec7c xây d\u1ef1ng m\u1ed9t cây c\u1ea7u b\u1eafc ngang con sông Stonewell. Nó \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c d\u1ef1 tính là m\u1ed9t tuy\u1ebfn \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng mi\u1ec1n B\u1eafc r\u1ea5t c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft cho th\u1ecb tr\u1ea5n. - [1] - .Hi\u1ec7u su\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a d\u1ef1 án có tr\u1ef1c ti\u1ebfp liên quan \u0111\u1ebfn hai chi\u1ebfc c\u1ea7n c\u1ea9u RWC451, \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t b\u1edfi Ronsonworks, m\u1ed9t công ty có tr\u1ee5 s\u1edf \u1edf Anh.<\/p>

Hai c\u1ea7n c\u1ea9u gi\u1ed1ng h\u1ec7t nhau \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1edf h\u1eefu b\u1edfi công ty xây d\u1ef1ng Redding Builders. M\u1ed9t c\u1ea7n c\u1ea9u \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c l\u1eafp ráp t\u1ea1i b\u1edd sông phía Nam, trong khi cái còn l\u1ea1i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1eb7t trên m\u1ed9t c\u1ed9t tháp bê tông \u1edf gi\u1eefa sông Stonewell. - [2] - .Vi\u1ec7c l\u1eafp ráp c\u1ee7a c\u1ea7n c\u1ea9u th\u1ee9 hai \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t khó kh\u0103n, khi mà nó c\u1ea7n s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng m\u1ed9t c\u1ea7n tr\u1ee5c khác trên m\u1ed9t sà lan n\u1ed5i.<\/p>

\"B\u1ea5t kì d\u1ef1 án l\u1edbn nào c\u0169ng s\u1ebd ph\u1ea3i c\u1ea7n nh\u1eefng \u0111i\u1ec1u ch\u1ec9nh không l\u01b0\u1eddng tr\u01b0\u1edbc mà có th\u1ec3 làm gián \u0111o\u1ea1n l\u1ecbch trình xây d\u1ef1ng chính th\u1ee9c,\" Roger Lee, K\u1ef9 s\u01b0 Tr\u01b0\u1edfng c\u1ee7a Redding Builders cho bi\u1ebft.- [3] - .Trong tr\u01b0\u1eddng h\u1ee3p này, nh\u1eefng m\u1ecf neo kim lo\u1ea1i k\u1ebft n\u1ed1i cây c\u1ea7u t\u1edbi các c\u1ed9t tháp \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c xác \u0111\u1ecbnh là quá nh\u1ecf. Nh\u1eefng m\u1ecf neo m\u1edbi n\u1eb7ng 22 t\u1ea5n, n\u1eb1m trong kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng nâng an toàn c\u1ee7a m\u1ed9t c\u1ea7n c\u1ea9u RWC451. - [4] - .Các k\u1ef9 s\u01b0 \u0111ã gia c\u1ed1 c\u1ea7n c\u1ea9u hi\u1ec7n có \u0111\u1ec3 thêm an toàn, và các c\u1ea7n c\u1ea9u \u0111ã ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1ed1t.<\/p>

Ngày hôm nay, cây c\u1ea7u x\u1ee9ng \u0111áng n\u1eb1m trong t\u1ea5m b\u01b0u thi\u1ebfp này là ni\u1ec1m t\u1ef1 hào c\u1ee7a Stonewell, n\u1ed5i b\u1eadt v\u1edbi nh\u1eefng b\u1ec7 quan sát cho khách b\u1ed9 hành, ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111i b\u1ed9 \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng dài, và du khách t\u1ea1i c\u01a1 s\u1edf c\u1ee7a m\u1ed7i b\u1ebfn tàu nhìn ra thung l\u0169ng núi. V\u1eadt li\u1ec7u xây d\u1ef1ng và màu s\u1eafc hòa quy\u1ec7n m\u1ed9t cách tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi v\u1edbi môi tr\u01b0\u1eddng xung quanh. T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các y\u1ebfu t\u1ed1 thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf, bao g\u1ed3m c\u1ea7u c\u1ea3ng, b\u1ec7 quan sát, và hàng rào, làm cân b\u1eb1ng cho c\u1ea3nh quan t\u1ef1 nhiên, khi\u1ebfn cho cây c\u1ea7u tr\u1edf nên n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng v\u1edbi t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi t\u1eeb nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111i b\u1ed9 \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng dài \u0111\u1ebfn các tài x\u1ebf xe t\u1ea3i b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u \u0111i qua \u0111ây th\u01b0\u1eddng xuyên.<\/p>"}

Today, this postcard-worthy bridge is the pride of Stonewell, featuring viewing platforms for pedestrians, hikers, and visitors at the base of each pier overlooking the mountainous valley. Construction materials and colors harmonize beautifully with the local environment.<\/p>

Only the detail in (D) is missing, so we choose (D).<\/p>"}

childrens.title: In which of the positions marked [1], [2] , [3], and [4] does the following sentence best belong? "The project, which was expected to take four years, was completed in less than three."
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Trong nh\u1eefng v\u1ecb trí \u0111ánh d\u1ea5u [1], [2], [3], và [4] thì câu \"D\u1ef1 án, v\u1ed1n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c tính là s\u1ebd m\u1ea5t 4 n\u0103m, nay \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c hoàn thành trong vòng ch\u01b0a \u0111\u1ea7y 3 n\u0103m\" n\u1eb1m \u1edf \u0111âu là \u0111úng nh\u1ea5t?<\/p>

A. [1]<\/p>

B. [2]<\/p>

C. [3]<\/p>

D. [4]<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

\u0110o\u1ea1n v\u0103n c\u1ee7a v\u1ecb trí [2] nói v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec7c l\u1eafp ráp c\u1ea7n c\u1ea9u trong khi \u0111o\u1ea1n v\u0103n c\u1ee7a v\u1ecb trí [3] và [4] nói v\u1ec1 quá trình xây d\u1ef1ng. Không có b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 \u0111\u1ec1 c\u1eadp nào v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec7c cây c\u1ea7u \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c hoàn thành nên ta ch\u1ecdn câu (A) v\u1ecb trí [1].<\/p>","en":"

In which of the positions marked [1], [2], [3], and [4] does the following sentence best belong? \"The project, which was expected to take four years, was completed in less than three.\"<\/p>

A. [1]<\/p>

B. [2]<\/p>

C. [3]<\/p>

D. [4]<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

The paragraph of [2] talks about the assembly of the cranes while the paragraph of [3] and [4] talks about the construction process. There is no mention of the completion of the bridge in those three positions so we choose (A) [1].<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

\u0110\u1ebfn: Nhân viên Công Ty Lu\u1eadt Absalom và Twigg
T\u1eeb: Shawna Montgomery, Qu\u1ea3n Lý V\u0103n Phòng
Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: K\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch tháng 3
G\u1eedi ngày: 12 Tháng 2
\u0110ính Kèm: L\u1ecbch trình
Nh\u01b0 h\u1ea7u h\u1ebft các b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ec1u bi\u1ebft, l\u1ecbch c\u1ee7a chúng ta s\u1ebd có m\u1ed9t chút khó kh\u0103n vào tu\u1ea7n \u0111\u1ea7u tiên c\u1ee7a tháng 3. Nhi\u1ec1u phòng và v\u0103n phòng khác nhau s\u1ebd c\u1ea7n ph\u1ea3i b\u1ecf tr\u1ed1ng m\u1ed9t kho\u1ea3ng th\u1eddi gian nh\u1ea5t \u0111\u1ecbnh \u0111\u1ec3 nhóm th\u1ee3 làm công vi\u1ec7c s\u01a1n l\u1ea1i, tr\u1ea3i th\u1ea3m và thay th\u1ebf \u0111\u1ed3 n\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t c\u0169. Nh\u1eefng nhân viên b\u1ecb \u1ea3nh h\u01b0\u1edfng c\u1ea7n ph\u1ea3i \u0111óng gói v\u1eadt d\u1ee5ng v\u0103n phòng c\u1ee7a mình vào thùng lúc 3 gi\u1edd chi\u1ec1u tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi phòng c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c lên l\u1ecbch tu s\u1eeda (vui lòng xem l\u1ecbch \u0111ính kèm). Hai nhóm th\u1ee3 s\u1ebd làm vi\u1ec7c t\u1ea1i ch\u1ed7 nên c\u1ea7n b\u1ecf tr\u1ed1ng nhi\u1ec1u h\u01a1n m\u1ed9t phòng vào lúc \u0111ó. L\u01b0u ý r\u1eb1ng b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 phòng nào có l\u1ecbch tu s\u1eeda vào th\u1ee9 hai ph\u1ea3i \u0111óng gói \u0111\u1ed3 \u0111\u1ea1c và b\u1ecf tr\u1ed1ng vào chi\u1ec1u th\u1ee9 sáu, ngày 27 tháng 2.
Thùng \u0111\u1ef1ng s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c cung c\u1ea5p. \u0110\u1eb7t thùng c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n trong phòng \u0111\u1ec3 nhóm th\u1ee3 di d\u1eddi chúng. Xin hãy dán tên và s\u1ed1 phòng c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ec3 nhóm th\u1ee3 có th\u1ec3 tr\u1ea3 chúng v\u1ec1 \u0111úng v\u0103n phòng m\u1ed9t khi công vi\u1ec7c hoàn t\u1ea5t.
Vui lòng s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp \u0111\u1ec3 ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c làm công vi\u1ec7c c\u1ee7a mình trong khi nhóm th\u1ee3 \u1edf trong phòng. Phòng h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb (phòng 409) s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng làm ch\u1ed7 làm vi\u1ec7c su\u1ed1t c\u1ea3 tu\u1ea7n. M\u1ed9t l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn khác là yêu c\u1ea7u ng\u01b0\u1eddi giám sát cho phép b\u1ea1n làm vi\u1ec7c \u1edf nhà m\u1ed9t ho\u1eb7c hai ngày.
Xin hãy kiên nh\u1eabn v\u1edbi s\u1ef1 b\u1ea5t ti\u1ec7n nh\u1ea5t th\u1eddi này và \u0111\u1eebng ng\u1ea1i liên l\u1ea1c v\u1edbi tôi n\u1ebfu có b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 câu h\u1ecfi hay b\u0103n kho\u0103n gì.<\/p>

L\u1ecaCH LÀM VI\u1ec6C - Ngày 2 Tháng 3 \u0111\u1ebfn 6 tháng 3
--------------------
Th\u1ee9 Hai, Ngày 3 Tháng 3, 3 Tháng 3
Phòng 401 (Phòng h\u1ecdp)
Phòng 403 (Allie Stevens & Matt Beale)
---------------------
Th\u1ee9 T\u01b0, Tháng Ba N\u0103m Th\u1ee9 N\u0103m, Ngày 5 Tháng 3
Phòng 402 (Marlene Asbury & Luke Roe)
Phòng 408 (Phòng h\u1ecdp)
---------------------
Th\u1ee9 Sáu, Ngày 6 Tháng 3
Phòng 407 (Jung Li)
Phòng 404 (Elliot Hagburg & Ana Keller)<\/p>

 <\/p>

 <\/p>"}

childrens.title: Why was the memo sent to employees?
childrens.answers: ["To alert them of the upcoming renovations","To announce that the firm will be relocating","To request feedback about new workplace facilities","To address their complaints about building maintenance"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

T\u1ea1i sao th\u01b0 báo l\u1ea1i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c g\u1eedi t\u1edbi nhân viên?<\/p>

A. \u0110\u1ec3 báo cho h\u1ecd v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec7c tu s\u1eeda s\u1eafp t\u1edbi<\/p>

B. Công b\u1ed1 công ty s\u1ebd d\u1eddi \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m<\/p>

C. Yêu c\u1ea7u ph\u1ea3n h\u1ed3i v\u1ec1 c\u01a1 s\u1edf làm vi\u1ec7c m\u1edbi<\/p>

D. Gi\u1ea3i quy\u1ebft khi\u1ebfu n\u1ea1i v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec7c xây d\u1ef1ng b\u1ea3o trì<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

As most of you are aware, our schedule will be a bit challenging during the first week in March. Various rooms and offices will need to be vacated for certain periods to allow work crews to repaint, recarpet, and replace old furniture.<\/p>","en":"

Why was the memo sent to employees?<\/p>

A. To alert them of the upcoming renovations<\/p>

B. To announce that the firm will be relocating<\/p>

C. To request feedback about new workplace facilities<\/p>

D. To address their complaints about building maintenance<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

As most of you are aware, our schedule will be a bit challenging during the first week in March. Various rooms and offices will need to be vacated for certain periods to allow work crews to repaint, recarpet, and replace old furniture.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What are employees instructed to do?
childrens.answers: ["Report for work early","Schedule a meeting with a manager","Indicate which office supplies are theirs","Update their contact information online"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Các nhân viên \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn làm gì?<\/p>

A. Báo cáo công vi\u1ec7c s\u1edbm<\/p>

B. S\u1eafp l\u1ecbch m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp v\u1edbi ng\u01b0\u1eddi qu\u1ea3n lý<\/p>

C. Ch\u1ec9 \u0111\u1ecbnh v\u1eadt d\u1ee5ng v\u0103n phòng nào là c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd<\/p>

D. C\u1eadp nh\u1eadt thông tin liên h\u1ec7 c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

Boxes will be provided. Leave your boxes in the rooms for the work crews to remove. Please label them with your name and office number so that the crews can return them to the correct offices once the work is complete.<\/p>","en":"

What are employees instructed to do?<\/p>

A. Report for work early<\/p>

B. Schedule a meeting with a manager<\/p>

C. Indicate which office supplies are theirs<\/p>

D. Update their contact information online<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

Boxes will be provided. Leave your boxes in the rooms for the work crews to remove. Please label them with your name and office number so that the crews can return them to the correct offices once the work is complete.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is stated about Room 409?
childrens.answers: ["It will be available for videoconferencing","Employees may gather there for work","A scheduling meeting will be held there","Its furniture will be removed temporarily"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

\u0110i\u1ec1u gì \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c kh\u1eb3ng \u0111\u1ecbnh v\u1ec1 phòng 409?<\/p>

A. Nó s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eafp s\u1eb5n cho m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb video<\/p>

B. Nhân viên có th\u1ec3 t\u1eadp h\u1ee3p \u1edf \u0111ó \u0111\u1ec3 làm vi\u1ec7c<\/p>

C. M\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp s\u1ebd di\u1ec5n ra \u1edf \u0111ó<\/p>

D. \u0110\u1ed3 \u0111\u1ea1c c\u1ee7a phòng \u0111ó s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1ea1m th\u1eddi d\u1eddi \u0111i<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

Please make arrangements to continue working on your assignments while the work crews are in your rooms. The conference room (Room 409) will remain available to be used as a workspace during the entire week. Another possible option is to request permission from your supervisor to telecommute for one or two days.<\/p>","en":"

What is stated about Room 409?<\/p>

A. It will be available for videoconferencing<\/p>

B. Employees may gather there for work<\/p>

C. A scheduling meeting will be held there<\/p>

D. Its furniture will be removed temporarily<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

Please make arrangements to continue working on your assignments while the work crews are in your rooms. The conference room (Room 409) will remain available to be used as a workspace during the entire week. Another possible option is to request permission from your supervisor to telecommute for one or two days.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: When should Ms. Asbury be ready to vacate her office?
childrens.answers: ["On February 12","On February 27","On March 3","On March 4"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Khi nào thì cô Asbury s\u1eb5n sàng r\u1eddi kh\u1ecfi v\u0103n phòng c\u1ee7a mình?<\/p>

A. Vào ngày 12 tháng 2<\/p>

B. Vào ngày 27 tháng 2<\/p>

C. Vào ngày 3 tháng 3<\/p>

D. Vào ngày 4 tháng 3<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Chúng ta có thông tin: \"Affected employees will need to box up all their office items by 3 P.M. on the day before their room is scheduled for work (please see the attached schedule).\" và khi chúng ta nhìn vào b\u1ea3ng bi\u1ec3u, ta có th\u1ec3 th\u1ea5y vào th\u1ee9 t\u01b0, ngày 4 tháng 3 là ngày v\u0103n phòng c\u1ee7a cô Asbury \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eeda ch\u1eefa nên chúng ta ch\u1ecdn (C).<\/p>","en":"

When should Ms. Asbury be ready to vacate her office?<\/p>

A. On February 12<\/p>

B. On February 27<\/p>

C. On March 3<\/p>

D. On March 4<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

We have the information: \"Affected employees will need to box up all their office items by 3 P.M. on the day before their room is scheduled for work (please see the attached schedule).\" and when we look at the graphic, we can see that on Wednesday, March 4 is Ms. Asbury's office work schedule, so we choose (C).<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is suggested about Mr. Hagburg?
childrens.answers: ["He shares an office with a colleague","He will work off-site on March 5","He is the head of a department","He requested the use of a conference room"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

\u0110i\u1ec1u gì \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c g\u1ee3i ý v\u1ec1 anh Hagburg?<\/p>

A. Anh ta chia s\u1ebb v\u0103n phòng v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ed3ng nghi\u1ec7p<\/p>

B. Anh ta s\u1ebd làm vi\u1ec7c ngoài v\u0103n phòng vào ngày 5 tháng 3<\/p>

C. Anh ta là tr\u01b0\u1edfng b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn<\/p>

D. Anh ta yêu c\u1ea7u s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng phòng h\u1ecdp<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Nhìn vào b\u1ea3ng bi\u1ec3u, chúng ta có th\u1ec3 th\u1ea5y vào th\u1ee9 sáu, ngày 6 tháng 3, trong phòng 404, có hai cái tên: Elliot Hagburg và Ana Keller, nên chúng ta ch\u1ecdn (A).<\/p>","en":"

What is suggested about Mr. Hagburg?<\/p>

A. He shares an office with a colleague<\/p>

B. He will work off-site on March 5<\/p>

C. He is the head of a department<\/p>

D. He requested the use of a conference room<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation:<\/p>

Looking at the graphic, we can see that on Friday, March 6, in Room 404, there are two names: Elliot Hagburg and Ana Keller, so we choose (A).<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Nông Tr\u1ea1i Jivrou
S\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m H\u1eefu c\u01a1 T\u01b0\u01a1i s\u1ed1ng t\u1eeb Nông tr\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a chúng tôi mang \u0111\u1ebfn cho Nhà b\u1ea1n
Trang tr\u1ea1i Livrou \u1edf Bromont, Quebec, m\u1eddi b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ebfn tham gia ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình nông nghi\u1ec7p \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng \u1ee7ng h\u1ed9. Các thành viên \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u01b0\u1edfng th\u1ee9c các s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m nông nghi\u1ec7p t\u01b0\u01a1i s\u1ed1ng trong mùa tr\u1ed3ng tr\u1ecdt t\u1eeb tháng 6 \u0111\u1ebfn tháng 11.
\u0110\u0103ng ký \u0111\u1ec3 chia s\u1ebb s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m trang tr\u1ea1i và nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nh\u1eefng quy\u1ec1n l\u1ee3i này:
- H\u01a1n 30 lo\u1ea1i rau, trái cây và d\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u1ea3o trong mùa, thu ho\u1ea1ch b\u1edfi nhân viên nông tr\u1ea1i và \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c chu\u1ea9n b\u1ecb t\u1ea1i nhà kho \u0111\u1ec3 b\u1ea1n ch\u1ecdn
- Dâu, táo, và các lo\u1ea1i trái cây khác t\u1ef1 tay mình hái có ch\u1ecdn l\u1ecdc
- Truy c\u1eadp trang web thành viên c\u1ee7a chúng tôi \u0111\u1ec3 tìm ki\u1ebfm công th\u1ee9c, c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt v\u1ec1 trang tr\u1ea1i, và b\u1ea3n tin trang tr\u1ea1i
- Chi\u1ebft kh\u1ea5u cho các s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i trang tr\u1ea1i, nh\u01b0 l\u1ec5 h\u1ed9i âm nh\u1ea1c mùa hè hàng n\u0103m. Các s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n th\u01b0\u1eddng t\u1ed1n 15 \u0111ô la, nh\u01b0ng thành viên ch\u1ec9 c\u1ea7n tr\u1ea3 10 \u0111ô la.
Các thành viên nh\u1eadn ph\u1ea7n s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m m\u1ed9t l\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t tu\u1ea7n t\u1ea1i trang tr\u1ea1i. M\u1ed9t ph\u1ea7n s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 là $700 m\u1ed7i mùa, và n\u1eeda ph\u1ea7n là $350. Nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi chia s\u1ebb s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m n\u1eeda ph\u1ea7n nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1ed9t n\u1eeda s\u1ed1 l\u01b0\u1ee3ng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m m\u1ed7i tu\u1ea7n. T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các quy\u1ec1n l\u1ee3i khác v\u1eabn nh\u01b0 nhau.
Nông s\u1ea3n chúng tôi s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c tr\u1ed3ng mà không dùng thu\u1ed1c tr\u1eeb sâu hay thu\u1ed1c di\u1ec7t c\u1ecf, và chúng tôi ch\u1ec9 s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng phân bón t\u1ef1 nhiên. \u0110\u1ec3 bi\u1ebft thêm thông tin ho\u1eb7c \u0111\u0103ng ký làm thành viên, vui lòng xem trang web c\u1ee7a chúng tôi t\u1ea1i www. livroufarm.ca. <\/p>

http:\/\/ www.livroufarm.ca
Nông Tr\u1ea1i Jivrou
Thành viên - Trang ch\u1ee7 - V\u1ecb trí - \u0110ánh giá
Tên: Julien Bernard
\u0110\u1ecba Ch\u1ec9: 78 Ph\u1ed1 Dorion, Bromont, QC J2L 2K7
Ngày nh\u1eadn hàng v\u1edbi l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn \u0111\u1ea7u tiên: Th\u1ee9 n\u0103m x ; Th\u1ee9 sáu 0 ; Th\u1ee9 b\u1ea3y 0 ; Ch\u1ee7 nh\u1eadt 0
Ngày nh\u1eadn hàng v\u1edbi l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn th\u1ee9 hai: Th\u1ee9 n\u0103m: 0 ; Th\u1ee9 sáu x ; Th\u1ee9 b\u1ea3y 0 ; Ch\u1ee7 nh\u1eadt 0
Kích c\u1ee1 ph\u1ea7n s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m: \u0110\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 0 ; M\u1ed9t n\u1eeda x
L\u01afU Ý: Nh\u1eadn hàng là t\u1eeb 3 gi\u1edd t\u1ed1i \u0111\u1ebfn 6 gi\u1edd t\u1ed1i.
Làm \u01a1n cung c\u1ea5p tên c\u1ee7a nh\u1eefng cá nhân khác trong gia \u0111ình c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n. \u0110ây là nh\u1eefng cá nhân duy nh\u1ea5t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c phép nh\u1eadn ph\u1ea7n s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m hàng tu\u1ea7n c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n.
Tên: Margaux Bernard, Laurent Bernard
Nh\u1ea5p VÀO \u0110ÂY \u0111\u1ec3 nh\u1eadp thông tin thanh toán \u1edf trang ti\u1ebfp theo<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is the purpose of the flyer?
childrens.answers: ["To invite people to a farm festival","To promote community service opportunities","To share recipes for healthy eating","To advertise a farm program"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

M\u1ee5c \u0111ích c\u1ee7a t\u1edd r\u01a1i là gì?<\/p>

A. M\u1eddi m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111\u1ebfn m\u1ed9t l\u1ec5 h\u1ed9i nông tr\u1ea1i<\/p>

B. Qu\u1ea3ng bá các c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng<\/p>

C. Chia s\u1ebb công th\u1ee9c \u0103n u\u1ed1ng lành m\u1ea1nh<\/p>

D. Qu\u1ea3ng cáo m\u1ed9t ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình nông nghi\u1ec7p<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

Livrou Farm in Bromont, Quebec, invites you to participate in its community-supported agriculture program.<\/p>","en":"

What is the purpose of the flyer?<\/p>

A. To invite people to a farm festival<\/p>

B. To promote community service opportunities<\/p>

C. To share recipes for healthy eating<\/p>

D. To advertise a farm program<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

Livrou Farm in Bromont, Quebec, invites you to participate in its community-supported agriculture program.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is suggested about the workers at Livrou Farm?
childrens.answers: ["They collect farm produce from June to November","They update the farm's Web site once a week","They create meals using the farm's products","They sell farm products at several local markets"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

\u0110i\u1ec1u gì \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ng\u1ee5 ý v\u1ec1 nhân viên \u1edf Nông tr\u1ea1i Livrou?<\/p>

A. H\u1ecd thu ho\u1ea1ch nông s\u1ea3n t\u1eeb tháng 6 \u0111\u1ebfn tháng 11<\/p>

B. H\u1ecd c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt trang web c\u1ee7a trang tr\u1ea1i m\u1ed9t l\u1ea7n m\u1ed7i tu\u1ea7n<\/p>

C. H\u1ecd t\u1ea1o ra nh\u1eefng món \u0103n s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m c\u1ee7a nông tr\u1ea1i<\/p>

D. H\u1ecd bán s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m nông tr\u1ea1i t\u1ea1i m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 ch\u1ee3 \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

Members enjoy fresh farm produce during our growing season from June to November.<\/p>","en":"

What is suggested about the workers at Livrou Farm?<\/p>

A. They collect farm produce from June to November<\/p>

B. They update the farm's Web site once a week<\/p>

C. They create meals using the farm's products<\/p>

D. They sell farm products at several local markets<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

Members enjoy fresh farm produce during our growing season from June to November.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is NOT indicated about Livrou Farm?
childrens.answers: ["It publishes a newsletter","It uses natural fertilizers","It hosts musical performances","It offers cooking classes"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

\u0110i\u1ec1u gì không \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c kh\u1eb3ng \u0111\u1ecbnh v\u1ec1 Trang tr\u1ea1i Livrou?<\/p>

A. Nó xu\u1ea5t b\u1ea3n th\u01b0 thông báo<\/p>

B. Nó s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng phân bón t\u1ef1 nhiên<\/p>

C. Nó t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c các bu\u1ed5i bi\u1ec3u di\u1ec5n âm nh\u1ea1c<\/p>

D. Nó có các l\u1edbp h\u1ecdc n\u1ea5u \u0103n<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Chúng ta có thông tin:<\/p>

Access to our member Web site with recipes, farm updates, and a farm newsletter.<\/p>

Our farm produce is grown without the use of pesticides or herbicides, and we use only naturally occurring fertilizers.<\/p>

Discounts on events at the farm, such as the annual summer music festival. Events typically cost $15, but members pay $10.<\/p>

Chi ti\u1ebft không có \u1edf \u0111ây là l\u1edbp h\u1ecdc n\u1ea5u \u0103n. V\u1eady chúng ta ch\u1ecdn (D).<\/p>","en":"

What is NOT indicated about Livrou Farm?<\/p>

A. It publishes a newsletter<\/p>

B. It uses natural fertilizers<\/p>

C. It hosts musical performances<\/p>

D. It offers cooking classes<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

We have the information:<\/p>

Access to our member Web site with recipes, farm updates, and a farm newsletter.<\/p>

Our farm produce is grown without the use of pesticides or herbicides, and we use only naturally occurring fertilizers.<\/p>

Discounts on events at the farm, such as the annual summer music festival. Events typically cost $15, but members pay $10.<\/p>

The only missing one is the cooking classes. So we choose (D).<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is true about Mr. Bernard's membership?
childrens.answers: ["He must pick up his produce on Sundays","He is the only person allowed to pick up his farm share","He will be allowed to pick some of his own fruit","He will be able to plant and grow his own vegetables"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

\u0110i\u1ec1u gì là s\u1ef1 th\u1eadt v\u1ec1 t\u01b0 cách h\u1ed9i viên c\u1ee7a ông Bernard?<\/p>

A. Ông ta ph\u1ea3i nh\u1eadn s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m c\u1ee7a mình vào Ch\u1ee7 Nh\u1eadt<\/p>

B. Ông ta là ng\u01b0\u1eddi duy nh\u1ea5t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c phép nh\u1eadn ph\u1ea7n s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m nông tr\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a mình<\/p>

C. Ông ta \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c phép hái m\u1ed9t ít trái cây cho riêng mình<\/p>

D. Ông ta có th\u1ec3 nuôi tr\u1ed3ng rau c\u1ee7 c\u1ee7a riêng mình<\/p>

###<\/p>

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

Sign up for a farm share and receive these benefits:
- More than 30 varieties of in-season vegetables, fruits, and herbs, harvested by our farm staff and prepared for you to pick up at our barn
- A selection of pick-your-own strawberries, apples, and other fruits
- Access to our member Web site with recipes, farm updates, and a farm newsletter
- Discounts on events at the farm, such as the annual summer music festival. Events typically cost $15, but members pay $10.<\/p>","en":"

What is true about Mr. Bernard's membership?<\/p>

A. He must pick up his produce on Sundays<\/p>

B. He is the only person allowed to pick up his farm share<\/p>

C. He will be allowed to pick some of his own fruit<\/p>

D. He will be able to plant and grow his own vegetables<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

Sign up for a farm share and receive these benefits:
- More than 30 varieties of in-season vegetables, fruits, and herbs, harvested by our farm staff and prepared for you to pick up at our barn
- A selection of pick-your-own strawberries, apples, and other fruits
- Access to our member Web site with recipes, farm updates, and a farm newsletter
- Discounts on events at the farm, such as the annual summer music festival. Events typically cost $15, but members pay $10.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: How much should Mr. Bernard pay for the membership?
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ông Bernard s\u1ebd tr\u1ea3 bao nhiêu \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c làm h\u1ed9i viên?<\/p>

A. $10<\/p>

B. $15<\/p>

C. $350<\/p>

D. $700<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Chúng ta có thông tin: \"Members pick up their shares once a week at the farm. A full-size share is $700 per season, and a half-size share is $350. Half-size shareholders receive half the amount of produce each week. All other benefits remain the same.\" và ta có th\u1ec3 th\u1ea5y trên trang h\u1ed9i viên, \u1edf ph\u1ea7n Kích c\u1ee1 ph\u1ea7n s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m, ông ta ch\u1ecdn Half \"m\u1ed9t n\u1eeda\" nên (C) là câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi \u0111úng.<\/p>","en":"

How much should Mr. Bernard pay for the membership?<\/p>

A. $10<\/p>

B. $15<\/p>

C. $350<\/p>

D. $700<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

We have the information: \"Members pick up their shares once a week at the farm. A full-size share is $700 per season, and a half-size share is $350. Half-size shareholders receive half the amount of produce each week. All other benefits remain the same.\" and we can see on the Membership web page, at the Size of share section, he chooses Half so (C) is the correct answer.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

http:\/\/ www.communitylinkforum.org\/burlingtonvermont
Tìm ki\u1ebfm C\u0103n h\u1ed9 Chuyên nghi\u1ec7p \u1edf Burlington
Jorge Janssen <jjanssen@blitzer.com>
Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: B\u1ea5t \u0111\u1ed9ng s\u1ea3n và Nhà \u1edf
Ngày: 23 Tháng 6
Tôi \u0111ã ch\u1ea5p nh\u1eadn m\u1ed9t v\u1ecb trí công vi\u1ec7c m\u1edbi \u1edf Burlington và c\u1ea7n di d\u1eddi \u0111\u1ebfn g\u1ea7n khu v\u1ef1c trung tâm thành ph\u1ed1 tr\u01b0\u1edbc ngày b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u làm vi\u1ec7c 15 tháng 8. Tôi \u0111ang c\u1ea7n thuê m\u1ed9t c\u0103n h\u1ed9 \u0111\u01a1n gi\u1ea3n, s\u1ea1ch s\u1ebd, có m\u1ed9t phòng ng\u1ee7 ho\u1eb7c l\u1edbn h\u01a1n tùy thu\u1ed9c vào giá c\u1ea3. M\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m yên t\u0129nh v\u1edbi ch\u1ed7 ng\u1ed3i ngoài tr\u1eddi \u0111\u1ec3 gi\u1ea3i trí v\u1edbi b\u1ea1n bè ho\u1eb7c gia \u0111ình s\u1ebd là m\u1ed9t \u0111i\u1ec3m c\u1ed9ng. Tôi có m\u1ed9t chi\u1ebfc xe, nh\u01b0ng tôi s\u1ebd r\u1ea5t c\u1ea3m kích n\u1ebfu \u1edf \u0111ó có ph\u01b0\u01a1ng ti\u1ec7n công c\u1ed9ng. Tôi có m\u1ed9t ngân sách kho\u1ea3ng $1,400 m\u1ed9t tháng \u0111\u1ec3 thanh toán t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các chi phí nhà \u1edf, bao g\u1ed3m c\u1ea3 ti\u1ec7n ích. <\/p>

http:\/\/ www.communitylinkforum.org\/burlingtonvermont
C\u0103n h\u1ed9 cho thuê \u1edf Burlington
Eloise Mcmahon <mcmahonrental@hmail.com>
Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: B\u1ea5t \u0111\u1ed9ng s\u1ea3n và Nhà \u1edf
Ngày: 23 Tháng 6
Hãy là ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111\u1ea7u tiên thuê c\u0103n h\u1ed9 2 phòng ng\u1ee7 này m\u1ed9t khi vi\u1ec7c s\u1eeda ch\u1eefa hoàn t\u1ea5t. C\u0103n h\u1ed9 này d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn s\u1ebd s\u1eb5n sàng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u1edf vào ngày 1 tháng 8. Nó s\u1ebd mang m\u1ed9t phong cách hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i và s\u1ea1ch s\u1ebd, sàn m\u1edbi \u1edf kh\u1eafp nhà, cùng nh\u1eefng thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb m\u1edbi. C\u0103n h\u1ed9 n\u1eb1m \u1edf trung tâm thành ph\u1ed1, và sinh viên \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c chào \u0111ón vì ch\u1ec9 m\u1ea5t ít h\u01a1n 10 phút \u0111i b\u1eb1ng xe buýt \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ebfn tr\u01b0\u1eddng \u0110\u1ea1i h\u1ecdc Denton. Bãi \u0111\u1ed7 xe trên \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng có s\u1eb5n v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t chi\u1ebfc decal t\u1eeb Phòng V\u1eadn t\u1ea3i Thành ph\u1ed1. Mèo hay cún nh\u1ecf có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c phép cho nuôi nh\u01b0ng có \u0111i\u1ec1u ki\u1ec7n, nên xin hãy h\u1ecfi tr\u01b0\u1edbc. $1,400 ti\u1ec1n thuê \u0111\u1ec3 thanh toán ti\u1ec1n n\u01b0\u1edbc, c\u1ed1ng rãnh, thu gom rác, và b\u1ea3o d\u01b0\u1ee1ng tài s\u1ea3n. \u0110i\u1ec7n và gas thu\u1ed9c v\u1ec1 trách nhi\u1ec7m c\u1ee7a ng\u01b0\u1eddi thuê nhà. Ti\u1ec1n \u0111\u1eb7t c\u1ecdc anh ninh t\u01b0\u01a1ng \u0111\u01b0\u01a1ng v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t tháng ti\u1ec1n thuê nhà và ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c tr\u1ea3 khi ký h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng cho thuê.<\/p>

\u0110\u1ebfn: Eloise Mcmahon <mcmahonrental@hmail.com>
T\u1eeb: Jorge Janssen <jjanssen@blitzer.com>
H\u1ed3i âm: C\u0103n H\u1ed9
Ngày: 24 Tháng 6
Th\u01b0a Cô Mcmahon,
Tôi tìm th\u1ea5y danh sách cho thuê c\u1ee7a cô trên trang communitylinkforum.org. T\u1eeb mô t\u1ea3 thì có v\u1ebb nh\u01b0 nó là \u0111i\u1ec1u mà tôi \u0111ang tìm ki\u1ebfm. Tôi r\u1ea5t mu\u1ed1n xem qua c\u0103n h\u1ed9, và tôi c\u0169ng tình c\u1edd có m\u1eb7t \u1edf Burlington trong tu\u1ea7n này. Ngày cu\u1ed1i cùng c\u1ee7a tôi t\u1ea1i th\u1ecb tr\u1ea5n s\u1ebd là ch\u1ee7 nh\u1eadt, ngày 30 tháng 6. N\u1ebfu ch\u1ed7 này phù h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi tôi, tôi mu\u1ed1n chuy\u1ec3n vào ngày \u0111ó luôn n\u1ebfu nó có s\u1eb5n. Th\u1eddi gian th\u1eadt s\u1ef1 r\u1ea5t lý t\u01b0\u1edfng! Tôi hy v\u1ecdng s\u1ebd s\u1edbm nghe h\u1ed3i âm t\u1eeb cô.
C\u1ea3m \u01a1n.
Jorge Janssen
(802) 555-0122<\/p>"}

childrens.explains:

childrens.answers: ["The location","The monthly costs","The parking availability","The size"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Khía c\u1ea1nh nào c\u1ee7a c\u0103n h\u1ed9 không kh\u1edbp v\u1edbi mong \u01b0\u1edbc c\u1ee7a ông Janssen?<\/p>

childrens.answers: ["On June 24","On June 30","On August 1","On August 15"]

This property is anticipated to be move-in ready on August 1.<\/p>

If the place suits me, I'd want to move in the same day that it's expected to be available. The timing would be perfect! I hope to hear from you soon.<\/p>","en":"

A. On June 24<\/p>

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Máy Xay Th\u1ef1c Ph\u1ea9m-Mô hình C3 Kitchenware Utopia
B\u1ea1n s\u1ebd không bao gi\u1edd c\u1ea7n mua thêm m\u1ed9t máy xay th\u1ef1c ph\u1ea9m nào n\u1eefa! Mô hình bán ch\u1ea1y nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a chúng tôi, C3, \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c làm t\u1eeb nh\u1ef1a ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng cao và s\u1eaft không g\u1ec9 d\u1ec5 lau chùi.
\u0110\u1eb6C TÍNH Thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf l\u01b0\u1ee1i dao \u0111\u1ed9c nh\u1ea5t và \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u01a1 m\u1ea1nh m\u1ebd \u0111ã t\u1ea1o nên m\u1ed9t thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb \u0111\u1eb3ng c\u1ea5p chuyên nghi\u1ec7p, lý t\u01b0\u1edfng cho nh\u1eefng nhà hàng b\u1eadn r\u1ed9n \u1edf b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 kích th\u01b0\u1edbc nào.
B\u1ea2O HÀNH Chúng tôi bao g\u1ed3m 7 n\u0103m b\u1ea3o hành trên t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn và vi\u1ec7c s\u1eeda ch\u1eefa - m\u1ed9t s\u1ef1 b\u1ea3o \u0111\u1ea3m v\u1edbi b\u1ea1n r\u1eb1ng máy xay th\u1ef1c ph\u1ea9m s\u1ebd t\u1ed3n t\u1ea1i b\u1ec1n b\u1ec9 trong m\u1ed9t th\u1eddi gian dài.
Giá mua \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t: $319.00\/KU Thành viên: $299.00<\/p>

www.kitchenwareutopia.com\/C3\/review\/454
X\u1ebfp h\u1ea1ng: *****
\u0110ánh giá: S\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m này th\u1eadt tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi! Tôi làm vi\u1ec7c \u1edf d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 \u0103n u\u1ed1ng, và tôi \u0111ã s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng nhi\u1ec1u máy xay th\u1ee9c \u0103n khác nhau. C3 c\u1ee7a Kitchenware Utopia là cái t\u1ed1t nh\u1ea5t mà tôi tìm th\u1ea5y. \u0110\u1ed9ng c\u01a1 c\u1ee7a nó r\u1ea5t m\u1ea1nh, và nhi\u1ec1u l\u01b0\u1ee1i dao khác nhau khi\u1ebfn cho nó c\u1ef1c k\u1ef3 linh ho\u1ea1t. Các cài \u0111\u1eb7t c\u0169ng r\u1ea5t \u0111\u01a1n gi\u1ea3n. Nó \u0111\u1eaft ti\u1ec1n nh\u01b0ng \u0111áng \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0, và vì tôi là m\u1ed9t thành viên trung thành nên cái giá này r\u1ea5t ph\u1ea3i ch\u0103ng. L\u1eddi phàn nàn duy nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a tôi là nó r\u1ea5t n\u1eb7ng và do \u0111ó không th\u1ec3 di chuy\u1ec3n thu\u1eadn ti\u1ec7n nh\u01b0 tôi mong \u0111\u1ee3i. Nhìn chung, tôi c\u1ef1c k\u1ef3 hài lòng v\u1edbi s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m này.
\u0110\u0103ng b\u1edfi Eli Perles vào ngày 27 tháng 3<\/p>

Chúng tôi r\u1ea5t vui khi nghe là b\u1ea1n hài lòng v\u1edbi máy xay th\u1ef1c ph\u1ea9m c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. S\u1ef1 hài lòng c\u1ee7a khách hàng là \u01b0u tiên s\u1ed1 m\u1ed9t c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. Chúng tôi mu\u1ed1n tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi khi\u1ebfu n\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n và cung c\u1ea5p \u0111\u1ec1 xu\u1ea5t liên quan \u0111\u1ebfn b\u0103n kho\u0103n c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n. B\u1ed9 x\u1eed lý C2 có th\u1ec3 phù h\u1ee3p h\u01a1n v\u1edbi nhu c\u1ea7u chuyên môn c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n. C2 có cùng kích th\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u01a1 nh\u01b0 C3, nh\u01b0ng nó nh\u1ecf h\u01a1n nhi\u1ec1u so v\u1edbi C3 nói chung. Tuy nhiên, mô hình này có giá cao h\u01a1n m\u1ed9t chút. B\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 xem mô t\u1ea3 s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m b\u1eb1ng cách truy c\u1eadp trang www.kitchenwareutopia.com\/C2.
\u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u0103ng b\u1edfi Kitchenware Utopia, Ch\u0103m Sóc Khách Hàng vào ngày 28 tháng 3<\/p>"}

questions.text_read:
Ment Hall to Host Piasek Cup Final

Ment Hall, which is currently undergoing extensive renovation, will be ready to host the final game of the Piasek Cup Volleyball Championship to be held in Warsaw this June. Although the project has been in the works for some time, it was the opportunity to host this championship that provided the economic incentive to push the project to its completion. City officials have confirmed that the construction is progressing according to schedule and will be complete well before the finals of the championship.

Since Ment Hall is the only major arena in the country that has never hosted a Piasek Cup event, the hall's owners were proud to have been chosen to host this year's finale. The final game will inaugurate the refurbished hall. The event is expected to draw thousands of volleyball fans, and the organizers are confident that Ment Hall will live up to the occasion. Seating 19,000 spectators, Ment Hall will be double its previous size.

News Update
HALLAX RADIO 108.3 FM

Sports-Volleyball, 10 June At 3:00 P.M., Venezuela will take on Australia for qualification to the semifinals. Our guest announcer will be Vin Cote, retired coach of last year's winning team from Canada. At 6:00 P.M., host team Poland will face off against France. The game will be covered live by Jeremy Bosko.
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

H\u1ed9i Tr\u01b0\u1eddng Ment S\u1ebd T\u1ed5 Ch\u1ee9c Gi\u1ea3i Chung K\u1ebft Cúp Piasek
H\u1ed9i Tr\u01b0\u1eddng Ment, hi\u1ec7n \u0111ang tr\u1ea3i qua vi\u1ec7c tu s\u1eeda kéo dài, s\u1ebd s\u1eb5n sàng \u0111\u1ec3 t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c tr\u1eadn chung k\u1ebft c\u1ee7a Gi\u1ea3i Vô \u0110\u1ecbch Bóng Chuy\u1ec1n Cúp Piasek di\u1ec5n ra \u1edf Warsaw vào tháng 6 này. M\u1eb7c dù d\u1ef1 án \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ti\u1ebfn hành m\u1ed9t th\u1eddi gian r\u1ed3i, nó là c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i \u0111\u1ec3 t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c gi\u1ea3i vô \u0111\u1ecbch này v\u1ed1n mang l\u1ea1i \u0111\u1ed9ng l\u1ef1c kinh t\u1ebf thúc \u0111\u1ea9y d\u1ef1 án hoàn thành. Các quan ch\u1ee9c thành ph\u1ed1 \u0111ã xác nh\u1eadn r\u1eb1ng vi\u1ec7c xây d\u1ef1ng \u0111ang ti\u1ebfn tri\u1ec3n theo ti\u1ebfn \u0111\u1ed9 và s\u1ebd hoàn thành tr\u01b0\u1edbc tr\u1eadn chung k\u1ebft c\u1ee7a ch\u1ee9c vô \u0111\u1ecbch.
Vì H\u1ed9i Tr\u01b0\u1eddng Ment là \u0111\u1ea5u tr\u01b0\u1eddng l\u1edbn duy nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a qu\u1ed1c gia ch\u01b0a bao gi\u1edd t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c m\u1ed9t s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n Cúp Piasek, nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi ch\u1ee7 c\u1ee7a h\u1ed9i tr\u01b0\u1eddng t\u1ef1 hào khi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ecdn \u0111\u1ec3 t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c tr\u1eadn chung k\u1ebft n\u0103m nay. Tr\u1eadn \u0111\u1ea5u cu\u1ed1i cùng s\u1ebd giúp khánh thành tòa nhà \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c tân trang l\u1ea1i này. S\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n này d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn s\u1ebd thu hút hàng ngàn ng\u01b0\u1eddi hâm m\u1ed9 bóng chuy\u1ec1n, và các nhà t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c t\u1ef1 tin r\u1eb1ng H\u1ed9i Tr\u01b0\u1eddng Ment s\u1ebd \u0111em l\u1ea1i nh\u1ecbp s\u1ed1ng cho d\u1ecbp này. V\u1edbi kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng ch\u1ee9a 19000 khán gi\u1ea3, H\u1ed9i Tr\u01b0\u1eddng Ment s\u1ebd t\u0103ng g\u1ea5p \u0111ôi kích c\u1ee1 tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ó c\u1ee7a nó.
Gi\u1ea3i Vô \u0110\u1ecbch Bóng Chuy\u1ec1n Cúp Piasek<\/p>

Tr\u1eadn T\u1ee9 K\u1ebft
Venezuela - Úc: 10 Tháng 6, 3:00 chi\u1ec1u; \u0110\u1ea5u Tr\u01b0\u1eddng Loave; Bydgoszcz
Ba Lan - Pháp: 10 Tháng 6, 6:00 chi\u1ec1u; H\u1ed9i Tr\u01b0\u1eddng Timpani; Katowice
Brazil - Hoa K\u1ef3: 11 Tháng 6, 3:00 chi\u1ec1u; Trung tâm Polana; Cracow
Cuba - Ai C\u1eadp: 11 Tháng 6, 6:00 chi\u1ec1u; \u0110\u1ea5u Tr\u01b0\u1eddng Mistrz; Wroclaw
Tr\u1eadn Bán K\u1ebft
Ng\u01b0\u1eddi chi\u1ebfn th\u1eafng trong tr\u1eadn 10 tháng 6: 13 tháng 6, 3:00 chi\u1ec1u ; H\u1ed9i Tr\u01b0\u1eddng Timpani, Katowice
Ng\u01b0\u1eddi chi\u1ebfn th\u1eafng trong tr\u1eadn 11 tháng 6: 13 tháng 6, 3:00 chi\u1ec1u; Trung Tâm Polana, Cracow
Tr\u1eadn Chung K\u1ebft: 16 Tháng 6, 6:00 chi\u1ec1u ; H\u1ed9i Tr\u01b0\u1eddng Ment, Warsaw
L\u01b0u ý: Vé cho tr\u1eadn chung k\u1ebft \u0111ang bán ch\u1ea1y, vì v\u1eady \u0111\u1eebng \u0111\u1ee3i cho \u0111\u1ebfn khi sau tr\u1eadn t\u1ee9 k\u1ebft \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1eb7t vé. Ch\u1ec9 có ch\u1ed7 ng\u1ed3i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1eb7t tr\u01b0\u1edbc, không vé th\u01b0\u1eddng. Không hoàn ti\u1ec1n.
B\u1ea3n Tin T\u1ee9c C\u1eadp Nh\u1eadt<\/p>

\u0110ÀI PHÁT THANH HALLAX 108.3 FM
Th\u1ec3 thao-Bóng chuy\u1ec1n, 10 tháng 6 lúc 3:00 chi\u1ec1u, Venezuela s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ea5u v\u1edbi Úc \u0111\u1ec3 có \u0111\u1ee7 \u0111i\u1ec1u ki\u1ec7n vào vòng bán k\u1ebft. Phát thanh viên khách m\u1eddi c\u1ee7a chúng tôi s\u1ebd là Vin Cote, hu\u1ea5n luy\u1ec7n viên \u0111ã ngh\u1ec9 h\u01b0u c\u1ee7a \u0111\u1ed9i chi\u1ebfn th\u1eafng n\u0103m ngoái \u0111\u1ebfn t\u1eeb Canada. Vào lúc 6 gi\u1edd t\u1ed1i, \u0111\u1ed9i ch\u1ee7 nhà Ba Lan s\u1ebd ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u1ed1i \u0111\u1ea7u v\u1edbi Pháp. Tr\u1eadn \u0111\u1ea5u s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u01b0\u1eddng thu\u1eadt tr\u1ef1c ti\u1ebfp b\u1edfi Jeremy Bosko.<\/p>"}

Trong bài báo, t\u1eeb \"thu hút\" trong \u0111o\u1ea1n 2, dòng 7, có ngh\u0129a g\u1ea7n nh\u1ea5t v\u1edbi t\u1eeb<\/p>

Draw \"thu hút\" ngh\u0129a là \"l\u1ea5y s\u1ef1 chú ý t\u1eeb m\u1ed9t ai hay m\u1ed9t cái gì \u0111ó và h\u01b0\u1edbng nó v\u1ec1 m\u1ed9t n\u01a1i hay m\u1ed9t th\u1ee9 gì \u0111ó\". Attract \"h\u1ea5p d\u1eabn\" c\u0169ng là t\u1eeb \u0111\u1ed3ng ngh\u0129a c\u1ee7a draw nên câu (B) \u0111úng.<\/p>","en":"

In the article, the word \"draw\" in paragraph 2, line 7, is closest in meaning to<\/p>

A. promote<\/p>

B. attract<\/p>

C. sketch<\/p>

D. remove<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

\"draw\" means \"to attract someone or something toward a particular place or things\". \"attract\" is also a synonym of \"draw\" so (B) is correct.<\/p>"}

{"vn":"

Trong l\u1ecbch trình, m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c khuyên nên làm gì?<\/p>

A. Yêu c\u1ea7u hoàn ti\u1ec1n cho vé mà h\u1ecd không có k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng<\/p>

B. \u0110\u1eb7t vé ngay sau tr\u1eadn bán k\u1ebft<\/p>
